story:
Hello, my name is Sílvia,  and I live in Braga, Portugal.

I graduated in nursing, in health sociology and I'm a doctoral student in communication sciences. What I intend is to use transdisciplinarity for the common good, for our life, for our relationships and for our health. There is not one type of knowlegde ... there are several!

Since the birth of my children, I have deepened my studies in natural medicine. I was trained in reiki, therapeutic touch and treatment of energetic centers or chacras, coaching and mindfulness. And considering my curious nature I became a self-taught convinced in several areas. Therefore, I became a health coach and holistic therapist.

I love being in touch with nature and having quality time with my kids, enjoy their smiles, their happiness, their inconditional love.  

Olá, meu nome é Sílvia, e moro em Braga, Portugal.

Sou licenciada em enfermagem, pós-graduada em sociologia da saúde e doutoranda em ciências da comunicação. O que pretendo  neste projeto, é usar a transdisciplinaridade para o bem comum, para a nossa vida, para os nossos relacionamentos e para a nossa saúde. Não há um tipo de conhecimento ... existem vários!

Desde o nascimento de meus filhos, aprofundei os meus conhecimentos em medicinas naturais. Fiz formação em reiki, toque terapêutico e tratamento de centros energéticos, coaching e atenção plena. E considerando minha natureza curiosa sou autodidacta em várias áreas. Desta forma, tornei-me uma health coach, e terapeuta holística.

Adoro estar em contato com a natureza e ter tempo de qualidade com meus filhos, de desfrutar dos seus sorrisos, da sua felicidade e do seu amor incondicional.

For some years ago I wanted to have something more, where I could spread and use the skills and learning that I have acquired throughout my life, more directed towards a healthy and natural lifestyle. And through friends in common I met Ivone, and Ivone introduced me her idea... and here we are ... together in the project with Lourença, a great friend of mine and a longtime professional colleague!

In our team, besides Ivone and Lourença as consultants, we have a series of collaborators, from doctors, specialists in functional and orthomolecular nutrition, specialists in Raw Food, psychologists, to a series of professionals in the field of physical and mental well-being , such as authentic communication, Mindfulness and conscious parenting.

Há já alguns anos eu queria ter algo mais, onde eu pudesse usar as habilidades e as competências que fui adquirindo durante a minha vida, mais direccionado para um estilo de vida saudável e mais natural. E através de amigos em comum, conheci Ivone, e ela apresentou-me a sua ideia ... e aqui estamos nós,  juntas com a Lourença, uma grande amiga minha e colega profissional de longa data.

Na nossa equipa, para além da Ivone e da Lourença como consultoras, temos uma série de colaboradores, desde médicos, especialistas em nutrição funcional e ortomolecular, especialistas em Raw Food, psicólogos,  a uma série de profissionais na vertente do bem estar físico e mental, tal como a comunicação autêntica, Mindfulness e parentalidade consciente. 

 

Our mission is to create a space surrounded by love and education, where locals and visitors from all over the world, can achieve a greater awareness towards to a healthier lifestyle, based on food, health education, ecology and culture, in our home city.  Braga is a beautiful city in northern Portugal, a very beautiful and warm country which is starting to be discovered by people from all over the world. Like Madonna! 

Braga is one of the oldest city´s of Europe, since the Roman Empire, then know as Bracara Augusta. We have a very rich historical heritage, since the romaines ruins, till the christian monuments; and a very young influence with the Minho University, one of the best university in the world.

A nossa missão é criar um espaço rodeado de amor e educação, onde todas as pessoas de todo o mundo, possam alcançar uma maior consciencialização para um estilo de vida mais saudável, baseado na alimentação, educação em saúde, ecologia e cultura, na nossa bela cidade de Braga. 

Take a look, be curious and visit our amazing city, visit us!  

 

The services we will offer are:

Teremos disponíveis os seguintes serviços: 

- Training - Formação

Courses and workshops on raw food, detox and other topics focused on the health of the body and mind. Our courses and workshops are taught by experienced professionals and are aimed at a wide audience that seeks pragmatic and simple answers to change habits and achieve better physical and mental health.

Cursos e workshops sobre alimentos crus, desintoxicação e outros tópicos focados na saúde do corpo e da mente. Os nossos cursos e worshops são ministrados por profissionais experientes e visam um público amplo que busca respostas pragmáticas e simples para mudar hábitos e alcançar uma melhor saúde física e mental.

A life in balance, Inside & Outside! 


- Juice & Raw Food Bar

A cozy space where public can find a vegan and raw cuisine (without animal food and without being cooked), prepared to serve breakfast, brunches, lunches and dinners and a bar with a variety of juices, detox juices and smoothies.

We plan to serve a vibrant kitchen inspired by bistronomy, a new wave in cooking style born in Paris, offering high experimental cuisine at a reasonable price. The concept "Bistro", a Russian origin word meaning "fast", combined with the Spanish concept of "tapas" and Portuguese for "petiscos", inspired us to create very well executed, creative dishes with excellent products and simplified service. We want satisfied customers, at all levels!

Our target audience is not just the vegetarian or vegan, or the one who already enjoys healthy eating; We have created a targeted service for all those who enjoy quality food and creativity, at an affordable price, even if they are fast-food consumers.

Um espaço aconchegante onde o público pode encontrar uma cozinha vegetariana (sem comida animal e sem cozinhar), preparada para servir refeições e um bar com uma variedade de sumos e smoothies. Pretendemos servir uma cozinha vibrante inspirada na bistronomia, uma nova onda de estilo culinário nascida em Paris, oferecendo alta cozinha experimental a um preço razoável. O conceito "Bistro", uma palavra de origem russa que significa "rápido", combinado com o conceito espanhol de "tapas" e o português para "petiscos", nos inspirou a criar pratos criativos e bem executados com excelentes produtos e serviço simplificado. Queremos clientes satisfeitos, em todos os níveis!

O nosso público-alvo não é apenas vegetariano ou vegano, ou aquele que já gosta de comer saudável. Criamos um serviço direcionado para todos aqueles que gostam de alimentos e criatividade de qualidade, a um preço acessível, mesmo que sejam consumidores de fast food.

 


- Detox Programs and Consultations

A counseling service where a specialist advises an individual detox plan, adapted to the unique needs and characteristics of each one, consisting of food counseling, health professionals support, and detox juice, which we can prepare on the spot. A detox plan is essential these days. The stressful lifestyle, the polluted environment, the poor quality of food and the water we ingest, etc., leave waste, toxins in our body. This can lead to mental and physical symptoms.

Um serviço de aconselhamento para um plano de desintoxicação individual, adaptado às necessidades e características únicas de cada um, que podemos preparar no local. Um plano de desintoxicação é essencial hoje em dia. O estilo de vida estressante, o ambiente poluído, a má qualidade dos alimentos e a água que ingerimos, etc., deixam resíduos, toxinas no nosso corpo. Isso pode levar a sintomas mentais e físicos.

 


- Culture and Live Music

A cheerful place where, at the weekend, we’ll get in contact with new music talents, creating an artistic and cosmopolitan environment, where alcohol will have no place, but instead the small shots of stimulating juices will produce a healthier and more moisturizing effect. We will regularly hold talks and art exhibitions.

Um lugar alegre onde, no fim de semana, entraremos em contato com novos talentos musicais, criando um ambiente artístico e cosmopolita, onde o álcool não terá lugar, mas, em vez disso, os pequenos shots de sumos estimulantes produzirão um efeito mais saudável e mais hidratante . Realizaremos regularmente tertúlias e exposições de arte.

 

 

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP?
Because we really want to start this as soon as possible and our funds are not enough to all the necessary expenses!

With this campaign, we seek your help to open our Taberna do Mundo (World Tavern), where people can benefit from our products and services, enabling us to contribute to a healthier and more aware world. We need conscious people in all levels!!

POR QUE PRECISAMOS DA SUA AJUDA?

Porque realmente queremos começar o quanto antes e nossos fundos não são suficientes para todas as despesas necessárias! Com esta campanha, procuramos a sua ajuda para abrir nossa Taberna do Mundo, onde as pessoas podem  beneficiar dos nossos produtos e serviços, o que nos permite contribuir para um mundo mais saudável e consciente. Precisamos pessoas conscientes em todos os níveis!

We need funding to buy the necessary material for the space, especially:

  • kitchen equipment, such as:
    • blenders,
    • processors,
    • refrigerators and
    • dehydrators;
  • as well as construction material, so that the store we rent in the center of the city becomes the trans cultural space and eclectic, but welcoming, that we idealized.

We will be eternally grateful for your collaboration to our store!

PRECISAMOS DE FINANCIAMENTO para comprar o material necessário para o espaço, especialmente:

  • equipamentos de cozinha, tais como: liquidificadores, processadores, frigoríficos e desidratadores; 
  • bem como material de construção, para que a loja se torne o espaço transcultural e ecléctico, mas acolhedor, que idealizamos.

 

With our unique perks, you can have a variety of products or services in our World Tavern, to enjoy a unique experience with our fantastic team and space. You´ll have available: 

  • detox programs with personalized counseling - improve your health and beauty - Inside & outside;
  • rawfood products, juices, chocolates, ice cream and a great variety of snaks and desserts, 100% healthy - 0% fault;
  • courses and worshops for a greater awareness on health;
  • a brunch on a sunny sunday morning in our loving city Braga, in Portugal! 
  • or a a purifying and relaxing retreat in the midst of nature, in a beautiful 
    property in Arcos de Valdevez. 
  • And finally health coaching for one year, for one-on-one counseling, to maximize your health potential. 

Come meet us, our culture, our people, our human warmth and fall in love ...

Be healthy Inside & Outside!

 

COMO NOS PODE AJUDAR? 

 AO COMPRAR uma variedade de produtos ou serviços (PERKS) para, posteriormente poder desfrutar de uma experiência única com nossa fantástica equipa na nossa Taberna do Mundo. Desta forma, teremos um adiantamento do capital para podermos utilizar a curto prazo na abertura da loja.  

Assim sendo, tem à sua disposição:

  • smooth smoothie - um smoothie funcional  à sua escolha por 5€;
  • raw meal - uma refeição raw à sua escolha por 10€;
  • a sunny sunday brunch - um brunch servido ao domingo, com muito amor e carinho! Com alimentos deliciosos, mas 100% saudáveis; 
  • um plano detox In & Out de 1 dia por 50€, e 3 dias por 100€ , com aconselhamento personalizado - melhore sua saúde e beleza - In & Out;
  • um retiro de 2 dias purificador e relaxante no meio da natureza, numa bela propriedade em Arcos de Valdevez, por 250€;
  • E, finalmente, acompanhamento de health coach por um ano, para maximizar seu potencial de saúde, por 500€.

Estaremos eternamente gratas pela sua colaboração para a nossa loja.

Minimal Risk

We have a strong pre-launch campaign response and fully expect to reach our target. If we do not, we will be able to rent a smaller store, less employees and less equipment. 

in January 2018, we will launch the online sales site with home delivery service, which will allow better disclosure of our products and services.
The workshops and retreats will also be promoted in a rented space, so we can start spreading awareness!

We will also promote on our youtube channel, raw food recipes and natural health cares. 

RISCO MÍNIMO

Nós estamos fortemente empenhadas na abertura da nossa loja. Se não alcançarmos o nosso objectivo  nesta campanha, alugaremos uma loja menor, e com menos equipamentos.

Em janeiro de 2018, lançaremos o site e-commerce, com vendas on-line com serviço de entrega em domicílio, o que permitirá uma melhor divulgação de nossos produtos e serviços.

As oficinas e os retiros também serão promovidos num espaço alugado, para começarmos a espalhar consciência!

Também promoveremos no nosso canal do Youtube, receitas de rawfood e cuidados de saúde naturais para uma maior divulgação.

 

The Impact

Health , sustainability, environment, awareness towards to the world, to us and to our relationships, are important values to us. We want to contribute to a balanced life based on our sharing about the world and in this world.

In the kitchen we’ll consciously seek to use local, organic and ethical products wherever possible, we’ll try to minimize waste, and it will be separated and recycled and we’ll develop relationships with our suppliers to support our environmental efforts. By reducing the consumption of products from other locations, we want to avoid the environmental costs of transport and storage, by reducing animal consumption, we reduce the significant environmental impact this industry represents and by using organic food wherever possible, we prevent the continued use of pesticides that harm our health, air and soil. 

O IMPACTO

Saúde, sustentabilidade, meio ambiente, conscienlização para o mundo, para nós e para nossos relacionamentos, são valores importantes para nós. Queremos contribuir para uma vida equilibrada baseada no nossa partilha sobre o mundo e neste mundo.

Na cozinha, procuraremos usar produtos locais, orgânicos e éticos sempre que possível, tentaremos minimizar o desperdício e será separado e reciclado. Desenvolveremos relacionamentos com nossos fornecedores para que apoiem os nossos esforços ambientais. Ao reduzir o consumo de produtos de outros locais, queremos evitar os custos ambientais de transporte e armazenamento. Reduzindo o consumo de animais, reduzimos o impacto ambiental significativo que representa esta indústria e, sempre que possível, utilizamos alimentos orgânicos, evitamos o uso contínuo de pesticidas que prejudicam nossa saúde, ar e solo.

With love, Inside & Outside!

 

Help us spreading our will and our love!  

If you believe in: Education for Health; Disease Prevention; Natural Life Style, Raw Food advantages;  Detox importance; Healthy Places/Bars without alcohol, coffee, dairy products and sugar;  Places where cultural exchange happens in a cozy environment with art and music.

In this Christmas time, please donate and help bringing this innovation project to the city of Braga in Portugal. 

Ajude-nos a espalhar nossa vontade e nosso amor!

Se você acredita em: Educação para a Saúde; Prevenção de doença; Estilo de Vida Natural, benefícios da Raw Food; importância doo Detox ; Locais / bares saudáveis ​​sem álcool, café, produtos lácteos e açúcar; Lugares onde a troca cultural ocorre em um ambiente aconchegante com arte e música.

Neste época Festiva, faça o seu donativo comprando um dos nossos produtos, e ajude a trazer este projeto de inovação para a cidade de Braga!

 

Some people can't contribute, but you can help if you share our story and will  with your personal friends and social media community. Hit up all the Indiegogo share tools included here. 

Algumas pessoas não podem contribuir, mas podem ajudar partilhando a nossa história com sua comunidade de amigos e redes sociais. 

 

"When you intersect a lot of curiosity, passion and drive, you can come up with something truly incredible. Maybe some people define that as genius."

"Quando se junta muita curiosidade, paixão e impulso, pode-se encontrar algo realmente incrível. Talvez algumas pessoas definam isso como um génio".

Austin Russell

 

Thank you so much for supporting this project! 

We look forward to your visit!


Muito obrigado por apoiar este projeto!

Esperamos sua visita!

And considering my curious nature I became a self-taught convinced in several areas. Therefore, I became a health coach and holistic therapist.
I love being in touch with nature and having quality time with my kids, enjoy their smiles, their happiness, their inconditional love.

Em janeiro de 2018, lançaremos o site e-commerce, com vendas on-line com serviço de entrega em domicílio, o que permitirá uma melhor divulgação de nossos produtos e serviços. 
As oficinas e os retiros também serão promovidos num espaço alugado, para começarmos a espalhar consciência! 
Também promoveremos no nosso canal do Youtube, receitas de rawfood e cuidados de saúde naturais para uma maior divulgação.

 
The Impact
Health , sustainability, environment, awareness towards to the world, to us and to our relationships, are important values to us. We want to contribute to a balanced life based on our sharing about the world and in this world.
In the kitchen we’ll consciously seek to use local, organic and ethical products wherever possible, we’ll try to minimize waste, and it will be separated and recycled and we’ll develop relationships with our suppliers to support our environmental efforts. By reducing the consumption of products from other locations, we want to avoid the environmental costs of transport and storage, by reducing animal consumption, we reduce the significant environmental impact this industry represents and by using organic food wherever possible, we prevent the continued use of pesticides that harm our health, air and soil. 
O IMPACTO
Saúde, sustentabilidade, meio ambiente, conscienlização para o mundo, para nós e para nossos relacionamentos, são valores importantes para nós. Queremos contribuir para uma vida equilibrada baseada no nossa partilha sobre o mundo e neste mundo. 
Na cozinha, procuraremos usar produtos locais, orgânicos e éticos sempre que possível, tentaremos minimizar o desperdício e será separado e reciclado. Desenvolveremos relacionamentos com nossos fornecedores para que apoiem os nossos esforços ambientais. Ao reduzir o consumo de produtos de outros locais, queremos evitar os custos ambientais de transporte e armazenamento. Reduzindo o consumo de animais, reduzimos o impacto ambiental significativo que representa esta indústria e, sempre que possível, utilizamos alimentos orgânicos, evitamos o uso contínuo de pesticidas que prejudicam nossa saúde, ar e solo.
With love, Inside & Outside!

 
Help us spreading our will and our love!  

If you believe in: Education for Health; Disease Prevention; Natural Life Style, Raw Food advantages;  Detox importance; Healthy Places/Bars without alcohol, coffee, dairy products and sugar;  Places where cultural exchange happens in a cozy environment with art and music.
In this Christmas time, please donate and help bringing this innovation project to the city of Braga in Portugal. 
Ajude-nos a espalhar nossa vontade e nosso amor!
Se você acredita em: Educação para a Saúde; Prevenção de doença; Estilo de Vida Natural, benefícios da Raw Food; importância doo Detox ; Locais / bares saudáveis ​​sem álcool, café, produtos lácteos e açúcar; Lugares onde a troca cultural ocorre em um ambiente aconchegante com arte e música.
Neste época Festiva, faça o seu donativo comprando um dos nossos produtos, e ajude a trazer este projeto de inovação para a cidade de Braga!

 
Some people can't contribute, but you can help if you share our story and will  with your personal friends and social media community. Hit up all the Indiegogo share tools included here. 
Algumas pessoas não podem contribuir, mas podem ajudar partilhando a nossa história com sua comunidade de amigos e redes sociais. 

 "When you intersect a lot of curiosity, passion and drive, you can come up with something truly incredible. Maybe some people define that as genius.""Quando se junta muita curiosidade, paixão e impulso, pode-se encontrar algo realmente incrível. Talvez algumas pessoas definam isso como um génio".Austin Russell Thank you so much for supporting this project! We look forward to your visit!Muito obrigado por apoiar este projeto! Esperamos sua visita!

story:
Short Summary

Olaleye Fasilat Abeni is currently diagnosed of Renal failure, Diabetes and Hypertension at the Critical Care Unit(CCU) at the Lagos State University Teaching Hospital(LASUTH) Lagos, Nigeria. She is in a very critical life challenging situation presently as shes on Dialysis and Life Support Machine. Fasilat needs an emergency Kidney Transplant. She is a passionate woman and we believe nothing is too small to help her survive this situation.

What We Need

Olaleye Fasilat needs a sum of 5.5 million Naira (about $15,500) for kidney transplant and 1.5 million Naira ($4,500) for clinical test, medications and other hospital bills.

The Impact

By contributing to this project, you can help save a life. 

No amount of money is too small to save a life, any amount is welcomed. If any challenges is faced with this link, contributors can kindly pay in through this Bank Account to help save a life.

BANK NAME: Access Bank Nigeria

SWIFT CODE: ABNGNGL

ACCOUNT NAME: Mr Latin Foundation

ACCOUNT NUMBER: 0065233641

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people are willing to help with money but they do not have the opportunity. However, you can also help by praying for her and sharing this link to the world.

story:
Zenfinite Meditaiton Lounge is our creation to share our experiences about meditation. We have enjoyed this journey - it has benefited our emotional well-being and enriched our lives. We realized there may be uncertainty and challenge surrounding meditation to some. In meditation, what we see a need for is education, a clear & simple understanding towards a stronger foundation for people to grow from. It comes down to the basic concept of being mindful of the present and enjoying it. We decided to create a modern and zenful space to make meditation approachable to everyone.

Zenfinite Meditation Lounge believes in:

  • Modernizing Meditation – It is for everyone and can be approached in a graceful way, it is based on science regardless of religion and tradition.
  • Efficiency - Meditation is very much an individual journey, but the path is easier with the assistance of guided and group meditation.
  • ​Empower – Understanding of the mind enables self-sensing and stimulates creativity, leading to an elevated and fulfilled life.
  • Balanced – Meditation is complementary to fitness and exercise. One trains the body, the other trains the brain.
  • Zen – A place for people to be:  Open-Minded, Authentic, Inspired, Soul-search, to Infinitely develop & share.  

We designed the ambiance to as soon as a zenfiniter approaches the doorway the mind knows it is the time & place to slow down... Once inside the reception area, their senses are heightened - Sight, Smell, Taste, Touch, Sound... The main meditation room offers the comfort to help you relax & ease into a practice or state of meditation. Our notable guides offer classes, workshops, & events that will share various meditation techniques that help to exercise & to lead zenfiniters on their meditation journey. We would be delighted to see Zenfiniters find the meditation technique that best suits them & begin to experience the benefits from it. Zenfinite Meditation Lounge is a place for people to relax, reflect, & spend time with incredible teachers in a relaxing setting. To take a little break from our modern day lives, leaving recharged & a little more insightful to hopefully live everyday life a little better. An everyday learning & wellness destination.

Some examples of our services...

MINDFULNESS

This is designed to introduce you to the world of meditation. Mindfulness is about sharing with you ways to be in the present and prepares your mind and body to engage in meditation. The goal is to be more aware of your sensations, feelings, and thoughts to the level of your comfort.  Over time this becomes easier and at some point may even be second nature.

SOUND

Sound meditation is fun and entertaining! The goal is to get to a subconscious level where you can really release stress. It is a multi-sensory experience where your body harmonizes with the rhythms and vibrations, as your brain synchronizes with the tunes it reaches a heightened state of consciousness and deep meditation. It is in a very relaxing setting where most people lie down or sit comfortably, your mind and body is massaged with resonating sounds in various frequencies. Most people walk away more insightful and recharged.

NIDRA

Commonly referred to as “Sleep Meditation”, Nidra meditation allows you to reach a deep state of relaxation and inner awareness while still maintaining consciousness.  It is often practiced in a totally relaxing environment, lying down in a comfortable position to help you get into a fully restful and blissful manner. Our guides speak with a deep and calming voice, touching your soul while instilling a sense of internal peace. Nidra meditation is a powerful technique to relax your mind and body - It is beneficial in deep cleansing your mind from busy and contradictory thoughts, and is known to reduce tension and anxiety as well as physical pain healing.

And More…

Brands we feature:

Our Spot:

We are nestled within the Village at La Floresta, a brand new master plan community in Brea, California.  Our location is steps away from Wholefoods Market.  We love the freshness and the high energy that is present in this up and coming neighborhood, and can't wait to be a part of it!

About Us:

Zenfinite Meditation Lounge is co-founded by Isaac and Cynthia.

Isaac:  My family is first generation immigrants to the US. Both my parents had to work long hours, therefore I became a latchkey kid early on in life. Having to be independent at a young age built character and instilled some good qualities into me: being self-reliant and self-disciplined to name a few.

But alongside came some other qualities – such as anxiety and a lack of sense of belonging. I struggled with those feelings most of my life, tried various things to hide and overcome them. I have travelled the world to explore and experience ways people deal with life. Then meditation found me. Turned out, all I had to do was learn to look inward and listen.

I have a strong background in business, having worked over fifteen years in operations management for Fortune 500 companies.

Cynthia:  I was born into a family intertwined in a multitude of difficult issues. I am grateful I found meditation at a young age… to find that STILLNESS within. I have also wandered the world soaking in all its’ beauty… collecting moments. I invite you to be a part of our little space in the urban city… to take a break from modern day life… to have a moment to zen out.

As a kid, I ran around my family's hotel business, grew up watching & eventually involved in the many departments a hotel encompasses - from reception to housekeeping to restaurants to shops to warehouse to entertainment.

At Zenfinite Meditation Lounge, I have combined my experience in hospitality and the art & science of nature to create an ambiance & an experience that our zenfiniters can feel supported in our meditation space.


Our beginning...

We were asked: “So, you want to start a business venture…”  “What is it going to be?”  “A Meditation Lounge?  What is that?” “Can you make a living on that?” “Why meditation?”

A myriad of questions our friends asked (and frankly, we asked ourselves) when they first hear about what we are trying to do.  The answers weren’t clear at first, but it felt right within our hearts… and we trusted it.  Soon the answers did become clear to us - things started to fall in place, and people came into our lives at the right time. We are very grateful for all the support and words of encouragement, and are truly thankful for those who are helping to make this dream of ours a reality.

So, the answers to the questions in the beginning of this post:

What is a Meditation Lounge?  Simply put, it is a fresh take on meditation.  We want to create a simple, sophisticated, and modern environment for people to meditate. 

Make a living?  Sure! Well, we hope so. It is more about having the right balance in life. Life experiences have taught us that success comes in more than one flavor. It is not always about bottom lines, profit margins, or LCV-CAC > 0… although it helps to have those numbers to be positive.

Why meditation?  We have benefited ourselves from it, and have witnessed how it has benefited others.   We believe in it, and we know that it is a place with people we would enjoy spending our time in and growing with.

Our journey began in 2016 when we came across an opportunity to secure a place in an upcoming brand new community in Brea, California.  It’s quite exciting to see construction under way, and week after week we can see our place gradually coming together.  It is an indescribable feeling of seeing gradually the building taking shape into 3D from what we have envisioned based on a floor plan. Now we are finally able to physically see the amount of space we get to work with to create our mediation lounge. 

With any entrepreneurial venture the feeling of unknown is both exciting and uneasy.  You’re never sure if you’re making the right decisions... That’s the uneasy part. In fact you can guarantee that some of your choices will be wrong.  It’s a journey that allows you to learn about yourself and those around you. Soon you realize that the more you are true to yourself and to your beliefs, the more clearly the path becomes - opportunities and possibilities start to grow… That’s the exciting part. 

Fast forward to August 2017…  We are almost ready for launch!  This year has been all about learning… about all aspects of entrepreneurship, human emotions, & each other. We’ve gone through waves of ups and downs – emotional swings at various times between excitement and frustration, from being doubtful to being inspired. 

Looking back at the year, we realized we have already gained so much from this.  Our most treasured gains are the relationships we so luckily have been able to make. People have been mysteriously showing up at seemingly perfect moments into our lives.  We are very grateful to you all, and look forward to making more connections in the coming years.

story:
Update: We're running a referral contest, so you can receive free prizes just by sharing our campaign and getting people to donate! All you have to do is use the share features to the right of the "Back It" button so we can track your progress.

 

Who I Am and What I Am Doing

Hello, my name is Andrew Bundy, author with a Doctorate of Cancer and Cure Surviving from the University of Hard Knocks. I'm asking for your help to spread awareness about the hidden side of cancer, what it really means to be a cancer survivor. Using my memoir, Surviving the Cure: Cancer was Easy*, Living is Hard, I am working to show the public the challenges that many survivors face. In a frank, yet humorous way, I share experiences that the vast majority of survivors have dealt with in one way, shape, or form—just all rolled into one battered individual. 

*(relatively speaking)

After surviving cancer, and nearly having the treatments kill me, I learned the surprising truth millions of other survivors have had sprung upon them: that the cost of surviving is far greater than you knew. For me, it was rapid weight gain, mental and emotional trauma, and a degenerative bone disease for which the only cure was joint replacements to name a few. And these struggles—physically, mentally, and emotionally—are unfortunately very common amongst survivors.

 

Praise for Surviving the Cure: Cancer was Easy,* Living is Hard

See what doctors and survivors are saying about Andrew's story and advocacy efforts

“Andrew Bundy's captivating memoir has an unexpected focus seldom explored in the story of cancer: survivorship. 

Complications that follow a bone marrow transplant can be brutal. Andrew invites us into the intimate, deeply private struggle of coming to terms with life after cancer - a time rife with frustration for a young man hungry for independence that feels out of reach. With humor and candor Andrew sends a powerful message about the significant medical and emotional issues that shape life after treatment and illuminates the critical need for programs that support young cancer survivors…I was deeply moved reading the entirety of his experience from this intimate perspective and am inspired by his resilient spirit."

Anna Pawlowska, MD

Director, Pediatric Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Program

City of Hope

 

“Holy @#*!, [Andrew’s] story is almost EXACTLY my own. And [his] thoughts and feelings. Gave me chills. It is incredible to know there is someone out there that COMPLETELY understands.”

Acute Myeloid Leukemia Survivor

 

“[Andrew] put into words what I was feeling. I'm in remission but will be on oral chemo indefinitely. I am a survivor, but the battle's not over. Life is not the same as before.”

Chronic Myeloid Leukemia Survivor

 

How You Can Help

Your donations help with my advocacy efforts to spread awareness about the struggles of cancer survivors and to ensure they get the quality of care they need to lead meaningful and fulfilling lives. There are several different approaches to raise awareness. Your donations will help with the marketing, publicity, expenses, design, travel, and supplies for:

  • Sharing my story through my memoir
  • Giving talks about the challenges survivors face
  • Community outreach to survivors
  • Advocacy for centralized care for survivors to improve quality of life

Be sure to click on one of perks to the side to receive prizes for donating! You can get free ebooks, signed copies of the memoir, and even be thanked in a special page in the next edition of the book!

You can help beyond donating

If you want to do more than donate, you can help further by sharing this campaign with your friends, family, family’s friends, family’s friends’ dogwalkers, strangers, or the Internet at large—I’m not picky. And you can earn prizes just for sharing!

Even if our goal isn’t reached, it will still have helped get the message out to the public, and have worked toward helping the tens of millions of survivors whose lives can be improved by spreading the truth about post-cancer living. Prizes will be upheld whether we meet our goal or not.

Thank you to all of those who have donated, and to those who have shared the message and campaign online and with others. Every little bit makes a difference.

 

Want to Learn More?

Visit the official Surviving the Cure Website, and keep up on progress on our Facebook page and blog.

story:
About me

I am Cat Matlock, Founder and Director of the West Asheville Yoga Studio and The Embodiment Center in downtown Asheville, NC.  I have practiced yoga for 30 years, taught for 15 years, and run the West Asheville Yoga Studio for 11 years.  I am also a Licensed Massage Therapist, with 25 years of experience, specializing in Trigger Point Therapy for Chronic Pain.  I developed UNWIND Therapeutics over the last 5 years which instructs people how to effectively use foam rollers and therapy balls to release binding and tension in their tissues to eliminate pain in their own bodies.  Over the years I have worked with tens of thousands of clients and students.  I am a volunteer yoga instructor for Light A Path, an organization providing yoga, dance, running, and other classes to youth at risk, the incarcerated, and the homeless populations in our area.  I am on the team offering yoga to incarcerated women in our community, supported by my training as a 500 hr Advanced Instructor of Therapeutic Yoga, Trauma Informed Yoga Therapy, and my certification as an Overcome Anxiety Clinic provider.  I have a YouTube Channel with videos teaching people how to work on themselves to alleviate their pain.

                 

 

West Asheville Yoga: Service and Success

I developed the West Asheville Yoga Studio with a heart of service and have successfully run this studio which began as the first sliding-scale affordable yoga studio in Asheville.  It was also the first Certified Living Wage yoga studio in our area.  During the last 11 years we have run many fundraisers for local and global organizations, offered programs in Community Resiliency Model subsidized by WAVL Yoga, stuffed backpacks with essential items for the homeless in our community, and annually run a “Sponsor A Foster Child for Christmas” program through which we sponsor 10-15% of all Foster children in Buncombe County with gifts for the Holidays.  We have done all of that through this tiny one room yoga studio.  

 

Expansion of the Vision

For years I have dreamed of expanding our programs to include Yoga for Recovery, Trauma Informed Yoga Therapy, and offering programs and trainings to help people to reduce anxiety and stress to live better, healthier, and more peaceful lives.   

I knew I needed a larger space to expand our service.  Earlier this year I was presented with the opportunity to purchase a large yoga center, One Center Yoga, and I took over August 1.  I now have a big, beautiful Yoga and Wellness Center and need financial support to assist growing the Center and development of new programs.  

 

Founded in Yogic Teachings

The root of The Embodiment Center is the Koshas (Sheaths), teachings from yogis texts called The Upanishads.  In this view of humans, we are 5 layered beings.  The outermost layer is our physical human body.  One layer in is our “sheath” of breath and energy.  Just deep to that is the layer of the mind, our thoughts and feelings.  Deeper still is our “intellect,” our core beliefs about ourselves and the world.   Our innermost layer is our core of radiant light and joy.  I believe that we use the practices of yoga, forgiveness, dance, meditation, etc to clear blockages in our outer 4 layers so that our inner radiance shines more brightly.  When we are resting in that inner radiance, we experience more joy, peace, and love.  From that experience, we shine that Light outwards into our families and communities with service, patience, and kindness.  

 

 

To grow this Center, rooted in deep yogic teachings and standing in service, we need help with the following:

1- HVAC work in the facility

2- Plumbing upgrades

3- Sound proofing and sound system

4- Redesign and restructure of the retail space to include dedicated area for program support

5- Video and sound equipment for developing online programs

6- Sponsorship of Trauma Informed Yoga Therapy training participants

7- Sponsorship of Community Resiliency Model participants

8- Sponsorship of Yoga for Recovery Program so we can offer these courses by donation

9- Sponsorship of Overcome Anxiety Clinic participants 

10- Marketing support to build our clientele for a broader base of paying clients to support the Center

My dream list would include an additional $50,000 to pay off the remaining debt of purchasing One Center Yoga so that I could move forward without the strain of that financial burden.  

 

Your Support and Perks

Your support will help us to do the infrastructure work that is needed and assist the development of programs that directly serve our local, and global, community.  Our perks include a minor donation and a heartfelt “thank you!,”  

an intimate concert with Leah Song from Rising Appalachia,

music, assistance from chronic hip and sciatica pain with an online course that I am developing, and more.  Please check them out below and pick your favorite way to support this vision of a Yoga Center founded in the old teachings of yoga coupled with modern neuroscience to offer a safe place for people to find their way back to their Light.

If you don't have money but want to help us, please contact us through Embody Yoga Asheville.com and we can put you to work distributing and posting flyers, doing mailings, assembling the storage cabinets when we get them, etc.  THANK YOU

story:
The mompreneurs of Barski Vail Designs, LLC

It's amazing what can happen when a nurse and a Child Life Specialist team up! Karen Barski, RN and Chelsea Vail, CCLS both know the power of a tight swaddle. Karen saw how comforted her babies were by the peanut-shaped, 360 degree swaddle sack she sewed in her own home ten years ago. She later patented this design and it became known as the Woombie, helping over a million babies sleep safely through the night.

Meanwhile Chelsea, a child therapist, saw a correlation between a history of hospitalization, or separation from caregivers, and attachment and behavioral isues later in life. She knew swaddling aided in psychosocial care and promoted a sense of trust during infancy (an important building block for secure attachment), but she knew many babies are still left unswaddled, especially in hospitals. This had to change!

She reached back into her experiences as a Child Life Specialist and together, she and Karen designed Woombie Med Pods for hospitalized infants that work around medical devices. All of their designs meet the needs of specific patient populations and are offered in micropreemie, preemie and newborn sizes. Finally, these babies can be swaddled for warmth, comfort, and security, even during hospitalization!

  • Woombie Bili Pods allow 98% of phototherapy light to reach the skin.
  • Woombie Gastro Pods allow quick access to the midsection for babies with colostomy bags, g-buttons, umbilical cord complications, or gastroschisis. 
  • Woombie Med Pod provides safe sleep, promotes healthy hips, provides flexion, and allows space for central lines, leads, and drains.
  • Woombie Trach Pods support babies with trachs, vents, post-operative cardiac needs, and more. 

Many Hospitals Lack Budget for Developmental Care Products

Despite the many benefits of Woombie Med Pods for these tiny patients, we're discovering that many hospitals simply don't have the funding for developmental care products.

Currently, they're using blankets to swaddle babies but...

  • Blankets come loose and can become a SIDS risk
  • Blankets don't provide boundaries for security & flexion (muscle tone)
  • Blankets need to be wrapped/unwrapped which can be overstimulating to a neonate and increase trauma from hospitalization
  • Blankets don't work around medical devices, therefore many babies are left unswaddled
  • Blankets can't be used for "bili babies" because phototherapy can't reach the skin

Hospitals rely primarily on sponsorships and donations which is why we need your help! We want to send Woombie Med Pods to children's hospitals and mother/baby units in need across the US!

The Impact

Your contribution will change the lives of these babies and their caregivers and decrease the risks of physical, mental, and emotional impairment from hospitalization. Changing those first few months of life for the better will set these babies on the path to becoming healthy, happy kids. Sponsoring a Woombie Med Pod is the first step towards changing the way babies in the hospitals are cared for, therefore we're changing the world for the better one baby at a time. 

Money raised during this campaign will provide Woombie Med Pods for hospitals with insufficent funds, get Karen and Chelsea to conferences to promote the value of these products, and start the wave for global change in infant care.

Help Spread the Word

We know sometimes the heart wants more than the wallet allows, especially when it comes to supporting a cause you're passionate about. If you can't sponsor a Woombie Med Pod for a baby in need, help us by spreading the word about our products and campaign.

  • Talk about these with friends and family!
  • Post a link to our Indiegogo page on social media!
  • Follow us on youtube, Facebook, instagram, and twitter and interact with our posts!
  • Tell your friends in the medical industry about the many benefits of Woombie Med Pods!

Woombie Med Pods WEBSITE

story:
Community Development, Advanced Education, & Clinical Innovation in Mental Health 

Hello!

We are the Institute for the Development of Human Arts, a community of mental health clinicians, psychiatrists, peer workers, advocates, artists, and survivors of trauma and adversity, who are interested in exploring the link between personal and societal transformation. We understand that it is time for a new paradigm in mental health: one that does not deny anyone their right to self-determination and healing, one that accounts for the complexity of personal, social, and collective traumas and oppressions, one that opens up our narrow definition of "normal" for the full range of human experience, and allows us to look beyond medicalized and disease-centered thinking to more regenerative, holistic, and transformative practices.

We believe that change happens through dynamic collaboration between clinicians in the field and advocates on the frontlines dedicated to shifting policy and practice while at the same time helping to build and uplift safe alternatives. To do this, we create opportunities for critical dialogue, mutual support, and advanced education and training for those in the field. Join us as we launch our first course series to the public:

Re-Thinking Crisis: An Introduction to Transformative Mental Health Care

The IDHA community is offering a unique opportunity for mental health workers of all kinds in the Greater New York City area to learn from a team of esteemed practitioners and experts by experience. We've seen and experienced the more traditional mental health training programs, and we're dedicated to offering something different, to proliferating new understanding by challenging the dominant models and highlighting the voices of those with lived experience and first-hand knowledge. Our classes will survey topics such as :

  • Examples of Alternative Practice,
  • Media, Marketing & Meds,
  • Human Rights and Systems of Power, 
  • and more!

Together, we will explore ground-breaking research, theory and practices, first-person perspectives, and cross-cultural evidence supporting the need for more transformative models of care.  We are here to pave the way for new and innovative approaches by increasing the number of mental health workers, family members, and survivors who are trained in these methods and can build communities of transformative practice in their own ways. 

Join Forces and Equalize Access!

At IDHA one of our primary goals is to Equalize Access, which means: We recognize that access to quality mental health care, opportunity, and education is not equal across society. Therefore we work to promote access to our offerings through financial scholarships, access for people with disabilities, and through our outreach methods. 

It's important to us that we offer our classes and trainings to everyone, regardless of class, race, gender, sexuality, ability, nationality, and individual experiences of mental health. However, in order to make our training available and accessible for all, we need YOUR support. We hope to offer over 10 full scholarship positions and have already enrolled students at our reduced rate. In order to cover our costs and pay for our faculty, staff, course materials, free community events, and outreach, we aim to raise a total of $7,000 before the start of our course. To break it down:

  • $5,000 will provide 10 students with access to our full 8-week course (at $500 per student) 
  • $2,000 will support IDHA's operating costs AND allow us to continue to offer free events to the public and other online networking opportunities to those who cannot take the full course or attend in person.

What You Get

Because we've got such an incredibly diverse and talented set of faculty including: best-selling authors, artists, natural wellness practitioners, counselors, and all around cool folks, we're offering you incredible and exclusive perks including: 

  • Hand-designed IDHA Merch (Stickers and Tote Bags)
  • Handcrafted and individualized Care Package with staff favorites: organic and locally made herbal tinctures, yummy treats, good reads, and other goodies to help you de-stress!
  • Signed copies of best-selling books written by IDHA faculty including: The Hospital Always Wins by Issa Ibrahim and Narrative Psychiatry by Dr. Bradley Lewis, MD, Ph.D
  • A private therapeutic consult with IDHA Co-founders: Dr. Peter Stastny and Jazmine Russell
  • Any of our fall course offerings 
  • AND MORE!

Your Generosity 

Your generosity and support of our project, whether you give $1 or $1,000 or just spread the word to friends and colleagues, will help to not only shift perspectives and practices in the mental health field, but will most importantly help us provide the space for communities to connect and share with each other. The foundation of mental and emotional health is community. We've had so many people tell us that they've been waiting so long for a community like IDHA to come around and give people a chance to learn and grow from each other. It's in this way that we truly support collaboration, understanding, growth, and change.

Keeping the Passion Alive

We know that going against the grain and challenging old systems is difficult and risky, but we've have members who have worked for over 40 years to make change happen both in and outside of the system. And since we began IDHA, we've been hearing and seeing that folks are ready for change. We had such amazing turnout at our prior Launch Event in June and Networking Potluck in August, with folks gathering from all around the Tri-State area from mental health organizations such as The Icarus Project - NYC, St. Louis and Philadelphia, Community Access, Howie The Harp, Hearing Voices Network, ACT teams throughout the city, Parachute NYC, and more! We continue to check in with local communities in NYC and supporters like you to ensure that IDHA offers the kind of trainings, events, and programs that you want to see.

Help us continue to keep the passion alive.
Join the community. 
Spread the word to colleagues, students, peers, family and friends.
Share us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.
Add yourself to our email list to stay updated on events and opportunities.

Go to:  IDHA-NYC.ORG

story:
About Cura Sana and the impact of this campaign

First and foremost I am a mother. Working with the mother instinct of taking care of my children was one of the strongest sources for the creation of these medicines, wanting to bring healing to my own family. I've been working with local plants here in Costa Rica for over 6 years, the business of Cura Sana started about 5 years ago.

The importance of this fundraiser; Cura Sana has already brought health and well-being to a lot of people on this earth, The business is ripe and ready for expansion, for reaching many more people who will benefit from these products. 

The use of herbal remedies is ancient, it is the foundation of medicine as we know it today. These remedies have proved themselves to be beneficial to a wide variety of dis-eases, and by contributing to this campaign it will support the distribution of them far and wide.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order for these medicines to reach far and wide there is a process of registration and certification that needs to take place. This is what the campaign is for; to create the foundation for Cura Sana to distribute freely and without limitation. To register the company alone costs $700 dollars, and the registration of each product is $500-700. There are 12 main products. In order to get the health permits, we also need to have a laboratory that is up to standard with materials and equipment. This is where the money is going. If the goal is not reached, then we will register as many products as possible.

For those of you who have not experienced the gift of Cura Sana products, then this is your opportunity. Everyone can receive something from these products, whether it's on a level of internal or external healing. Whether it's your immune system, your emotions or your skin.

With each level of contribution, you will receive more "perks" (products).

 

 

 

The Impact

The level of healing that these products have already brought to so many families, and anyone who has used them, is what gives me the confidence to reach out for support so that even more people can experience this level of health and wellness. The responses that I receive from the people who purchase these products, are of extreme gratitude for the results that they bring.

When an environment creates an illness nature provides the medicine, and I am in the service of bringing that which nature provides to people far and wide.

 

 

 

Challenges

I have had big chains ask for my products, but was not able to see it through because the business was not registered. Just the registration of Cura Sana and a few of the products will be a big leap in sharing these remedies with the world.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute financially, it would be a huge help for you to use the Indiegogo sharing tools to get the word out. Muchas gracias!

 

Cura Sana's Expansion - Budget Breakdown

Important!

The division above applies to my fundraiser goal of $20,000.

Any additional money raised will go directly towards marketing and media promotion.

For those of you who have not experienced the gift of Cura Sana products, then this is your opportunity. Everyone can receive something from these products, whether it's on a level of internal or external healing. Whether it's your immune system, your emotions or your skin.
With each level of contribution, you will receive more "perks" (products).
 


 
 
The Impact
The level of healing that these products have already brought to so many families, and anyone who has used them, is what gives me the confidence to reach out for support so that even more people can experience this level of health and wellness. The responses that I receive from the people who purchase these products, are of extreme gratitude for the results that they bring.
When an environment creates an illness nature provides the medicine, and I am in the service of bringing that which nature provides to people far and wide.
 


 
 
Challenges
I have had big chains ask for my products, but was not able to see it through because the business was not registered. Just the registration of Cura Sana and a few of the products will be a big leap in sharing these remedies with the world.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you are not able to contribute financially, it would be a huge help for you to use the Indiegogo sharing tools to get the word out. Muchas gracias!
 

Cura Sana's Expansion - Budget Breakdown

Important!
The division above applies to my fundraiser goal of $20,000.
Any additional money raised will go directly towards marketing and media promotion.

story:
"No One Left Behind" is the theme of our campaign because by donating you have the opportunity to help Sponsors Corner save lives, keep families together, and help our clients re-enter main stream society. Sponsors Corner provides a safe community based environment that focuses holistically on the individual, helping them address personal, professional and family issues caused during their addiction. Studies have shown that after a traditional 30 day stay in Rehab, at least 40-60% of people relapse and some experts place that number as high as 90%. Conversely the similar studies have shown that after a 90 day stay in transitional living 70% of those people have remained sober.

  Sponsors Corner is committed to providing an affordable level of care; our monthly fee of approximately $3,000.00 is 60%-70% below what is currently available in the market. Our cost structure fills an urgent need for those many struggling alcoholics and drug addicts who can't or shouldn't go home after 30 days of rehabilitation. In addition, because we believe that everyone deserves a chance at recovery, Sponsors Corner is committed to a minimum scholarship rate of 20% of the beds available.
  After 35 years of putting people first and providing 3,000 clients with a spiritual path to recovery, our roof, furnace, and bedrooms are in disrepair.  We are in urgent need of renovations that will guarantee our survival and enable us to become a premier provider of sober living and transitional services. Along with a group of dedicated Alumni and Friends of Sponsors Corner, we have implemented a plan that will ensure we can thrive. We ask your support in helping us raise $30,000.  We have already achieved over half our goal of $500,000. in the general campaign fund.

  Sponsors Corner sits on 15 acres of beautiful riverbank property. This campaign is part of Phase One, which includes renovating the main house with 17 beds, dining room and meditation room and the admissions office. This phase also includes restoring the gym and open air pavilion. What will we do with $30,000 ? Sponsors Corner  will renovate 10 bedrooms that are waiting to be used by members of our community.

  At the center of Sponsors Corner recovery culture is Bob Sullivan. Bob retired from the NYPD in 1983 and has focused ever since on selflessly carrying the message of recovery and freeing people from the crippling bondage of addiction. Bob has over 35 years of sobriety and is well known and respected throughout the state and espically in the Orange County recovery community, where Bob’s “No One Left Behind” motto is heard daily. Sponsors Corner is a 501c3 non profit established in 2011 has a committed and diverse board, involved both financially and operationally, with representation and expertise from business to wellness.

story:
(For English see below)

Para que puedas experimentar todos los beneficios que tenemos para ti, conoce un poco más de la Sanación Pránica:

 

La Sanación Pránica es un conjunto de técnicas de sanación energética y desarrollo espiritual creadas por Master Choa Kok Sui. Beneficia a las personas en los ámbitos de la salud física, emocional, mental, espiritual, financiera y a nivel de relaciones, entre otros. Se encuentra en más de 80 países alrededor del mundo (http://www.globalpranichealing.com/) y en Colombia lleva más de 20 años ayudando a muchas personas (http://sanacionpranicacolombia.com.co/) 

(Fan Page de Ahimsa: https://www.facebook.com/ahimsasanacionpranica/)

Es utilizada por personas de distintas profesiones como médicos, ingenieros, artistas, entre muchos otros. Gracias a su estructura metodológica, basada en principios, leyes y protocolos, es asequible a todos y sus beneficios han sido comprobados por miles de personas en el mundo.

(VIDEO noticia CM&: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B7dApOCSbGI)

(VIDEO noticiero EEUU: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bEYVnZEpVfU).

La Sanación Pránica actúa directamente sobre el cuerpo energético de la persona, corrigiendo desbalances sin necesidad de contacto físico; y gracias a que el cuerpo energético afecta directamente nuestra salud física, emocional, mental e incluso financiera, se suelen obtener resultados muy positivos.

Queremos contar con tu participación para poder hacer este sueño realidad y lograr que cada vez más personas se beneficien de estas prácticas, ¡comenzando por ti y tus seres queridos!

Tenemos varias recompensas para que escojas la que más se adapte a tus necesidades:

 

RECOMPENSAS

Asistir a las MEDITACIONES grupales:

La Meditación que realizamos se llama Meditación en Corazones Gemelos. Ayuda a desarrollar paz interior, felicidad, claridad mental, mejores relaciones, alivio del estrés y, en general, mejor salud física, emocional y mental. Además es un servicio al planeta, ya que lo armoniza hasta cierto punto al bendecirlo con bondad amorosa.

Aunque esta meditación la puedes practicar en casa con el CD, la potencia de 7 personas meditando en grupo equivale a la de 100 personas meditando separadamente. Por esta razón, lo que más te recomendamos es asistir al grupo de Meditación en Ahimsa.

Las meditaciones son todos los miércoles a las 7 pm en la Calle 147 #14 - 69, Torre 6 Apto 504 (Bogotá, Colombia).

Si escoges una recompensa con meditaciones incluidas te contactaremos para que vengas los miércoles que te queden bien.

 

Recibir TERAPIAS de Sanación Pránica:

Las terapias pueden ser aplicadas para tratar problemas físicos, emocionales, psicológicos, de relaciones, e incluso laborales y financieros. Dependiendo de la naturaleza del problema, se deben aplicar distintos protocolos que pueden involucrar varias sesiones.

También pueden ser utilizadas simplemente para obtener un equilibrio energético y desarrollar una mejor salud en los distintos niveles.

Existen protocolos establecidos para tratar enfermedades físicas de todo tipo; así como para el estrés, la ansiedad, la depresión o cualquier situación emocional y psicológica.

(Lee más sobre qué se puede tratar y cómo funcionan: 

https://www.santiagodemendoza.com/single-post/2017/03/31/%C2%BFQu%C3%A9-hace-Sanaci%C3%B3n-Pr%C3%A1nica)

En las recompensas:

- Escoge recibir 1 terapia de sanación  y en esta tendrás una primer sanación y un diagnóstico de cuál es el tratamiento ideal para ti.

Ó

- Para situaciones emocionales o psicológicas puedes escoger de una vez 2 o 3 sesiones para obtener de una vez resultados más efectivos!

- En casos de enfermedades severas o crónicas y situaciones difíciles, te recomendamos escoger el tratamiento de 10 sesiones ya que este será ideal para obtener los mejores resultados. También puedes escoger recibir una terapia y en esta te diremos cuál sería el tratamiento ideal para ti.

Notas importantes:

* Las Terapias de Sanación se pueden realizar de manera presencial en el centro o a distancia desde cualquier lugar del mundo; su efectividad no se ve afectada por ello. En los dos casos te contactaremos para agendar las citas.

* Tanto las Terapias de Sanación como las Sesiones de Meditación, podrán ser reclamadas por ti (el colaborador) o por alguien que tú elijas. ¡Puede ser un regalo especial para alguien que quieras!

* Si escoges una recompensa que incluya el CD de meditación o un libro, estos deberás recogerlos en el Centro en Bogotá directamente (puede ser cuando vengas a meditar o por las terapias).

*La Sanación Pránica no es una religión ni entra conflicto con ninguna de ellas. Tampoco pretende reemplazar la medicina ortodoxa, sino, más bien, complementarla.

* El centro está localizado en Bogotá, en la Calle 147 #14 - 69 Torre 6 apto 504.

 

¡Te invitamos a que apoyes nuestro proyecto y empieces ya a experimentar los beneficios de la Sanación Pránica! Compártelo con todos tus amigos y cuéntales de nosotros.

También puedes hacer aportes volntarios justo al principio de la página en RESPALDAR!

En Ahimsa, el bienestar es la prioridad.

¡Gracias por tu apoyo!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(English)

Ahimsa - Pranic Heling Center

This project seeks to open a new and ideal space for Ahimsa: A Pranic Healing Center that wants to contribute to the wellbeing of the people in Bogotá, Colombia.

Thru therapies, meditations, and courses on Pranic Healing, Ahimsa has contributed to the wellbeing of many people while operating on shared spaces during the past 5 years. Now the time has come for us to have our own place, and we need your help to achieve our goal. We would like you to help us by experiencing the benefits of Pranic Healing for yourself, and by encouraging others to do the same. (Or you can also make voluntary contributions at the beginig of the page on BACK IT if you want ! We´ll thank you very much!)

First, we invite you to know a little more about Pranic Healing:

(AHIMSA FAN PAGE: https://www.facebook.com/ahimsasanacionpranica/)

 

Pranic Healing is a combination of energetic healing and spiritual development techniques created by Master Choa Kok Sui. It seeks to help people physically emotionally, mentally, spiritually, financially, and in their relationships, amongst others. It is practiced globally in more than 80 countries, (http://www.globalpranichealing.com/) and has been practiced for the last 20 years in Colombia where it has reached many people. (http://sanacionpranicacolombia.com.co/).

It is used by people of different backgrounds and careers such as doctors, engineers and many others. Because of Its methodological structure based on principles, laws, and protocols, Pranic Healing is accessible to everyone, and its benefits have been proven by many people at a national and international level.

(VIDEO News USA: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bEYVnZEpVfU).

Pranic Healing acts directly on the energetic body of the patient. It corrects imbalances (without the need for physical contact), and because of the great influence that the energetic body exerts over our physical, emotional, mental and even financial wellbeing, in most cases it is highly effective.

We want to have you onboard to make this dream come true and have more and more people benefiting from these practices... Starting with you and your loved ones!

We have many different rewards for you, so you can choose whatever suits your needs best.

REWARDS

Coming to our Group MEDITATIONS: 

The meditation we do is called Meditation on Twin Hearts. It helps to develop our inner peace, happiness, mental clarity, improves our relationships, eases stress and improves our physical, emotional and mental health. This meditation is also a blessing to our planet which is harmonized when being blessed by loving kindness.

You can practice this meditation at home with the CD, yet it is much more powerful when practiced in a group. The effect of 7 people meditating in a group is equal to that of 100 meditating separately. This is why we recommend for you to come to our grup meditations at Ahimsa.

Meditations are every Wednesday at 7 pm at Calle 147 #14 - 69, Torre 6 Apto 504 (Bogotá, Colombia).

 

Receiving Pranic Healing THERAPIES:

These therapies can be used to contribute to the ailment of physical, emotional, psychological, and even financial and work-related problems. There are different protocols that apply to each specific problem depending on its nature. Applying these protocols can involve several therapy sessions.

They can also be used simply to obtain energetic balance and to improve health in different levels.

There are established protocols to deal with physical Illnesses of all kinds, as well as for stress, anxiety, depression, or any damaging situation, whether it be physical or psychological.

- You can choose to receive 1 therapy and in this you will receive the first healing and we will tell you which is the ideal treatment for you!

- For emotional or psychological situations you can choose 2 or 3 sessions at once to get more effective results!

- In cases of severe or chronic diseases and difficult situations, we recommend you to choose the treatment of 10 sessions as this will be the ideal to obtain the best results.

NOTES:

*Pranic Healing therapies can be delivered in person or at a distance from any place in the world, their effectiveness is not affected by the way it is delivered.

*Therapies and meditation sessions can be used by the collaborator or any person chosen by him/her. Keep in mind that they can be a great gift!

*If you choose a reward that includes the meditation CD or the book, you should pick them up at the Center in Bogotá directly (it may be when you come to meditate or for the therapies!).

*Our center is located in Bogotá at Calle 147 # 14-69 Torre 6 Apt 504.

*Pranic Healing is not a religion and has no conflict with any of them. It does not pretend to replace traditional medicine, but to complement it.

We invite you to support our project and to start experimenting the benefits that Pranic Healing has to offer! Share it with all your friends and tell them about us!

At Ahimsa, wellbeing is our priority.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

The Brand of ARK Armenia appeared not long ago and very quickly gained popularity in environmental and ecological circles not only in Armenia but also abroad.  ARK has realized a number of projects supported by international donors as well as crowdfunding campaigns and income from ARK Social Entrerprise.

Spheres of ARK's interests are eco tourism, sustainable agriculture,  fitness and healthy lifestyle. 

This is ARK, a small paradise garden, three in one - an Eco Camp, a Rehabilitation Center,  a Premaculture Showcace Garden.

This is Armen, the co-founder of ARK, who turned his health problem into an advantage.

Having lost about 85% of his eyesight because of genetic eye disease, retina degeneration he was able to turn his health problem into an advantage. This brought him to another profession, that of a massage therapist in which he specialized in  Moscow, Yerevan, Sochi. He began with massage then went further to the idea of holistic approach to rehabilitation and recovery.  This approach is based on the idea of recovering the whole organism and includes elements of yoga, pilates, exercises with training apparatus, breathing exercises, healthy food, psychology of healthy lifestyle. Over 10- year practice,  annual advanced qualification courses, more than 8 professional trainings, professional workshops and conferences, having all these in arsenal, Armen is specialized in locomotor apparatus diseases, neurology, recovery after  apoplexy, coronary thrombosis, different kinds of traumas. Now Armen’s clients are from all social clusters,  people who need psychological and rehabilitation help.

 

What We Need & What You Get

With the help of two crowdfunding   campaigns, own funds,  World Vison Armenia and European Union funding Armen has already created place for massage and fitness trainings in ARK Camp Kapan, where one can get a  massage, or train in yoga, pilates or learn to breathe happily enjoying gorgeous view of majestic mount Khustup. But unfortunately, there is lack of training apparatus that makes the rehabilitation process faster and more effective.

 On our way to creating better conditions for harmonic and healthy lifestyle we are taking the next step and launching a new campaign – ARK Holistica. With this campaign we will be able to purchase all necessary equipment for ARK rehabilitation center.

  1. Leg muscles simulator to decrease loading on spine through amortization effect.
  2. Pectoral muscles simulator to improve mobility of thorax that will result in deep and light breathing.
  3. Back muscles simulator to strengthen the muscles of the prelum abdominal  and to facilitate functioning of vertebral column and as a result that of internals.

Training apparatuses need to be placed in an open-air pavilion to protect them from bad weather conditions. All equipment will be installed in ARK Eco Camp Kapan and will grant a chance of recovery and happy life to many people in Kapan as well as ARK guests from Armenia and all over the world.. You can find our detailed budget (here).

 Help us help others

 

We help people, we do it with love, we teach them mechanics of happiness, now we want to buy equipment to be able to help more people.

We’re not asking for a lot. Whether it’s $5 or $500 (or even a share on social media to show your support), whatever you can contribute makes a difference. It’s inspiring what we’ve been able to accomplish already, despite very limited funds, thanks to the help of volunteers, contributors and supporters  from all over the world. That’s the beauty of grassroots movements like this one, every little bit counts. Now, we are inviting you to be a part of it, in whatever way you can. Support ARK  and help us realize a project so many people need, support ARK and get rehabilitation programs for yourself or make a priceless present for your nearest and dearest. Join us!

Donate today and spARK hope in people's hearts!
story_txt:
Short Summary
The Brand of ARK Armenia appeared not long ago and very quickly gained popularity in environmental and ecological circles not only in Armenia but also abroad.  ARK has realized a number of projects supported by international donors as well as crowdfunding campaigns and income from ARK Social Entrerprise.
Spheres of ARK's interests are eco tourism, sustainable agriculture,  fitness and healthy lifestyle. 
This is ARK, a small paradise garden, three in one - an Eco Camp, a Rehabilitation Center,  a Premaculture Showcace Garden.
This is Armen, the co-founder of ARK, who turned his health problem into an advantage. 
Having lost about 85% of his eyesight because of genetic eye disease, retina degeneration he was able to turn his health problem into an advantage. This brought him to another profession, that of a massage therapist in which he specialized in  Moscow, Yerevan, Sochi. He began with massage then went further to the idea of holistic approach to rehabilitation and recovery.  This approach is based on the idea of recovering the whole organism and includes elements of yoga, pilates, exercises with training apparatus, breathing exercises, healthy food, psychology of healthy lifestyle. Over 10- year practice,  annual advanced qualification courses, more than 8 professional trainings, professional workshops and conferences, having all these in arsenal, Armen is specialized in locomotor apparatus diseases, neurology, recovery after  apoplexy, coronary thrombosis, different kinds of traumas. Now Armen’s clients are from all social clusters,  people who need psychological and rehabilitation help.
 
What We Need & What You Get
With the help of two crowdfunding   campaigns, own funds,  World Vison Armenia and European Union funding Armen has already created place for massage and fitness trainings in ARK Camp Kapan, where one can get a  massage, or train in yoga, pilates or learn to breathe happily enjoying gorgeous view of majestic mount Khustup. But unfortunately, there is lack of training apparatus that makes the rehabilitation process faster and more effective.

 On our way to creating better conditions for harmonic and healthy lifestyle we are taking the next step and launching a new campaign – ARK Holistica. With this campaign we will be able to purchase all necessary equipment for ARK rehabilitation center.

Leg muscles simulator to decrease loading on spine through amortization effect.
Pectoral muscles simulator to improve mobility of thorax that will result in deep and light breathing.
Back muscles simulator to strengthen the muscles of the prelum abdominal  and to facilitate functioning of vertebral column and as a result that of internals.

Training apparatuses need to be placed in an open-air pavilion to protect them from bad weather conditions. All equipment will be installed in ARK Eco Camp Kapan and will grant a chance of recovery and happy life to many people in Kapan as well as ARK guests from Armenia and all over the world.. You can find our detailed budget (here).
 Help us help others
 
We help people, we do it with love, we teach them mechanics of happiness, now we want to buy equipment to be able to help more people.
We’re not asking for a lot. Whether it’s $5 or $500 (or even a share on social media to show your support), whatever you can contribute makes a difference. It’s inspiring what we’ve been able to accomplish already, despite very limited funds, thanks to the help of volunteers, contributors and supporters  from all over the world. That’s the beauty of grassroots movements like this one, every little bit counts. Now, we are inviting you to be a part of it, in whatever way you can. Support ARK  and help us realize a project so many people need, support ARK and get rehabilitation programs for yourself or make a priceless present for your nearest and dearest. Join us!
Donate today and spARK hope in people's hearts!

story:
Can't seem to get the vid to load :(
But you can check out this Earthing video here https://youtu.be/Z4F8mterVGE
 
 
 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need at least $5000 more to secure desired funding. We really want to be able to open with all features of the spa ready to go.
  • We already have over $16 000 in assets and another $15 000 available for down payment. We have the perfect building in mind and minimal renovations are needed. We have contacted all suppliers and have them ready to ship out the equipment as soon as we give them the go! We have done our research, put in countless hours and know we are ready to move forward and make this a reality!
  • In exchange for your support you will receive some awesome perks (like a float, access to our Automated Spa, discounts on products & services and more!!) and you will be helping make my dreams come true :)

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • We need at least $5000 more to secure desired funding. We really want to be able to open with all features of the spa ready to go.
  • We already have over $16 000 in assets and another $15 000 available for down payment. We have the perfect building in mind and minimal renovations are needed. We have contacted all suppliers and have them ready to ship out the equipment as soon as we give them the go! We have done our research, put in countless hours of
  • In exchange for your support you will receive some awesome perks and you will be helping make my dreams come true!

Risks & Challenges

There are many risks and challenges that come with opening a Spa, and we do not take any of them lightly. Our biggest challenge at this time is going to be familiarizing ourselves with Health regulations and being sure we are all up to code in each area. The next largest challenge will be sorting out the logistics of the operations: the 24-hour access, rules and regulations for members/clients and practitioners, liability waivers, etc. We have a pretty good handle on how our systems will work and are not shy about enlisting the proper professionals when needed. Aside from those, the next biggest challenge will be learning to run and maintain the different equipment, mainly the Float Cabin. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to donate, please share the page and campaign with everyone you can. Facebook, twitter and instagram are great tools to help spread the word. Please use the tools on indiegogo page to share with friends and family! We greatly appreciate each and every share!
