story:
OVERVIEW

Our product range is based on pure essential oils and the first oil we are using is Eucalyptus oil. Its healing and medicinal properties have been known in Australia for centuries and with your help, Elyptol will bring many more products to market with this fantastic oil.  Couple that with other natural oils and ingredients including Argan oil, Lavender oil, Goats Milk, Camel Milk and our range will continue to grow.  All to create a range of products that are better, cheaper, safer and easily accessible.

Eucalyptus was the companie inspiration but more importantly, using the traits and benefits of the oil to stop germs, heal and moisturise. With those basic ingredients, Elyptol has created the basic formula which kills 99.9999% of germs, moisturises and heals.

The strongest safest global hand sanitizer today.

When the companies CEO went to the hospital, there was this assumption that if the hospitals are using it, it must be the best – and his newly born daughter deserved the best. It was only until he discovered that most of the hospital products and cheap products on the market were full of toxic chemicals damaging skin, causing disease and in some cases, creating an environment to harbor germs and carry them to the next person.  
“There must be better products on the market”.   There were none – globally.

As a result, Elyptol has been on a mission to bring naturally based hand hygiene products to market that can protect, destroy germs and moisturise and heal. 

This campaign is about getting our message to a much larger audience, bringing our products to you in a form that is cheaper, easier and more effective and to continue to grow products from soaps, shampoos, conditioners through to household cleaners.

Elyptol is now in its second phase and wants to share their products globally with all those people, families, kids that want better hygiene products to put on their skin. But Elyptol is up against 800lb gorillas that are trying to kill initiatives and continue to sell toxic chemicals without full disclosure. Elyptol wants this to stop. 

Elyptol produces products that are antimicrobial (not just antibacterial) and significant claims that have been accepted by the number one regulatory bodies in the USA (FDA), Canada, Australia (TGA) and we want to expand. 

We now require funding to build our brand within some of the largest retail chains in these countries. These chains require us to invest millions of dollars in promotions and discounted product.

On the back of a successful campaign here, we intend to work with many organisations that help the environment (Makepeace Island and saving the Koalas - Sir Richard Branson) to working with Greenpeace and Save Our Oceans.  We have already started this by creating plastic products that are refillable reducing plastic waste in our oceans.

With your help we will be improving the hygiene and health of humans, while also protecting one of the worlds most unique and beautiful creatures.

We need to raise a minimum of $500,000 to ensure that we can achieve our immediate promotional targets, particularly with one of the largest retail chains in the USA. Each further $500,000 raised will ensure that we can achieve similar targets in other chains.

The company has been successfully operating for 4 years now. We have finalised all of our product formula and packaging. We already have supply deals in place with major retailers in all of our markets. The challenge now is to build out all the products and the brand and this requires substantial investment before we will achieve our sales targets.

 

 

Elyptol has harnessed one of the most respected healing and cleansing oils of nature and combined it with the fighting powers of other unique botanical natural ingredients. It’s our alternative to you using chemicals on your hands to kill 99.9999 percent of germs that can make you sick. It’s natural, it’s kind and yet strong enough to do the job whether you are in the medical profession, at home, school or office.

Hand Sanitiser Gels

Hand Sanitiser Sprays/Rubs

Hand and Hard Surface Wipes

Dispensers

Gift/Travel Packs

Full product range available to view at https://elyptol.com 

In The News - Channel Nine News Australia

 

Elyptol at the American Music Awards (AMA's)

 

Elyptol at the Oscar's

 

Infection Control

 

A GS1 Australian Success Story

 
 

Comments from our Fans

“ You’ve never smelt clean like this!" Michael Traynor, The Walking Dead

“No chemicals. That’s the best part about it.” Sugar Shane Mosely, (Ex-Professional Boxer)

“It’s unbelievable. Whatever it is I’m buying it!" Brad Garrett, Everybody Loves Raymond

“I’m really quite a messy human being, this would probably work really well for me.”

Staz Nair, Game of Thrones

“Very nicely done, not antiseptic (smelling). Fresh!" Patrika Darbo, Emmy Award Winner

“Pleasant scent, not sticky." Chris Sullivan, Guardians of the Galaxy Vol.2

“ It’s fresh, dries fast, I feel I should do a commercial for this right now." Donovan Carter,  Ballers

“That’s really good! I love the way it smells too. This is great!" Alexandra Billings, Transparent

“Oooo smells delicious. Oh I love it! ...this is perfect for me!" Shanola Hampton, Shameless

“It smells really good, like aromatherapy.” April Bowlby, Two and a Half Men

“ Smells good too. Smells like a spa." Phillip P. Keene, The Closer

“Smells beautiful." Jerry O’Connell, Actor

“Very natural. We like natural.” Elvis Nolasco, American Crime

“It has a real naturalness to it. I don’t feel my hands get sticky." Nikki Soohoo, Casual

“This is my kind of Hand Sanitiser." Shanica Knowles, Hannah Montana

 

About the CEO - Tim O'Connor

Having been an international award winning serial entrepreneur in technology, Tim made the radical move to take on billion dollar corporations dumping chemicals in Hand Sanitisers. 

But getting into consumer products was a new challenge. Tim had no idea on what products contained especially skin products until he became a doting, over the top Dad who wanted the best for his miracle little girl. "If hospitals were using it, then that must be the best, right?  WRONG! " 

"I started reading ingredients on the back of bottles and had no idea what the ingredients were."  "I became obsessed with what we were putting in and on our bodies and was stunned by how big corporations create products laden with toxic chemcials".

A few years later, an opportunity came up to use some intellectual property that had eucalyptus oil in it – apparently a miracle natural oil.  Fast forward to today and Elyptol has come a long way from just Eucalyptus oil - magical essential oil.

Elyptol’s mission has remained the same but the products have developed into the best in the world, tons of accolades and loads of awards. We provide products that are 100% natural, effective, moisturizing and healing to the skin and using products that once empty can be reused, recyclable or compostable.  We are focused not just on skin health but also on the environment. 

All natural ingredients that you understand. Millions of dollars into testing to make sure we conform to all health standards and regulatory registrations.

But now we want to get our message out to everyone because everyone, just like you, deserves to have access to products without toxic chemicals and ingredients that don’t harm you or your family.

We need your help. Without it, Elyptol won’t survive the onslaught of those larger corporates supplying us with false advertising, products with massive amounts of toxic chemicals in them all to make their products cheaper. 

If you purchase our campaign, you will benefit from the discounts and very soon, more than get your campaign donation back.

Help us help you.

story:
How many of you, your family members, and your close friends have put medical care off because of the outrageous costs in this country?  I have, and the odds are that you have too. It shouldn't be this way; so rather than waiting for a solution from someone else, I set out to create a better way. 

  With your help, we can create a new normal for healthcare treatment in this country; where medical care is affordable because prices are based on what we can afford.

  We need to raise funds to be able to market this service to the country to get both medical professionals and patients on-board. We need to build a business around the technological components already built; and have adequate infrastructure in place to support the services offered on the app. 

For your support, we’re offering the following rewards:

1. For a $5 contribution, you will receive our sincere appreciation for helping us to get this valuable service to the people.

2. For $20, you’ll receive your choice of a t-shirt or canvas grocery bag printed with our to-be-announced new logo.At this tier of support, we can also send you a vinyl window sign for your Medical/Dental office.

3. For $50, we’re offering any 3 of the above items.

4. For $100, you’ll receive my complete instructions to create a solution such as this.  This includes initial designs, how I found and assembled my team, my experiences with intellectual property protection, and how I funded this while supporting a family on a retail salary.  I know that there are plenty of ideas like this out there and if I can do it, so can you.  All of this for less than the cost of 1 hour with a consultant!

  If we don't reach our goal, what we do raise will be used to market while building and testing our beta version.  We firmly believe that Americans deserve lower healthcare prices, and you have my commitment that we will pursue this however, and to whatever degree we can.

  We have two options.  We can watch costs rise while our politicians keep dividing us; or we can fix it together. Let’s fix it. Let’s encourage medical professionals considering a new approach. And when it comes to your medical needs, help us put you first.  Please help by contributing, sharing on social media and Indiegogo share tools, and talking about this solution with those around you.

story:
We will include 1 dental spool (45mts). Even though you can use any brand, we recommend our dental floss, which was specially designed for Easy Flosser. 

Features: 

  • Mint flavor.
  • One 45mts waxed coated spool.
  • Shred-proof & fits tight gaps.
  • Knitted tightly and coated with micro-crystalline wax.
  • Vegan, no animal testing, no Teflon 
     

One of the proper flossing techniques recommended by the dentist is to curve the floss around the teeth. This technique is known as the "C" shape technique. Easy Flosser is the only device that easily allows you to adjust the tension of the floss; start by reducing the amount of tension of the floss as shown in the video, then slide it gently to the base of the tooth then move the Easy Flosser up and down between the walls of adjacent teeth, scraping off the plaque. If the floss gets stuck between the teeth, slide the floss in a back and forth motion and bring the floss up, if floss remains stuck, unlock the floss by releasing the lock button, then pull the Easy Flosser slowly out of your mouth.

Remember: 

  • Never force the floss or you can hurt the gums.
  • There is no reason to have the floss too tight for effective plaque removal, so we recommend to loosening the floss tension to avoid injuries to the gum, it also allows the floss to cover more tooth surface.
  •  Do not loosen the floss too much, or it will be difficult to maneuver between teeth. 
     





 

 

 


 


 



 



Brushing and flossing are both important for your oral health. Brushing only removes plaque from the front and back surfaces of your teeth. Flossing, on the other hand, allows you to remove plaque from between your teeth and underneath the gums. Be aware that where the most destructive microbes live is in these hard-to-reach spots. You need a tool that can easily allow you to get to these spots. 

Bad breath, tooth decay, and gum problems will develop unless plaque is removed. If you haven't been flossing, your gums might bleed when you start. It's never too late to start flossing. Even if you never have flossed before, start now!

Top 5 benefits of flossing:

  • Prevent bad breath and keeps your smile clean.
  • Millions of bacteria and other germs can be found in your oral cavity, so flossing your teeth reduces gum disease. 
  • It doesn't take long for plaque to accumulate on your teeth. Flossing prevents tartar Build-Up if done daily. 
  • 10x time more effective than brushing. 
  • Save money. Reduce dentist visits that could be costly. 

Remember, Good oral hygiene keeps you healthy so floss every day and keep the dentist away. 

  1.  Scientific Study: The use of DENTAL FLOSS is associated with lower risk of Periodontitis, tooth loss, heart attacks, and diabetes.
     
  2.  What ADA has to say about flossing.
     
  3.  Federal Government, ADA Emphasizes the Importance of Flossing and Interdental Cleaners.

 

EASY FLOSSER™ makes the world a better place to live since it will dramatically reduce floss waste.  We believe developers, inventors and innovators have a responsibility for our generation and the next ones to come.  Innovation must benefit society without damaging or destroying the environment. We take that role seriously,  so we want to make products that can make our lives better and help our planet as well. 

 

Mass production of the Easy Flosser is ready to start. Most crowdfunding projects are launched when the product is just a prototype. We are well beyond that stage, the family of injection molds and equipment that will be used to mass-produce Easy Flosser are ready. We decided to take the risk with our own money rather than using yours. By doing this, we are removing many of the unknown and potential pitfalls that other crowdfunding campaigns encounter. This approach enables us to produce a better product and deliver it in a more accurate and shorter time. We took the risk so you do not have to. The following video shows an industrial injection machine and the multi-cavity mold, made of hard steel, it can easily produce around 300,000 units.

 

 Please connect with us, we will answer any questions you may have. 

Facebook 

Instagram

twitter

Pinterest

 

 

Mass production of the Easy Flosser started already. Check the video above, we already purchased the expensive stainless steel injection mold. This mold can produce 300,000 units or more, all we need now is to raise money to buy the raw material to make Easy Flosser. We ran a short production of 100 units, and the whole batch came out beautifully from the mold, so back our project and let's make Easy Flosser a reality.
story_txt:
We will include 1 dental spool (45mts). Even though you can use any brand, we recommend our dental floss, which was specially designed for Easy Flosser. 
Features: 

Mint flavor.
One 45mts waxed coated spool.
Shred-proof & fits tight gaps.
Knitted tightly and coated with micro-crystalline wax.
Vegan, no animal testing, no Teflon  





One of the proper flossing techniques recommended by the dentist is to curve the floss around the teeth. This technique is known as the "C" shape technique. Easy Flosser is the only device that easily allows you to adjust the tension of the floss; start by reducing the amount of tension of the floss as shown in the video, then slide it gently to the base of the tooth then move the Easy Flosser up and down between the walls of adjacent teeth, scraping off the plaque. If the floss gets stuck between the teeth, slide the floss in a back and forth motion and bring the floss up, if floss remains stuck, unlock the floss by releasing the lock button, then pull the Easy Flosser slowly out of your mouth.
Remember: 

Never force the floss or you can hurt the gums.
There is no reason to have the floss too tight for effective plaque removal, so we recommend to loosening the floss tension to avoid injuries to the gum, it also allows the floss to cover more tooth surface.
 Do not loosen the floss too much, or it will be difficult to maneuver between teeth.  


 

 
 

 

 




 



Brushing and flossing are both important for your oral health. Brushing only removes plaque from the front and back surfaces of your teeth. Flossing, on the other hand, allows you to remove plaque from between your teeth and underneath the gums. Be aware that where the most destructive microbes live is in these hard-to-reach spots. You need a tool that can easily allow you to get to these spots. 
Bad breath, tooth decay, and gum problems will develop unless plaque is removed. If you haven't been flossing, your gums might bleed when you start. It's never too late to start flossing. Even if you never have flossed before, start now!
Top 5 benefits of flossing:

Prevent bad breath and keeps your smile clean.
Millions of bacteria and other germs can be found in your oral cavity, so flossing your teeth reduces gum disease. 
It doesn't take long for plaque to accumulate on your teeth. Flossing prevents tartar Build-Up if done daily. 
10x time more effective than brushing. 
Save money. Reduce dentist visits that could be costly. 

Remember, Good oral hygiene keeps you healthy so floss every day and keep the dentist away. 


 Scientific Study: The use of DENTAL FLOSS is associated with lower risk of Periodontitis, tooth loss, heart attacks, and diabetes. 
 What ADA has to say about flossing. 
 Federal Government, ADA Emphasizes the Importance of Flossing and Interdental Cleaners.



 

EASY FLOSSER™ makes the world a better place to live since it will dramatically reduce floss waste.  We believe developers, inventors and innovators have a responsibility for our generation and the next ones to come.  Innovation must benefit society without damaging or destroying the environment. We take that role seriously,  so we want to make products that can make our lives better and help our planet as well. 
 

Mass production of the Easy Flosser is ready to start. Most crowdfunding projects are launched when the product is just a prototype. We are well beyond that stage, the family of injection molds and equipment that will be used to mass-produce Easy Flosser are ready. We decided to take the risk with our own money rather than using yours. By doing this, we are removing many of the unknown and potential pitfalls that other crowdfunding campaigns encounter. This approach enables us to produce a better product and deliver it in a more accurate and shorter time. We took the risk so you do not have to. The following video shows an industrial injection machine and the multi-cavity mold, made of hard steel, it can easily produce around 300,000 units.
 





 Please connect with us, we will answer any questions you may have. 
Facebook 
Instagram
twitter
Pinterest
 


 


Mass production of the Easy Flosser started already. Check the video above, we already purchased the expensive stainless steel injection mold. This mold can produce 300,000 units or more, all we need now is to raise money to buy the raw material to make Easy Flosser. We ran a short production of 100 units, and the whole batch came out beautifully from the mold, so back our project and let's make Easy Flosser a reality.

story:
Chico community & friends of the Skrams,

let's come together to help a great family!

I am an old friend of Michael Skram and wish to remain anonymous. I started this campaign after seeing Michael's video post about the recent sewage flood at his house. His mother had undergone many serious surgeries and was still recovering from them when the flooding occurred. Needless to say, this is not a healthy environment to be in when you are healing. Any money that you donate will help the whole family to pay for the many expenses and alleviate some of the stress they are all under. I am touched by Michael's story and how he has been there for his parents. 

Here is what your donation will go toward:

  • Any costs incurred from the flooding, motel, storage, and related expenses.

Let's help Michael and his family. Your kindness is appreciated!

story:
I would like to invite you to do the following Free Course. The reason is not just to illustrate why backing this endeavor on your social network and financially is praiseworthy, and how you can impact humanity, but also because this course is the foundation to all following courses and will do you good. Just click on the Course Card and it should take you there:

Our model of Education

The Tradition model of Education

What's the difference?

The difference is what makes education. In our model people are above education, although still a theocracy, but democratic and localized in its appropriation.

In the traditional model education is above us, and can easily be turned into an oppressive dictatorship, since somehow the Me Teacher has a connection with God and/or knowledge others don't have.

This academy is thus about education being the communal servant it is suppose to be, an academy where we together socially construct education to serve humanity, since health and wholeness comes from the Creator that is not bias.

Let your imagination run with what all of this imply for health and wholeness. For your health and wholeness when education is not objective, per se, but a subjective participation with humanity as the owner. An analogy is, "Who owns your first language?" This is an example of the educational ownership we are talking about, since someone might be exceptionally good in using your first language, but still don't own the language. Even  the creation of new metaphors can't be protected with copyright, since ownership stays in the public domain.

A Diagram of Example Courses and how Our Teaching Facilitates

To see diagram in own window, follow this link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0ByvA8wpB5hnsMHNmek84X1gycDA/view?usp=sharing

Our courses are thus for every single person with Internet, but also courses for and by medical doctors for their patients. Our DIY courses are for the physical, mental/spiritual and personality dynamics, but in essence counseling alias coaching.

In what measures do you share health and wholeness? Sharing, since our education is communial ownership for the good of humanity.

If you want a peak into my business plan follow this link: https://pitch.liveplan.com/ludLS/cSzEE

To Jump Directly to my Résumé/CV follow this link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B6ZEGxHH891SR05wcGJhQkRvSjQ/view?usp=sharing

For a Few Examples of how Perks can Work for You follow this link https://docs.google.com/document/d/1L8ukbjtUk-aHsCwSgOVwNIvm8Q_vBfRTgSKNJXuS7YM/edit?usp=sharing

Short Bio

"For those that don't have time (for all the details) just read the Text in the Blocks like this one to get a good gist or summary of my story."

 

“My name is Hannes (Johannes) Nortjé, and I’m 46 years old.”

 

I’m currently living in middle Germany of which the word “middle” is very significant (apart from Germany) since in my successful years of online education, with students all over the globe, the center is not centralized education, but living in the essence of the global village.

I’m a born South African that started off my career as a computer programmer, before attending my first Bible college, and then my second, which ultimately led to a doctor's degree in systematic theology and philosophy and in turn opened the door to become a specialist in online education – the occupation I’ve been following ever since. However, in the thick of things, while I was busy dying 9 years ago, after I had been in hospital 5 times in 3 years and each time no less than 14 days, my dermatologist frankly spilled the beans that if I don’t transcend/go beyond school medicine I’m going to die since treating only my symptoms is not getting to the heart of the matter. The concept school medicine is a literal translation out of German (my dermatologist is obviously a German) indicating mainstream medicine and practices versus alternative or complementary medicine or procedures.

Back to my story, the list of disorders was so long that another specialist was actually amazed that I was still alive.

“This is the point where the big paradigm shift took place, the shift from the pure abstract systematic and philosophical world I was filling bigger than life, to realize that if the abstract is not practical what is the use?”

 

In short this is where my complementary or even substitutionary path to theology started, the path of also studying for an alternative health practitioner and dietitian and a path that ultimately led me to crossbreed my open source theology brand with the practical claim of health and (w)holeness for everyone.

Incentive for this Academy

“Thus the reason for this campaign, to completely finalize a career change that is bigger than you and me of mobilizing a community that could leave a lasting legacy of impacting this world.”

 

Actually it is not ditching my theological teaching career, but to embrace the fullness of theology, since Jesus’ practical theology was to heal the sick and feed the needy. Another inspiration/mentor is John Wesley that was not only the spiritual father of the 18th century revival in England, but also virtually a medical doctor for the people called methodists. This means that in our academy the lines between the abstract and practical disappear (to put it differently, either God is part and parcel of everything, or he is part and parcel of nothing - our conviction is the first).

“The thrust of the academy is to bring global and feasible health and (w)holeness education to everyone, the bread and butter of life, with "easy-peasy" courses starting from $1, but if not through courses then at least by participating in the forum and/or blog or all social media the academy offers (requiring only internet access).”

 

Obviously an app will follow taking this ethos even to the outbacks, of say Africa, on as little devices as smartphones. We all agree education is the difference between just life and living, wholeness living.

The word academy is carefully chosen, since etymologically it was the name of a garden, a garden that used to host a philosophical school. The philosophy we don’t really care about, but the joy, fruitfulness and abundance a garden naturally typifies, a setting for everyone to enjoy, is the ambiance this health and (w)holeness academy strives for. The metaphor garden is in turn also a crossbreeding with the ethos of community owned and driven open source software (versus proprietary software like Windows owned by an individual entity); our conviction is that health and (w)holeness is divine providence embedded in the Image of God we all share.

For whom is the Academy?

“This means there is something for everyone in this academy, and thus this crowdfunding campaign, since health and (w)holeness is something that should not be lost by those that have it, but gained back by those that indeed have or never even had it in the first place.”

 

Differently put, even the smallest contribution to the success of this academy is the health and (w)holeness of the whole community. What comes around goes around, so that those that contribute from health and (w)holeness invest in their own health and (w)holeness, since by definition the success of the community is the sum of the total and not the list of the individual parts.

The best example of the direction we’re aiming at is to look at the first course in making: http://ehw-academy.thinkific.com

“To add to this, another major objective is to also work with Medical Doctors as an educational extension of their services, for those using or choosing to use Complementary Medicine (CM).”

 

CM is a heading I’m using for four streams embodying the wholistic and holistic enterprise in mainstream/school medicine. These four streams are:

  1. Integrative Medicine,
  2. Functional Medicine
  3. Restorative Medicine
  4. Age Management Medicine

In principle these names are abstract designations for the sum of the total of each one's modus operandi, and so rather than drawing contrasts our object is to put the emphasis on what we can become together, since together we can make the biggest impact on humanity.

To make it practical, one of my General Practitioner (M.D.) friends says that one of his banal tasks is to explain the same things over and over again to his patients and for him it would be wonderful if he could offer them a course to learn these things. This is then another service the academy wants to offer to such doctors and/or medical personnel, courses extending/expanding their educational doctor-patient relationships, and where applicable, relieve them from endless repetitions, or just deepen their medical services. Tailor made is being defined very broadly, and can mean either standard CM courses deployed, but can also be 100% tailor made courses on request for a particular context and/or praxis. Please see perks below for possible compilations.

“Part of our working hypothesis is not an either… or…, but an and… and…, when it comes to mainstream/school medicine. Complementary medicine is the and… and… example, while the DIY for everyone even takes it one step further by adding still an additional complementary trust relationship between doctors and their patients.”

 

Call it an additional consultant-patron relationship if you like, or an advisor-novice relationship (see more below under The Impact).

“Any M.D. praxis that decides to invest and coorporate with our academy, and especially those that got their own tailor made course(s) put together, with e.g. their own logo and access restricted to their own patients only, has the right to markup the price that is being passed on to their patients, or make their own judgement when and if it is necessary from patient to patient (please see examples of topics at the bottom).”

 

What We Need & What You Get

“So what do we need for the success of fully fleshing out of this academy? In the first place we need time, and since time is money we need money.”

 

Differently put, if I can reach the campaign goal I will free myself from most if not all other teaching obligations and only focus on this investment to humanity. As long as I have to develop this academy, only in my free time, so long it will stay limited in focus and never become more than just a side job.

A few other tangible points I can list are:

  1. Hardware - like a managed server, as well as a good computer I don’t have right now (my only computer is an old Samsung netbook)
  2. Software - the right platform with plugins, etc. The success of online education is when the medium is not even being noticed by the students. A good app can be added to this list.
  3. Administrative and other logistics - sharing too much teaching/curriculum development time with administrative work and logistical issues is counterproductive, not to mention counselling and coaching keeping us/the academy in the center of the community
  4. Marketing
  5. Legal matters

So what are the perks the academy wants to offer its investors/contributors/participators?

For the public:

  1. From $10 – a lifetime 10% discount on all courses and counseling/coaching
  2. From $50 – a lifetime 20% discount on all courses and 10% discount on counseling/coaching
  3. From $100 – a lifetime 30% discount on all courses and 15% discount on counseling/coaching
  4. From $250 – a lifetime 40% discount on all courses and 20% discount on counseling/coaching
  5. From $500 – a lifetime 50% discount on all courses and 50% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 5 sessions then lifetime 20%
  6. From $750 – a lifetime 70% discount on all courses and 50% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 8 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family)
  7. From $1000 – $1 for 3 full length course, or chunked courses up to 3 full length course, plus 70% lifetime discount on all courses and 50% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 10 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family). Short stand alone courses, like IM courses, don’t count as full length ones, but enjoy the 70% discount
  8. From $1500 - $1 for 6 full length courses, or chunked courses up to 6 full length courses, plus 70% lifetime discount on all courses and 55% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 10 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family). Short stand alone courses, like IM courses, don’t count as full length ones, but enjoy the 70% discount
  9. From $2000 – $1 for all courses for always, and 55% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 12 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family)
  10. From $2500 - $1 for all courses for always and immediate family included, and 60% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 15 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family)
  11. From $5000 - $1 for all courses and counseling/coaching* for always (immediate family included and anyone else on request**)

* Counseling and coaching with reasonable and customary scheduling, restricted to fair use

** Reservations, due to possible abuse, reside with the academy

Complementary additions for Medical Doctors:

  1. From $500 - $1 for 300 complementary medicine courses (direct customer service is the responsibility of the praxis, and not the academy, although indirect customer service is, like FAQs and tutorials)
  2. From $1000 - $1 for 750 complementary medicine courses (direct customer service is the responsibility of the praxis, and not the academy, although indirect customer service is, like FAQs and tutorials)
  3. From $1500- $1 for 750 complementary medicine courses with customer services
  4. From $2000 - $2 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 2 short individually tailor made course (+/- 40 minutes) (direct customer service is the responsibility of the praxis, and not the academy, although indirect customer service is, like FAQs and tutorials) (Lifecycle minimum 3 years)
  5. From $3000 - $2 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 3 short individually tailor made courses (+/- 40 minutes per course) (direct customer service is the responsibility of the praxis, and not the academy, although indirect customer service is, like FAQs and tutorials) (Lifecycle minimum 4 years)
  6. From $4000 - $2 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 4 short individually tailor made course (+/- 40 minutes per course). The academy offers customer service and 4 free major updates/revises on each individual course (Lifecycle minimum 5 years)
  7. From $5000 - $1 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 4 short individually tailor made courses (+/- 40 minutes per course). The academy offers customer service and 4 free major updates/revises on each individual course (Lifecycle minimum 5 years)
  8. From $7000 - $1 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 7 short individually tailor made courses (+/- 40 minutes per course). The academy offers customer service and 5 free major updates/revises on each short individual courses (Lifecycle minimum 5 years)
  9. From $10000 - $1 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 10 short individually tailor made courses (+/- 40 minutes per course). The academy offers customer service and 6 free major updates/revises on each short individual courses (Lifecycle minimum 6 years)
  10. From $15000 - $1 to negotiate any tailor made package more inclusive than any of the previous complementary medicine packages

What will happen if I don’t reach the goal? Obviously it depends how far I’ve missed the mark, but in principle it would either imply that it will only take longer to fully deploy the academy, or in the worst case scenario that it will become a niche academy. The above perks should stay intact, even in the worst case scenario. Differently put, the money pledged will go for nothing else but this academy.

The Impact

“The impact and legacy this down-to-earth online and affordable decentralized health and (w)holeness education will bring about can’t be overstated.”

 

Years of online teaching experience, as well as the successful designing of 2 online syllabuses for a college, give me the confidence to guarantee success for those that join this academy (irrespective of their educational background, e.g.).

“Complementary Medicine Doctors that choose to integrate this academy in their praxises will see the difference in the added level of trust that will flow from the entrusted DIY.”

 

Differently put, this will put the doctor-patient relationship on a new plain, a plain of cooperation and consultancy. This is not the place to stimulate any doctor’s imagination, but the presupposition is that equal revenue can be made with prevention and eliminations, if not more, than with treating only symptoms (illnesses and calamities are part and partial of this fallen world, but trust and genuine care is what let doctors transcend above this fallen world).

The impact is also reciprocal, since I will be meeting a basic need of humanity, a need so easily taken for granted by those that have it, but soon very evident when it is missing. Reciprocal is also because I have been there myself, and know what it means to long for health and (w)holeness, and thus the joy when others indeed attain it. Actually the biggest joy is to be with those that never lose their health and (w)holeness.

Risks & Challenges

“My biggest risk is the possible success that can draw negativity from people like the big pharma, and whoever else.”

 

That is, however, where Germany is not a bad location to operate this global endeavor from, since these kinds of alternatives or additions to mainstream/school medicine enjoy great privileges in Germany. Should I reach the campaign goal, and burn the bridges of my other occupations, then I will need the community.

“My biggest challenge is to get this campaign out there for the most people to read and to reach my goal. Embedded in this challenge is to avoid becoming too academic; I want to stay close to people (so please help me if that happens).”

 

Other Ways You Can Help

The ethos of this academy is decentralized ownership, and thus just by reading this you are already helping, even if you can’t pledge any money. On the flipside this means decentralized ownership is that this endeavor needs you to spread the news, I need you to get this campaign out there.

“This endeavor needs your social network and so my request to please use the Indiegogo share tools for that, and spread the news on your electronic social network.”

 

Finally, once the academy is live and up and running your biggest contribution will be to participate, not only in the courses, but also in the forum and/or blog and the whole spectrum of social networking the academy will offer.

Examples Of Complementary Medicine Courses For Use By M.D.s.

  1. Prediabetes and insulin resistance
  2. Diet versus lifestyle change
  3. Leaky Gut
  4. Acute versus chronic inflammation
  5. Toxic estrogen breakdown
  6. Supplements, and the importance of minerals
  7. Too little stomach acid
  8. Causes of acid reflux
  9. Difference between adrenal fatigue and stress, etc.

 

Credit for the background music in my YouTube video goes to http://www.bensound.com/

Icons made by Pixel from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY

Please see perks below for possible compilations.“Part of our working hypothesis is not an either… or…, but an and… and…, when it comes to mainstream/school medicine. Complementary medicine is the and… and… example, while the DIY for everyone even takes it one step further by adding still an additional complementary trust relationship between doctors and their patients.” Call it an additional consultant-patron relationship if you like, or an advisor-novice relationship (see more below under The Impact).“Any M.D. praxis that decides to invest and coorporate with our academy, and especially those that got their own tailor made course(s) put together, with e.g. their own logo and access restricted to their own patients only, has the right to markup the price that is being passed on to their patients, or make their own judgement when and if it is necessary from patient to patient (please see examples of topics at the bottom).” What We Need & What You Get“So what do we need for the success of fully fleshing out of this academy? In the first place we need time, and since time is money we need money.” Differently put, if I can reach the campaign goal I will free myself from most if not all other teaching obligations and only focus on this investment to humanity. As long as I have to develop this academy, only in my free time, so long it will stay limited in focus and never become more than just a side job.A few other tangible points I can list are:

Hardware - like a managed server, as well as a good computer I don’t have right now (my only computer is an old Samsung netbook)

Software - the right platform with plugins, etc. The success of online education is when the medium is not even being noticed by the students. A good app can be added to this list.

Administrative and other logistics - sharing too much teaching/curriculum development time with administrative work and logistical issues is counterproductive, not to mention counselling and coaching keeping us/the academy in the center of the community
Marketing
Legal matters
So what are the perks the academy wants to offer its investors/contributors/participators?For the public:

From $10 – a lifetime 10% discount on all courses and counseling/coaching

From $50 – a lifetime 20% discount on all courses and 10% discount on counseling/coaching

From $100 – a lifetime 30% discount on all courses and 15% discount on counseling/coaching

From $250 – a lifetime 40% discount on all courses and 20% discount on counseling/coaching

From $500 – a lifetime 50% discount on all courses and 50% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 5 sessions then lifetime 20%

From $750 – a lifetime 70% discount on all courses and 50% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 8 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family)

From $1000 – $1 for 3 full length course, or chunked courses up to 3 full length course, plus 70% lifetime discount on all courses and 50% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 10 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family). Short stand alone courses, like IM courses, don’t count as full length ones, but enjoy the 70% discount

From $1500 - $1 for 6 full length courses, or chunked courses up to 6 full length courses, plus 70% lifetime discount on all courses and 55% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 10 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family). Short stand alone courses, like IM courses, don’t count as full length ones, but enjoy the 70% discount

From $2000 – $1 for all courses for always, and 55% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 12 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family)

From $2500 - $1 for all courses for always and immediate family included, and 60% discount on counseling/coaching for up to 15 sessions then lifetime 20% (sessions transferable to immediate family)

From $5000 - $1 for all courses and counseling/coaching* for always (immediate family included and anyone else on request**)
* Counseling and coaching with reasonable and customary scheduling, restricted to fair use** Reservations, due to possible abuse, reside with the academyComplementary additions for Medical Doctors:

From $500 - $1 for 300 complementary medicine courses (direct customer service is the responsibility of the praxis, and not the academy, although indirect customer service is, like FAQs and tutorials)

From $1000 - $1 for 750 complementary medicine courses (direct customer service is the responsibility of the praxis, and not the academy, although indirect customer service is, like FAQs and tutorials)

From $1500- $1 for 750 complementary medicine courses with customer services

From $2000 - $2 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 2 short individually tailor made course (+/- 40 minutes) (direct customer service is the responsibility of the praxis, and not the academy, although indirect customer service is, like FAQs and tutorials) (Lifecycle minimum 3 years)

From $3000 - $2 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 3 short individually tailor made courses (+/- 40 minutes per course) (direct customer service is the responsibility of the praxis, and not the academy, although indirect customer service is, like FAQs and tutorials) (Lifecycle minimum 4 years)

From $4000 - $2 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 4 short individually tailor made course (+/- 40 minutes per course). The academy offers customer service and 4 free major updates/revises on each individual course (Lifecycle minimum 5 years)

From $5000 - $1 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 4 short individually tailor made courses (+/- 40 minutes per course). The academy offers customer service and 4 free major updates/revises on each individual course (Lifecycle minimum 5 years)

From $7000 - $1 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 7 short individually tailor made courses (+/- 40 minutes per course). The academy offers customer service and 5 free major updates/revises on each short individual courses (Lifecycle minimum 5 years)

From $10000 - $1 per complementary medicine course per patient, and 10 short individually tailor made courses (+/- 40 minutes per course). The academy offers customer service and 6 free major updates/revises on each short individual courses (Lifecycle minimum 6 years)

From $15000 - $1 to negotiate any tailor made package more inclusive than any of the previous complementary medicine packages
What will happen if I don’t reach the goal? Obviously it depends how far I’ve missed the mark, but in principle it would either imply that it will only take longer to fully deploy the academy, or in the worst case scenario that it will become a niche academy. The above perks should stay intact, even in the worst case scenario. Differently put, the money pledged will go for nothing else but this academy.The Impact“The impact and legacy this down-to-earth online and affordable decentralized health and (w)holeness education will bring about can’t be overstated.” Years of online teaching experience, as well as the successful designing of 2 online syllabuses for a college, give me the confidence to guarantee success for those that join this academy (irrespective of their educational background, e.g.).“Complementary Medicine Doctors that choose to integrate this academy in their praxises will see the difference in the added level of trust that will flow from the entrusted DIY.” Differently put, this will put the doctor-patient relationship on a new plain, a plain of cooperation and consultancy. This is not the place to stimulate any doctor’s imagination, but the presupposition is that equal revenue can be made with prevention and eliminations, if not more, than with treating only symptoms (illnesses and calamities are part and partial of this fallen world, but trust and genuine care is what let doctors transcend above this fallen world).The impact is also reciprocal, since I will be meeting a basic need of humanity, a need so easily taken for granted by those that have it, but soon very evident when it is missing. Reciprocal is also because I have been there myself, and know what it means to long for health and (w)holeness, and thus the joy when others indeed attain it. Actually the biggest joy is to be with those that never lose their health and (w)holeness.Risks & Challenges“My biggest risk is the possible success that can draw negativity from people like the big pharma, and whoever else.” That is, however, where Germany is not a bad location to operate this global endeavor from, since these kinds of alternatives or additions to mainstream/school medicine enjoy great privileges in Germany. Should I reach the campaign goal, and burn the bridges of my other occupations, then I will need the community.“My biggest challenge is to get this campaign out there for the most people to read and to reach my goal. Embedded in this challenge is to avoid becoming too academic; I want to stay close to people (so please help me if that happens).” Other Ways You Can HelpThe ethos of this academy is decentralized ownership, and thus just by reading this you are already helping, even if you can’t pledge any money. On the flipside this means decentralized ownership is that this endeavor needs you to spread the news, I need you to get this campaign out there.“This endeavor needs your social network and so my request to please use the Indiegogo share tools for that, and spread the news on your electronic social network.” Finally, once the academy is live and up and running your biggest contribution will be to participate, not only in the courses, but also in the forum and/or blog and the whole spectrum of social networking the academy will offer.
Examples Of Complementary Medicine Courses For Use By M.D.s.

Prediabetes and insulin resistance
Diet versus lifestyle change
Leaky Gut
Acute versus chronic inflammation
Toxic estrogen breakdown
Supplements, and the importance of minerals
Too little stomach acid
Causes of acid reflux
Difference between adrenal fatigue and stress, etc.

 Credit for the background music in my YouTube video goes to http://www.bensound.com/Icons made by Pixel from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY

story:
I'm Ant Smith, somewhat (in)famous small-penised poet. I wrote a poem about size anxiety almost 3 years ago and ever since then I've been giving interviews and writing articles for the world's media.

After living with size anxiety for almost 50 years, and having researched all things small-penis related for almost 3 years I wanted to bring all that experience together to help others. So I wrote The Small Penis Bible.

This book isn't like any other penis-anxiety book available (there aren't any enlargement scams in it!). It's a mix of autobiography and relentless research presented in a lightweight, easy-to-read format. And with illustrations too!

I'm sure you appreciate how pervasive and destructive this male body image concern is. I really want something very positive to turn up in search results when people are looking for help with this matter.

To get the book 'out there' I want to hold a launch event - which is already shaping up to be a helluva night. There will be costs involved so by donating here you can help covers those AND lay your hands on a pre-launch copy of the bible to boot!

The funds will help cover any venue costs and stock costs for the launch. If I raise more than needed then I'll disperse the rest amongst the volunteers who will be helping me with the launch event.

Three years ago it would have been impossible to image that UK Breakfast TV would cover the question of penis size anxiety - but that's just what they did when they interviewed me last year. The whole Small Penis Pride 'campaign' is having a real effect on the world. I really do believe this book is important.

Even if you can't donate, please share the campaign!

story:
Who We Are

Rocky Mountain Rollergirls was formed in 2004 and Denver Roller Derby in 2005. Both leagues bring their own unique flavor to the city of Denver and offer a rich and rewarding community to over 200 skating and non-skating members. We share the same mission to develop and promote the sport of roller derby, train skaters for local, national and inter-league competition, and strengthen the communities in which we live. 

Your contribution means we can continue to foster youth and adult skaters as well as provide a safe, open, and welcoming community for roller derby in Denver. 

 

Our Goal

We need to raise $100,000 for the new venue. This helps defer the costs of bringing the space up to occupancy code in Denver and includes construction of bathrooms, a sprinkler system, knocking down a massive wall, putting in ADA compliant egress paths, and more! 

This is your opportunity to get in on the ground floor (literally) of our new space. We have an exciting array of special and unique perks. You could even have the venue named after you! 

 

The Impact

When you contribute you support:

  • Two internationally competitive teams ranked 5th and 30th in the world 
  • a safe environment for our youth skaters who grow physically, mentally, and emotionally through this team sport
  • Two skater-owned 501c3 non-profits
  • The growing sport of roller derby 
  • Our ability to extend our community outreach efforts

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Every dollar helps! But if you're unable to contribute financially we'd love for you to share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and beyond!

Story:

Lycomplete is a powerful 100% organic and bioavailable antioxidant supplement that will help consumers combat cardiovascular risks, degenerative diseases, tumors and much more. The extraction process involves cutting edge technology that creates the first and only 100% bioavailable organic lycopene supplement available. Lycomplete  uses Supercritical CO2 to extract a 100% bioavailable lycopene without creating any toxins. It's safe for the environment and ensures a supplement that protects health and defends against disease.

Studies have shown that free radicals from oxygen may be the primary cause of cardiovascular diseases. Supplemeting one's healthy and balanced diet with a powerful antioxidant provides an additional safeguard against these higly reactive and damaging particles. Lycopene's incredible powers have been used as a defense against cardiovascular disease, tumors, degenerative diseases, osteoporosis, diabetes, male infertility, skin diseases, and senile macular degeneration.

Our Background:

Over 16 years of invested research, studies, certifications, patents, and development in Europe under the highest quality and restrictions have been in process. Soon we will complete registration requirements with FDA and USDA for a combined new logo along with our Euro Green Leaf Certification from I.C.E.A which is the highest and strictest standard in Europe.

We operate with a humanitarian focus and philosophy along with responsible manufacturing.  Our production plant is environmental friendly and doesn’t produce byproducts or gas emissions in the atmosphere. 

The shell of Lycomplete is produced by Capsugel from their (Vcaps) capsules which are a two-piece capsule made of hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, a cellulose-based raw material. They were designed to meet restrictive dietary needs, and are thus gluten-free, vegan, kosher, and halal.

We support and donate to our selected team foundation which is" Music4Hope"  and bring music to children in hospitals who are suffering from cancer. Through music we provide them with some joy and hope. Help us achieve, grow, and support our team. Additionally,  we serve and donate to the USO by providing organized receptions across welcoming centers in the US.

Why you should use our product:

Our product is practical and affordable and with our applied discounts from this campaign, for roughly $1 per day, you can protect your body with the only certified Organic Lycopene product. 

The product is Organic, Vegan, Kosher, as well as Halal meeting necessary dietary restrictions and requirements. Our Motto is to serve at the the health and wellness for everyone.

It is not a Synthetic or Natural version and there is no chemical solvent used in the process, this is the main difference.

Great gift for a loved one as well!

How funds will be used:

Funds are being utilized in putting together a larger order.

What happens if our campaign funds are not met:

We will honor all the perk items offered in our campaign!

 
Why Antioxidants are important:
 
Antioxidants are essential to human health because they stop the actions of free radicals, by-products naturally created in the body cells as the result of metabolic oxidative processes. The constant action of free radicals can be seen mainly in the premature ageing of cells and in the rise of several more-or-less dangerous diseases, and cancer.
 
Lycopene Studies and Research Link provided:
 
Extensive documented medical research studies can be found on this link.
 
Statistics & Learning Links:
 
WebMD
CNN
NIH-National Cancer Institute
National Heart Institute
 
 
St.Luke's Clinical Dietician:
 
Lycopene User Testimonial Video:
 
 
Benefits of Organic Lycopene with Fitness and Organic Guru Thomas Delauer:
 
 

Difference in products:

The developed and patented technology allows the extraction of active ingredients from solid or liquid matrices and allows the splitting of the vegetable extracts. Other competitive products are utilizing a chemical solvent process, which leaves behind a small number of toxins, and this is what differentiates Lycomplete versus any natural or synthetic version of a Lycopene supplement. In the below image you can see the small spec's of Lycopene represented in a competitors product, the rest is inert material. Where as with Organic Lycopene shown in bulk form here you can see the difference.
 

SEE THE DIFFERENCE

 
 
 
 
 
 
Integrated with the Music4Hope Foundation:
 
 

The Music4Hope Foundation brings healing sounds of hope and love into people’s lives. We can fight cancer and other life threatening disease with your help; we can encourage each other to help one another. Our mission has expanded to partner with the USO Military Centers across the country through music outreach and family support programs. Donations support our core missions: Sponsor a family through medical recovery, Music Therapy Programs, Hospital visits to patients and staff. We are pleased to support the Mission of St. Jude’s Hospital by providing Music Room through support of Companies and Individual donors like you that care. Improving the lives of patients, their families, and dedicated caregivers every day in the USA and around the world. Together with COR Group Italia we support Lycomplete. Learn more about our mission at  www.facebook.com/music4hope

 

Lycomplete  Composition:
