story:
Our Big Heart Story

Kristy Alexander - Founder & Chief Big Heart at Apple Rose Beauty

Named after two victims of human trafficking, Apple Rose Beauty is a 20-year-old dream come true! My love for creating skincare began at age 15 when I analyzed face powder in Chemistry class back in Trinidad and Tobago, where I grew up. I wrote a life-plan then that included starting a cosmetics company one day.

Fast forward 20 years and at the peak of my decade long career in Engineering, Business and Management I left it all behind, selling my home and all my belongings to embark on a year-long mission to travel the world serving the most needy in Central America, Asia and Africa. My work with survivors of human trafficking in Asia changed the trajectory of my life. I returned to the U.S. with a passion to help create opportunities for these survivors.

After intense study and consulting with chemists and formulators in the clean beauty space, my dream came full circle with a much bigger purpose. I combined my heart to serve those in need, my knowledge and love for the health benefits nature affords us and my unapologetic drive for solutions that work, to create Apple Rose Beauty - an unparalleled natural and organic beauty company with a big heart.

In addition to providing you with the best that nature has to offer for skin issues such as oily or dry skin, acne, signs of aging and hyperpigmentation, our mission at Apple Rose Beauty, is to employ human trafficking survivors and donate to organizations involved in their rescue and rehabilitation.

 

To date, we have directly and indirectly, through the 5 Freedom partners we support, impacted the lives of more than 50 women who survived the horrible system of exploitation through human trafficking.

Our goal this year is to employ 3 additional women and support 5 additional organizations on the front lines of rescuing and rehabilitating victims.

Our natural and organic skin care and organic beauty products carry the story of women and men empowered by your purchase.  Our products are good for you and good for survivors of human trafficking - a win-win solution.

Nature meets Beauty

At Apple Rose Beauty we believe that we all have a responsibility to be our best selves by taking care of our bodies. Did you know that up to 60% of what you put on your skin gets absorbed into your bloodstream? Our skin is our largest organ and investing in the health of our skin is so important. With our clean, natural, certified organic and wildcrafted ingredients, you don’t have to sacrifice beauty for health or health for beauty. You can reveal your most beautiful, glowing skin using our powerful natural and organic products.

Our amazing customers love the power of organic skin care!

 "Quick Results!"

My husband noticed a difference immediately. I have been using the Apple Rose Beauty skin care for 2 months now and my complexion is clearer and my blotchy skin is gone! 

Daniella, 40's

 

 "Worth it!"

After just five days of application I could notice a difference in my skin. My blemishes were less and my face as a whole felt clear and beautiful. Definitely worth it!.. 

Elizabeth, 20's

 

 "Soft, moisturized skin!"

I love the Vitamin C Serum and Moisturizing Treatment! They both make my skin feel soft, moisturized and non-greasy. I love that I don't have to worry about chemicals or other harmful ingredients..

Rose, 30's

Our signature product – Bloom Beautifully Vitamin C Super Serum was highlighted as a ‘must-have’ in Jacksonville Magazine

 

Our New Charcoal + Hibiscus Products

We are launching our brand new Charcoal and Hibiscus line. It will include a Charcoal Beauty Bar and Charcoal + Hibiscus exfoliating mask. Together they will cleanse and support the natural exfoliation and renewal process of your skin. They will leave your skin baby soft, detoxed and dewy fresh.

They provide deep cleansing, minimizing the appearance of pores, clarifying plugged pores and detoxifying the skin for a clearer, brighter complexion. The beauty bar can be used on the face and body and our new 2-in-1 wonder mask works as a pore-refining mask and also doubles as a gentle, exfoliating scrub.

Why Charcoal and Hibiscus?

Charcoal draws impurities to the surface of the skin, helping you to achieve a flawless complexion.

Hibiscus has been called ‘Nature’s Botox’. It is rich in plant-actives and antioxidants and provides added strength, elasticity and protection for your skin.

These new products are incredible for all skin types.

Get ready to draw out dirt and debris, absorb excess oil and boost your skin’s natural defenses with our new Charcoal + Hibiscus combo.

Why Indiegogo?

As a supporter, you get exclusive first dibs on our new products AND you get the chance to snag them at half price!

We’ve put together some really awesome prizes exclusively for you.

Your backing will help us: 

  1. Source ingredients and packaging to meet our minimum required order for a manufacturing run.
  2. Get one step closer towards our goal of providing freedom and meaningful employment this year for 3 more survivors of human trafficking.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please MAKE SOME NOISE! Spread the word! Share our campaign with your friends and family!
  • There are lots of way to do this via your social media and Indiegogo's share tools!

Thank you for your Big, Beautiful Heart from the bottom of our hearts~

Thank you for your pledges! We’re grateful and humbled by your support!

WE are Apple Rose Beauty. YOU are our Big Hearted, Beautiful heroines & heroes!   

Kristy Alexander ~ Founder & Chief Big Heart at Apple Rose Beauty

We’ve put together some really awesome prizes exclusively for you.

Source ingredients and packaging to meet our minimum required order for a manufacturing run.
Get one step closer towards our goal of providing freedom and meaningful employment this year for 3 more survivors of human trafficking.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please MAKE SOME NOISE! Spread the word! Share our campaign with your friends and family!
There are lots of way to do this via your social media and Indiegogo's share tools!

Thank you for your pledges! We’re grateful and humbled by your support!

Kristy Alexander ~ Founder & Chief Big Heart at Apple Rose Beauty

story:
Hi there! I’m Keren Eldad, I am a certified Life Coach and I am the founder of With Enthusiasm ™ Life-Coaching.  

I am on a MISSION. That mission is to help you transform your life and that of thousands of others who will benefit from life coaching through my online coaching courses.

Welcome to the Indie Go Go campaign that will catapult this purpose-driven endeavor into your hands, and those of those people who need my program.


Why? Because it WORKS - and I am living proof that coaching works. Since finding my purpose in coaching, I’ve manifested miracles - from launching the business itself, to manifesting the LOVE OF MY LIFE, with whom I wake up every day. It was not always like this. In 2012, I went through a pretty rough divorce. And in my life, I have struggled with weight problems, financial issues, bouts of unemployment, and more. I have overcome – and so can you.

Following my divorce – my personal rock bottom: I hired one coach. Then another, and then another.  I studied Kabbalah, I went to Landmark, I went to cheesy courses called "30 Days to Soulmate" and "Get Rich for Good" in which I wrote letters to myself, and hugged my inner child (ugh). I read more than 200 books in the self-help and personal success genre. I discovered, through this what I REALLY, truly want. Then, I went out and got it – by becoming a coach.


The result is With Enthusiasm ™  - the personal coaching programs into which I have distilled all these learnings to serve, counsel, and support you, and to hold you accountable as you create everything you have ever wanted.  We are going to jump start your dream businesses, find your true loves and above all – help you realize that this world is our one chance to get out there, and go get it.

The first series is called LIVE WITH ENTHUSIASM. It launched in January 2017, and has been bought and downloaded by dozens of superstars. It’s is an online, 7 week course, that includes videos, audio files and worksheets. With it, I train several people at a time to first and foremost shatter their limiting beliefs, and help them walk into new more beneficial thought systems, creating habits to truly transform their lives, and at the very least get them performing at far higher levels.

I am raising $55,000 - the exact amount needed now to first fund my next video series– DATE with Enthusiasm – a 7 week step by step course that will get people into the love life that they deserve, and secondly, to fund the Marketing and Public Relations that my programs require to truly go to the level of similar programs by the world’s biggest coaches – like Tony Robbins, Brendan Burchard, Marie Forleo and Jen Sincero. There is no doubt in my mind that my programs are of the same ilk, and are every bit as capable of reaching people with their message.

Perks: When you donate $400 (or more) - you will automatically get the link to download the full online version of Live With Enthusiasm!

If the goal is not met - the impact will still be massive! Date with Enthusiasm - the second online coaching program - will see light. Countless people will find new levels of joy. And we will just continue to move, steadily, towards our goals in a phased approach.

 

The Impact thus far

Since launching my first online program 5 months ago, I’ve seen one student get engaged at the age of 57, one finally prepare his company for sale so that he can pursue Olympic dreams, and helped several finally find the courage to forgive their moms, launch their dream consulting business, and just live more fully than ever before. The testimonials – from just these FOUR MONTHS - are absolutely outstanding, and you are more than welcome to check some of them out on www.kereneldad.com.

The point here is not just traction – validation for ME – but validation for you, for your investment. Funding my business is not just sound, but is supporting the the vehicle for the inspiration of masses of people.

You see, everyone needs this. Everyone needs inspiration, motivation, connection and support. Particularly during these times of constant phone gazing, unprecedented levels of single-hood, of financial strife, and of global misalignment. We need people vibing high, creating and spreading kindness. It literally benefits everyone.

Risks & Challenges

Once a little-known vocation, life coaching is gaining traction– in part thanks to mega- high profile coaches such as Tony Robbins, and in part just thanks to technology and the times. According to projections by the Bureau of Labor Studies, the consulting services industry is responsible for the majority of employment growth in professional and business services - and is now a multi billion dollar industry. This means lots of opportunity -- but also, lots of competition. So - why With Enthusiasm? 

Great companies are powered by great purposes and strong brand pillars. Ours is: Servile and excellent success coaching, delivered lovingly by me: Keren Eldad. I am here to uphold coaching standards, and to shine a light on the client and inspire them to be the very best possible version of themselves.

With Enthusiasm Coaching ™ will triumph by adhering to the following C’s:

  • Consistency: Product / program quality, pricing, customer service  
  • Contemporary: Modern, remarkable, premium, & FUN  
  • Commercial: Viable and profitable  
  • Community: Always conducive to  dialogue and to bringing meaning and purpose to the lives of all clients.  The heart and soul of With Enthusiasm ™ coaching are our clients. Their success is my success.   

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some of you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Here's how you can give me a boost:

  • Spread the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! It will make sharing even easier. 

And that's all there is to it. 

For more, again - please check out www.kereneldad.com - and feel free to check the program out for yourself. Thanks in advance for your support, and may you always live with enthusiasm.

The first series is called LIVE WITH ENTHUSIASM. It launched in January 2017, and has been bought and downloaded by dozens of superstars. It’s is an online, 7 week course, that includes videos, audio files and worksheets. With it, I train several people at a time to first and foremost shatter their limiting beliefs, and help them walk into new more beneficial thought systems, creating habits to truly transform their lives, and at the very least get them performing at far higher levels.
I am raising $55,000 - the exact amount needed now to first fund my next video series– DATE with Enthusiasm – a 7 week step by step course that will get people into the love life that they deserve, and secondly, to fund the Marketing and Public Relations that my programs require to truly go to the level of similar programs by the world’s biggest coaches – like Tony Robbins, Brendan Burchard, Marie Forleo and Jen Sincero. There is no doubt in my mind that my programs are of the same ilk, and are every bit as capable of reaching people with their message.
Perks: When you donate $400 (or more) - you will automatically get the link to download the full online version of Live With Enthusiasm!
If the goal is not met - the impact will still be massive! Date with Enthusiasm - the second online coaching program - will see light. Countless people will find new levels of joy. And we will just continue to move, steadily, towards our goals in a phased approach.
 
The Impact thus far
Since launching my first online program 5 months ago, I’ve seen one student get engaged at the age of 57, one finally prepare his company for sale so that he can pursue Olympic dreams, and helped several finally find the courage to forgive their moms, launch their dream consulting business, and just live more fully than ever before. The testimonials – from just these FOUR MONTHS - are absolutely outstanding, and you are more than welcome to check some of them out on www.kereneldad.com.
The point here is not just traction – validation for ME – but validation for you, for your investment. Funding my business is not just sound, but is supporting the the vehicle for the inspiration of masses of people.
You see, everyone needs this. Everyone needs inspiration, motivation, connection and support. Particularly during these times of constant phone gazing, unprecedented levels of single-hood, of financial strife, and of global misalignment. We need people vibing high, creating and spreading kindness. It literally benefits everyone.

Risks & Challenges
Once a little-known vocation, life coaching is gaining traction– in part thanks to mega- high profile coaches such as Tony Robbins, and in part just thanks to technology and the times. According to projections by the Bureau of Labor Studies, the consulting services industry is responsible for the majority of employment growth in professional and business services - and is now a multi billion dollar industry. This means lots of opportunity -- but also, lots of competition. So - why With Enthusiasm? 
Great companies are powered by great purposes and strong brand pillars. Ours is: Servile and excellent success coaching, delivered lovingly by me: Keren Eldad. I am here to uphold coaching standards, and to shine a light on the client and inspire them to be the very best possible version of themselves.
With Enthusiasm Coaching ™ will triumph by adhering to the following C’s:

Consistency: Product / program quality, pricing, customer service  
Contemporary: Modern, remarkable, premium, & FUN  
Commercial: Viable and profitable  
Community: Always conducive to  dialogue and to bringing meaning and purpose to the lives of all clients.  The heart and soul of With Enthusiasm ™ coaching are our clients. Their success is my success.   


Other Ways You Can Help
I know some of you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Here's how you can give me a boost:

Spread the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools! It will make sharing even easier. 

And that's all there is to it. For more, again - please check out www.kereneldad.com - and feel free to check the program out for yourself. Thanks in advance for your support, and may you always live with enthusiasm.

story:
Background

Swaziland is a kingdom in Southern Africa where the majority of the population lives in rural areas, supporting themselves through small businesses and subsistence farming. Swaziland has one of the highest rates of HIV infection in the world, with 28.8% of the adult population living with HIV (UNAIDS Gap Report, 2016). This has led to a loss of a whole generation (38% of the population were under the age of 15 years (WHO, 2015)), and break down in family structures. Swazi’s also face the challenges associated with widespread poverty with an estimated 63% of the population living below the poverty line (World Bank, 2016). Additionally, there are high rates of domestic and gender based violence. In Swaziland one in three women report experiencing some form of abuse by the time they are 18 years old (UNECA, 2014).

These challenges take a toll on the nation’s mental health, with many people experiencing grief, loss, depression, anxiety and financial stress. A lack of finances, a shortage of trained professionals and stigma act as barriers to accessing support. There is a need to improve awareness around mental health and develop culturally appropriate psychosocial resources. 

 

Our dream

Duduza’s dream is to set up a safe space to offer three different services to the local population. The first is to offer direct mental health and psychosocial support services by bringing professionals together to provide holistic care. The second is to build capacity within the country by offering training and workshops on varied mental health and psychosocial support topics to different groups, organisations and companies. We have noticed a growing interest among Swazi's to pursue careers in mental health and an increase in the number of people studying psychology. Therefore as part of building local capacity, Duduza would like support this interest and provide young professionals a space to learn and grow under the mentorship of more experienced health care workers. The third service is to conduct high quality research on mental health and wellbeing in Swaziland, in order to identify needs, empower vulnerable groups and give Swaziland a voice in regional and global mental health discussions.

 

The challenge

To make this dream a reality – we need a physical place that will be Duduza’s home. Although Duduza has begun to provide some services, without a place to operate from we cannot grow to meet the needs of the community. We have found a property, nestled at the base of Sibebe rock, which offers a peaceful space from which we can provide all three of these services. It is welcoming, discrete and accessible to the general public.


With the money raised through this campaign, we are hoping to buy this property and bring Duduza to life. We will be competing in the property market, so if we are not able to obtain this particular property we will look for another suitable location.

 

We need your support

Duduza’s dream can only be realized with your support! This can be both financial, or by spreading the word! We need to raise $200 000 USD in order to buy the property and help support our start up costs for Duduza.

Thank you for believing in Duduza and our dream!

Check out our Duduza website for more information about what we do.

Our first BIG thank you goes out to Paul Chasusa, Pernille Hansen, Sifiso Shabangu, Hlobisile Mavuso, Alice Bhembe, Ben Taylor, Steve Hall, Michael Mossefin, Aleta Armstrong, Ray Berman and the other artists, and our global Duduza family for making our promotional video possible, creating our website, letting us use your beautiful photos, editing photos, donating artwork, spreading the word and believing in our dream! 

As a way of saying thank you to you for your donations, we are offering you a number of perks. Below are some of pictures, and if you look to the right you will find more detailed information.

Lucky Bean necklace- a beautiful necklace made from the seeds from the ‘Lucky Bean Tree’ The Lucky Bean Tree, or 'umSis' in siSwati is believed to have medicinal and magical properties. 

 

The Lucky Bean necklaces are handmade by local women. Purchasing the Lucky Bean necklaces to send to you means that Duduza is supporting local women running small craft businesses in order to support themselves and their families. 

 

Swazi Angel made from Lutzindzi grass, a sustainable natural weed that grows wild in Swaziland. Above is an example of a Swazi Angel, however each angel is unique and handmade by local women. 

 

Screen print by local artist- limited edition screen print by a local artist. The screen print will be mounted on a signed A4 mounting board, perfect for framing! 

 

A beautiful Duduza pendant made by a local silversmith, representing you joining our Duduza family. 

The front and back of the Duduza pendant. The pendant is constructed in such a way that it can be worn on a chain or attached to a pin and worn as a brooch.  

 

Above is an example of the work done by one of Swaziland's local artists, Aleta Armstrong who has generously offered to create an unique artwork specially for our campaign.

story:
Who We Are

National LGBT Cancer Network and Films for Nonprofits have teamed up before. We've made 6 successful films that show the lives and healthcare needs of LGBT people. But nothing prepared us for the viral impact of Vanessa Goes to the Doctor. We hit upon a formula, based on humor and compelling filmmaking that goes straight to the viewer's heart. Healthcare professionals find themselves laughing as they grow to care about Vanessa, a transgender woman of color, and accompany her to her first visit to a new doctor. 

 

People Are Asking For More.

In response to these requests for better healthcare by the LGBT community we are now seeking funding to make Vanessa the first in a series of short films, each covering a different LGBT subpopulation and distinct medical specialty:

Film #2: Jack (a bisexual man) Goes to the Psychiatrist

Film #3: Sheryl (a lesbian) Goes to the Gynecologist

Film #4: Jeffrey (a gay man) Goes to His Primary Care Physician

Each film will employ the same lighthearted but profoundly serious approach and will be produced by the same team that created Vanessa. Once completed, the films will be widely distributed through the broad social media and professional affiliations of the National LGBT Cancer Network. The films will all be available for free.

We invite you to be a part of this groundbreaking series and

change the way doctors treat their LGBT patients.

Timing is critical – lives are hanging in the balance – and we anticipate that stigma and discrimination will only increase during the new administration, further compromising the health of LGBT people.

 

Please Contribute

Our goal is to begin production by September 1, 2017 and release the films in January, 2018. We are seeking both large and small donors to fund production costs of $90,000. We have already raised over $5,000. Now, it's your turn to help.

Other Ways You Can Help

After you contribute, or even if you can't, please help spread the word about this critically important films series. This project has the power to change the healthcare experience of LGBT people. 

  • Make some noise about this campaign through all your social network channels
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you. Together, we can do this!

story:
Short Summary

There have been many amazing attempts to shed some light on body positivity.

However, there seems to be a lack of proportional representation of the whole population: men, women, and transgender people of all races, ages, and body types.

There is power and strength in seeing accurate, realistic representations of ourselves in media.

Body 365 features people stripped down or as covered up as they would like to be, highlighting how perfect our perceived flaws and imperfections truly are via photo and video in a style that is similar to that of Humans of New York.

We are a team of passionate individuals who have come together to have the correct conversation started when it comes to self-love and body positivity. This is NOT for school credit and we are NOT selling a product, what we are doing is creating a movement for all of us to showcase the bodies we have in a loving manner. There is not a single person who can say that they've never had an insecurity when it comes to their body, now let's embrace our so called "flaws" as we are perfect just the way we are.

What We Need & What You Get

Body 365  is asking for your money to help make this project possible, the money you donate will go towards:

- Photography and Videography: helping to pay to rent our equipment, studios, backdrop, etc
- Marketing: helping us to spread the word online and in person, getting social media ads running, printing promotional posters, etc
- Featured People: helping us welcome our guests to which we feature in the Body 365 The Body Showcase shoot. Providing them with food and drinks, to make sure their experience is an overall comfortable well. As well as helping us to bring in possible influencers from across the country whom really embrace the importance of body positivity
- Charity: Any funds we don't use will be growing straight to body positivity and self-love charities and organizations. Body 365 is non-for-profit and we will not be pocketing any of the money for ourselves

Other Ways You Can Help:

There's a lot of other ways you can help out with Body 365:

- Share our Indiegogo with our friends and family! We really want to bring this project to life and do it to the best of its abilities. However, to do this we need the funds!
- Participate in our campaign! Do you want to be featured, contact us and let's set up a shoot date for you! Our contact is info@body365.org OR we can also be reached on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube at @body365_
- Want to participate but live far away? No problem! Instagram a pic of yourself showing off your body positivity with the hashtag #MyBody365 and we'd love to repost it!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Who are we?

The husband & wife team are Larry & Sarah Mckenzie-Thane. After leaving the UK almost 5 years ago we have been living in various parts of Indonesia. Before settling here we travelled through many parts of Asia acquiring many experiences and qualifications in various types of Yoga, Meditation, Reiki, Sound Healing, Ayurveda and many other wellness tools. We have also gained relevant skills in Hotel, Restaurant and Yoga Centre management.

What is 'How are you Really? Yoga Retreats'?

Our ocean-side retreats have been specifically designed for everyone regardless of experience, age or gender! We guide our guests through different styles of Yoga - Hatha, Vinyasa, Fly-High and Yin to help with the physical self. We also help discover other techniques for the mind such as meditation, breath-work, mindfulness & even adult colouring! Exploring the Chakras & Ayurveda also helps deepen the understanding of what makes us who we are! We want to create a space where guests can come to relax, rewind and restore using self love, self indulgence and self discovery techniques.

The Story So Far...

What We Need...

We have discovered a beautiful hotel in a small corner of the tropical island of Bali in Indonesia that has the vibrance and energy worthy of a Retreat Centre. This wonderful place is in Candidasa, a small town on the East coast of Bali. The hotel has 6 small cottages, a restaurant and a huge unspoilt garden with a potential for expansion. At the foot of the garden is the beach and ocean which is a snorkelers  paradise.

We already have excited investors and along with our own funds we just need $20,000USD to build a Shala and refurbish the cottages... this is where we need your help!

What You Get...

We have compiled an extensive list of perks to say thank you for your contribution to our How are you Really? Yoga Retreat Centre. If there is a perk you would like to see here then please let us know:

Our Vision for the Retreat Centre

We want to offer a How are you really? 5 day 'rolling' Yoga Retreat, Monday to Friday that will run all year round. This retreat will incorporate as much as possible from our already popular 7 day retreat.  In more detail the retreat will include:

  • 4 nights accommodation
  • 3 buffet style meals per day - breakfast, lunch & dinner
  • 2 Yoga classes per day (Yin, Hatha & Aerial)
  • Various types of guided Meditation
  • A trip to one of many local sights including the famous Water Temple & Water Palace
  • Daily room cleaning service
  • A free 1 hour, full body Balinese massage
  • Fascinating workshops involving Yoga - its history & purpose, Ayurveda & Chakras
  • Take classes from guest Yoga teachers
  • Cooking classes
  • Teas & snacks

Testimonials

"Loved Sarah and Larry. The yoga was great and not to complicated for beginners. Lots of laughter, great food and friends I hope I'll have for life. It was perfect I came back so relaxed and feel I have a different attitude." - Natalie McWilliams. Australia.

"This was an incredible week. It was an amazing mix of people who all contributed to the experience and it was great to have an open and compassionate environment where we felt safe to share. Sarah, you, coming from a place of being curious, compassionate, supportive and open made this experience magical." - Mylene, France.

"Sarah and Larry are two of the nicest people I've ever met and I loved that they really got involved with the group during outings, meals etc. It made it feel like a real little family. The free time is a perfect way to chill out, have a little holiday or really get to know others in the group. Honestly, one of the best weeks of my life. I'm going away literally a different person with a new found spark and passion for life that I haven't felt in years!" - Kate, U.K.

"Sarah has a great approach to teaching & an excellent interaction with her students. A very fresh approach. She's a refreshing breeze that brings light into a traditional Yoga practice. I highly recommend her teaching & classes" - Panda Chi, India

"Great Yoga Retreat Sarah is a phenomenal yoga teacher and just a beautiful person inside and out. The theme "How are you Really" was spot on. Sarah and Larry made sure that you had time for introspection pondering that question. The retreat schedule was great. We learned a lot about yoga, chakra's, auyervdic practices, yin yoga and yoga nidra. The excursions to the water palace and mountain Shaman were interesting and informative about the local Balinese culture. The class participants were literally from around the globe. We bonded and shared a lot of laughs and even a few tears as we learned about ourselves and each other." - Monica Penrose, CA. USA

read more...

Risks & Challenges

We believe that we have the relevant skills to run a successful How are you Really? Yoga Retreat Centre. We already operate our Yoga Retreats in the area so we are aware of any problems that could possibly arise. We also intend to employ the existing staff that already work at the hotel to help us with the general running.

As a very last resort, this is obviously worse case scenario, we can turn it back into a hotel and operate it as such. Of course if you pledged you will still get your perk but with our existing Yoga Retreat.

Obviously we hope to reach our goal but should we fall short we can still use the donated money to build the Yoga Shala... or just pay for the much needed refurbishment... it will just take a little longer to complete the rest of our 'Dream Yoga retreat Centre'!

Other Ways You Can Help

Its ok if you cannot support us financially, we still love you!

We will love you even more though if you can share our page and tell all of your friends & family about our exciting project. By using Indiegogo's sharing tools you can involve other people because it is a great way to expand our little planet and sharing with others is a giant step towards elevating our dream into a reality!

Namaste!

"Sarah has a great approach to teaching & an excellent interaction with her students. A very fresh approach. She's a refreshing breeze that brings light into a traditional Yoga practice. I highly recommend her teaching & classes" - Panda Chi, India
"Great Yoga Retreat Sarah is a phenomenal yoga teacher and just a beautiful person inside and out. The theme "How are you Really" was spot on. Sarah and Larry made sure that you had time for introspection pondering that question. The retreat schedule was great. We learned a lot about yoga, chakra's, auyervdic practices, yin yoga and yoga nidra. The excursions to the water palace and mountain Shaman were interesting and informative about the local Balinese culture. The class participants were literally from around the globe. We bonded and shared a lot of laughs and even a few tears as we learned about ourselves and each other." - Monica Penrose, CA. USA
read more...
Risks & Challenges
We believe that we have the relevant skills to run a successful How are you Really? Yoga Retreat Centre. We already operate our Yoga Retreats in the area so we are aware of any problems that could possibly arise. We also intend to employ the existing staff that already work at the hotel to help us with the general running.
As a very last resort, this is obviously worse case scenario, we can turn it back into a hotel and operate it as such. Of course if you pledged you will still get your perk but with our existing Yoga Retreat.
Obviously we hope to reach our goal but should we fall short we can still use the donated money to build the Yoga Shala... or just pay for the much needed refurbishment... it will just take a little longer to complete the rest of our 'Dream Yoga retreat Centre'!

Other Ways You Can Help
Its ok if you cannot support us financially, we still love you!
We will love you even more though if you can share our page and tell all of your friends & family about our exciting project. By using Indiegogo's sharing tools you can involve other people because it is a great way to expand our little planet and sharing with others is a giant step towards elevating our dream into a reality!
Namaste!

story:
The heart behind the mission:

Connectedness is something we tend to forget is in our nature. Throughout our life, we can be stripped away from the truth that resides in all of us. We desire silence, healing, love, inspiration, and most importantly, an understanding of our purpose here on this Earth. The heart that had a vision and desire to not only constantly remind themselves, but others, was inspired by a moment we as people have all reached. A feeling that something deeper was guiding them to heal not only themselves, but future generations that will call us ancestors. 

Funding the movement:

  • With the $3,000 goal, we plan to use $1,500 for seeking the most credible products to ensure each month we provide the tools you need to heal and ground you through your spiritual journey. Sourcing products that have the purest intentions, while also giving the artist and creators the abundance they need to keep creating. The other $1,500 will be used for the logistics of packaging, and sending the most divine and conscious gift to your home. Promising supporters that we are using the most environmentally friendly packaging, and shipping we are able to find. 
  • When you donate to our mission, the first 25 donors will receive the a one month free subscription as a thank you, and all donors after that will receive a surprise altar gift. 
  • Even if we are not able to reach our entire goal, the funds we do bring in will be focused and used for sourcing credible products and ensuring we pay every artist/vendor for their intentions and work. 

Our Promise:

This mission goes deeper than just someone starting a business. It's about connecting and keeping others in their truth. We want to give the world hope and inspiration, and remind others there is purpose here for all of us when we slow down and trust in our hearts.  No matter where you're at in your journey, it's our goal to make sure you have the constant love and support you need when life gets too loud. We hope you are able to give us that opportunity, and open the portal to receiving/giving.

Divine Delivery has so many goals to constantly give new ways for others to discover, heal, love and be inspired. This subscription service is truly just the beginning. Just like everything else in life, we must have faith and assurance in the flow of it all, and know that light will be spread no matter what. 

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you are not able to financially donate, we first want to thank you for reading this far in our campaign. We ask that you share this with friends, family, and others if you believe in our mission. We are fortunate enough to have the support and love to get this far. As we remain in a place of gratitude, we want to send love to you all and hope we can be a part of your spiritual journey.

story:
Who am I? My Story & Why I Do What I Do. 

Hi Guys, I’m Ross, online name The Motivational Dude.

I’m a speaker/trainer on the topic of Human Potential. Essentially I help people optimise their mind/body to realise their potential so they can live happier, healthier, more fulfilling lives. 

Here’s a few pics of me in action.

Working with a group of university students on 'How To Take The Next Step In Life'

Teaching a group of 16-25 year olds about Human Needs. Here I had them recreate Maslow's Hierarchy. 

Working with Spina Bifida Hydrocephalus Scotland. I spoke about nutrition, health & wellbeing from their perspective. I spent a few weeks in a wheel chair in preparation. 

Story Continued...

I am a qualified life coach, personal trainer and have studied psychology academically for 5 years. Specifically I specialised in the positive psychology, sleep psychology, psychological disorders, human decision making and neuroscience.

In the last 18 months I have optimised the lives of almost 7,000 people through my speaking events. Here I am speaking at TEDx Glasgow: Taking One Step Further. 

Here is a more recent event I ran for World Mental Health Day back on in October. I raised £2000 for a Glasgow based mental health charity so their service users could get wellness workshops and provided a new way of thinking about mental health for those in attendance. 

But life wasn’t always like this.

Before I landed on this purposeful path of helping others realise their potential, I had to first realise mine. 

Rewind to my early teens when I was exposed to a world of toxicity: drugs, crime and bad relationships. At 19 I took my first overdose, at 22 my second, and in between was diagnosed with panic disorder and put on medication. 

When life seemed as though it couldn’t get any worse, I was told by my lawyer: You’re looking at 2 years for this, there isn't much I can do”. 

Due to multiple incidences with the police I was left facing 2 years in jail. 

Life felt over. 

Fortunately for me I was given a second chance. 

Even though consequences followed, it was in that moment I had the belief to be better and that I would give my all to becoming more of myself.

For the next few years I carried that belief consistently, and while I struggled, I still managed to attain place at college and subsequently Glasgow university to study psychology. 

Around 2 years in I felt healthier in mind and body, made some massive shifts and was now ready for a new challenge. 

And that challenge was...

To help others move forward as I had.

It was at that time I had one Socrates quote etched on my arm: The unexamined life isn't worth living” (dodgy tattoo art)  

And since, I haven't stopped living those words, words I now urge others to embody. 

For more on what I do click below.

https://www.instagram.com/themotivationaldude/

https://www.facebook.com/themotivationaldude/?r...

I hope you can feel WHY I do what I do.

People make changes in their lives for one of two reasons: inspiration or desperation. 

And my job as a speaker/trainer is to help more people chose the former.  

In the simplest terms, I want for others what I didn't have. 

Proper mentorship and the best conditions for growth possible. 

This is what I live for.

I am happy with the number of people I’ve helped but I would like to reach more.

And know it’s possible with your help.

However, there are 3 barriers holding me back from helping more lives:

1-Accessibility-I’m one man and my reach is small. Having the means to expand would increase the number of people I could help. 

2-Affordability-Even though I offer discounted services, there are still those who cannot afford them. And we know that to grow one must be able to receive a sustained flow of mentoringing and knowledge. 

3-Tech-ability (can't break the rule of 3) To run affordable online systems and a free podcast for others’ benefit costs money, and right now I need help raising that money as I do not have the resources. 

>>>You can skip to the MY PLAN  section nearer the last third of the page to find out exactly what I'll do with the money<<<

What I need?

My first goal is £1800.  

The Specifics Of What This Money Will Allow Me To Do:

*Purchase the tech I need to host a podcast X2 Blue Yeti podcast mics & lapel mic. Sub total £220

*Pay for the online hosting of the podcast so I can have the podcast on iTunes, Stitcher and other relevant platforms. The company I will be using for this is Lybsyn and the costs for the year would be £350 at the basic level. 

*Pay for the software to maintain good quality audio. Audacity is the pro audio software I will require to edit. Estimated costs £130 for the year.

*Purchase an online system called Kajabi (www.kajabinew.com) which will enable me to offer sustainable monthly membership subscriptions and courses. A years fee equates to £1200 if you pay in one instalment. 

*(most importantly) Deliver this knowledge to a larger audience making it more accessible and affordable. 

If I am successful in my first goal then I have 3 further stretch goals:

1) £2200

*This would enable my to build my website and offer greater resources for my following. More specifically the additional £400 would enable a web developer revamp the site and integrate the podcast. 

2) £2600

*This would enable me to update my emailing system and customer service communications. Currently I have the free version of mail chimp and the system is not very effective. Having the extra money would enable me to switch platforms and acquire better my customer/comms care. 

3) £3000 

*This would enable me to purchase better quality tech for the podcast and a higher price point plan on Kajabi which would allow for a superior user experience. The standard Kajabi platform has great user benefits but is not very scaleable. 

Note, if I wasn't to reach my entire goal I would use the money raised as wisely as possible. If I can get close to £1000 then in a few months time I could afford to purchase the Kajaibi platform and thus have one full years access to a platform to serve others. 

I would also purchase a standard mic and run Facebook live shows with minimal tech and as things advanced I would aspire to improve access and quality. 

The Impact Your Help Will Have

• Together we will optimise more people, moving toward that goal of impacting 100,000 lives by 2020

•    We will generate better standards of knowledge so as to spark greater growth for Scottish citizens’ (and others) wellbeing. 

Why should you trust and back me?

I commit my life to helping others. Period. Seeing others find clarity of thought, push through barriers and achieve great feats fulfils me like nothing else. 

First off, I truly feel I’m in a unique position to help many lives. Having both experiential and academic perspectives gives me a more in-depth set of tools to help others be better versions of themselves. I am a member of the BPS British Psychological Society, maintain my roots with Glasgow university and am still very scientifically/academically involved. All my work is rooted in legitimate science. 

Secondly, my ultimate purpose is to help others realise their potential. That drive comes from all the horrible experinces I had to face alone, pushing me further from what I could be. 

 I do not want people to have to experience what I did and so I moulded a new me, an individual with the skills to deal with life's most common challenges so that I could course correct others and keep them on a path of potential.

See what others say:

Erin 16,

Easttwood High School

Through Ross's work I have really been able to push myself further than I ever thought I could go. I have gained so much faith and confidence within myself that I have been able to overcome so many difficult mental barriers that had hindered me greatly throughout my life. I am a more confident, happy and motivated person and I have Ross to thank for that!

Anonymous feedback form my last event

This event and my connection with Ross and his groups have given me the motivation I need when I’m at my lowest. The support network Ross facilitates makes me feel connected to the world during hard times and keeps me going.

"The Motivational Dude is so real and makes me learn these often boring lifestyle lessons in the coolest way"

"Our minds were blown. The depth of knowledge Ross brings is like nothing I've experienced before. And he makes it seem so doable, not daunting. I think that's huge."

 

My Plan 

Every week I’ll commit to running X2 Facebook live podcasts, one solo and one long form interview style, with the intention of providing a combination of professional and personal insights on topics such as: mental health, wellbeing, depression, fasting, brain health, sleep, anxiety, fitness, motivation, confidence and more. 

I will also bring on inspirational people to provide further novel insights to spark new thoughts in the minds’ of listeners. 

Moreover,  I will also create an affordable monthly membership platform where every month I will upload one new training video. 

These trainings will be in depth how-to videos teaching people how to meditate, how to face fear and be more confident, how to live a healthy life, etc. They will be delivered with a perfect balance of silly, serious and science so the audience can fully grasp the material and immediately implement it in a practical way. 

Funds From This Campaign Will Be Used To:

85% to fund start ups costs 

10% towards the creation and delivery of rewards

5% towards platform handling fees 

Risks & Challenges 

Luckily, I can't foresee anything that can't be overcome. Rewards will be distributed by their designated time and if I am to encounter any slight set backs you will be informed by text or email. 

A Note On Perks

I aim to deliver all perks in the designated time frame, all I ask is that if I run over by a few days you can exercise a little patience and know that I will do my best to fulfil my promise to you asap. Also, some perks are experiential and involve a lot of my time. These particular perks, such as SpeakerSpecial and 121 consults will be subject to availability. 

Ways YOU Can HELP:

The most obvious way you can help is by backing the project.

You can do it just for the fuzzy feeling, to get a perk in return or both. There is a broad range of exciting perks on offer, I’m sure one will catch your eye. Some examples are:

*Optimise for 1 month (monthly subscription to my forthcoming membership site)

*Motivational Dude backers tote bag. 

*LocalSpeakersSpecial-Have me speak for you and your team. 

See all by clicking Perks.

And if you have any problems or queries just message me using Indiegogo’s comms tools and or of my Motivational Dude Facebook page, I will get back to you within 24 hours. 

I also realise that not everyone may have spare few pounds and so you can also help by getting the word out. 

Share the campaign with your friends, family members and associates who you think will vibe what I'm doing and or whom may be interested in the associated perks. 

Stay connected with whats going on! 

Over the next 14 days I will launching a stream of live feeds and interactive social media posts. 

The first will be our Prelaunch Party in Glasgow.

Although many of you wont be able to attend, you will be able to watch/share the replay of the live stream where I'll be teaching about meditation, motivation an others such things while sharing with those in attendance why this project is so close to my heart. 

find link here...

To access this video go to my Motivational Dude Facebook on Thursday evening from 7pm onwards. 

On Friday the 1st of December I will be going live @ 8pm GMT with a small panel on inspirational people who will be coming on the podcast as guests next year. 

Hear us speak about human potential, our stories and gain tips and insights on how to live a better life. 

On Sunday 3rd I will going live on my Motivational Dude Facebook once again to discuss some tips on How To Combat Low Mood & Depression. 

There will be many updates over the course of the short 14 days period. 

Stay connected via our #HelpMehelpOthers hashtag & social media 

If you back the campaign, take a selfie and share it using said hashtag. 

If you cannot back us

 Support us with a simple share.

The more we get the word out, the more we can help others. 

It all makes a huge difference. 

I think most would agree that we need more of this in our community.

Many thanks and heart hugs, 


Ross

story:
We Need Your Help to Heal Trauma

Designing and building an integrative healing center is no small feat. Design, construction, furniture and office decor are costing a considerable amount of time, love, energy and money. We need your help to get this beautiful space off the ground, and support many people suffering from PTSD and other conditions. 

Your donation helps pay for the remaining construction and setup costs, and helps us turn to the important work of serving as many clients as possible, as soon as possible. As far as we know, somatic-focused therapy and counseling centers are unique in the Portland area, leaving people with PTSD in this area with few somatic therapy options.

If we can pay for these expenses now—which we can only do with your help—we won't need to pay in long-term financing, which would reduce our ability to expand our trainings and services, and would not help as many people who are suffering right now.

Services we are offering include:

  • Psychotherapy
  • Counseling
  • Psychology
  • Acupuncture
  • Bodywork
  • Naturopathic medicine

The mission of Somatic Center Portland practitioners is to provide effective, evidence-based body-oriented approaches to counseling and therapy. Your gift also connects members of our carefully selected team with cutting-edge trainings in new and innovative ways to support those dealing with trauma and PTSD. 

Whether you know someone suffering from PTSD or if you've experienced it yourself, we hope that you'll agree that this is a local business worth breathing life into. Every gift—large or small, no matter the size—is deeply appreciated.

With your support, your donation and your belief in this cause, the work of serving our community becomes all the more possible. And if you need further inspiration, check out some of the donation perks.

If you can't donate at this time, please consider sharing this page with others that may be able to support the cause.

Thank you so much for your support!
story_txt:
We Need Your Help to Heal Trauma
Designing and building an integrative healing center is no small feat. Design, construction, furniture and office decor are costing a considerable amount of time, love, energy and money. We need your help to get this beautiful space off the ground, and support many people suffering from PTSD and other conditions. 
Your donation helps pay for the remaining construction and setup costs, and helps us turn to the important work of serving as many clients as possible, as soon as possible. As far as we know, somatic-focused therapy and counseling centers are unique in the Portland area, leaving people with PTSD in this area with few somatic therapy options.
If we can pay for these expenses now—which we can only do with your help—we won't need to pay in long-term financing, which would reduce our ability to expand our trainings and services, and would not help as many people who are suffering right now.
Services we are offering include:

Psychotherapy
Counseling
Psychology
Acupuncture
Bodywork
Naturopathic medicine

The mission of Somatic Center Portland practitioners is to provide effective, evidence-based body-oriented approaches to counseling and therapy. Your gift also connects members of our carefully selected team with cutting-edge trainings in new and innovative ways to support those dealing with trauma and PTSD. 
Whether you know someone suffering from PTSD or if you've experienced it yourself, we hope that you'll agree that this is a local business worth breathing life into. Every gift—large or small, no matter the size—is deeply appreciated.
With your support, your donation and your belief in this cause, the work of serving our community becomes all the more possible. And if you need further inspiration, check out some of the donation perks.
If you can't donate at this time, please consider sharing this page with others that may be able to support the cause.
Thank you so much for your support!

story:
PROJECT SUMMARY: Help us by sending the first group of doctors and medical students to stop malaria in Kenya.

WHO WE ARE?

We are Rodolfo and Giorgio, two medical doctors with the ambition to change and impact the world where no one dares to. During our formation as medical doctors, we took part in several medical volunteering programs across the globe like Ghana, Zambia, Palestine, United States of America, Spain and Mexico. We realized that we had to tackle real life challenges, not only in our country, but around the world, and make a real impact in third world societies. That’s why we decided to create the Medical Impact Volunteer Group.

WHAT IS IT?

It is a  new international challenge and opportunity for medical students and physicians to discover a brand new world, where they can gain a lot of human and medical experience while taking care and living in the poorest communities around the world. A world with no flags and no borders.

 

 

OUR STORY

In 2014, we developed the Malaria Screening Outreach in Ghana, still working up to this day and has already diagnosed and treated over 100 thousand people from malaria. During our volunteering trip, we realized that most of the medical volunteer programs don’t have any data to allowed new volunteers to follow their patients and analyze their progress as the time goes by, so they never know if people are actually getting  health benefits; That’s why we decided to create a whole new program , that will make students and physicians improve their skills while they make an impact in low-income societies.

         

 

OUR CAMPAIGN

Carlos Rodríguez Arana, founder of Above The Borders, and a real revolutionary regarding social projects worldwide, invited us to work together to send our first group of doctors and medical students to the poorest communities in Kenya (where Above The Borders is working) to create an outreach that could help low-income communities catch malaria at a very early stage before it’s too late.  So, joining forces together we decided to send our first group of Medical Impact Volunteers to Muhuru Bay Village in Southern Kenya.

WHY KENYA?​

Kenya has some of the poorest communities in the world, with skyrocketing disease spreading, malaria and is currently the 4th country with the highest rate of HIV. Our goal, is to set foot in a strategic community, Muhuru Bay (located in the south) with some of the most malaria/HIV infected villages around it. 

Due to the high rates in mortality, the lack of resources and the difficulty that our project will face in this country, we think that if we succeed in a country like this we will succeed in any other.

WHY DO WE NEED YOU?​

We already have the experience to fight for those in need but we are one step away from making it happen.

We are already receiving help from some volunteering agencies that will help us during our journey to Kenya. But still, we have many things to do...

 

 With the funds we are going to:

1) Cover the expenses of the members of the team during the trip

2) Prepare, buy and conform our medical kits and equipment

3) Purchase the visas and permits to give  medical assistance.

4) Purchase the medicines that we are going to give for free.

 5) Maintain the investigation after the journey end to prepare the next group of medical                  volunteers that will travel at the end of the year to keep on with the investigations and the medical progress that this group already started.

WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO GET IN RETURN?

We are really proud to see that there's more people like us in the world. No matter the flag, the religion or the political ideology, we all share one thing in common, and that is our humanity. It´s about becoming the change we want to see in the world. We do not think that helping other people needs recognition or a prize, but we think that is fair to prove to you, that your confidence and help can actually changed someone`s life. 

That´s why we will prepare an "IMPACT KIT" that will be delivered to you (for each 100usd). In this kit you will see the actual proves of what we did with your help.

Each kit will contain the next information of your child:

-Letters and Pictures of your child (one of the many that we will help)

-Child certificate

-Medical Analysis of your child

- The malaria medicine package that we actually use on your child.

-Results of the research of the village

-An official t-shirt of Medical Impact and Above The Borders 

          

We believe in a world without borders, and Kenya is just a start.

 

THANK YOU!

(actual footage of our children in Kenya)

story:
Who We Are!

Zara Jeffrey

 Co Founder/ Co Ceo/Creative Director of Urban Light Mobile Wellness and Urban Light Sanctuary LLC.

 Healing has always been powerful and fascinating to me. What drives my passion to share it with others, is that I have experienced it within my own body and life and seen many positive changes. We are all different, we are all individual and need our own set of tools that work for our own unique experience of life.

Many years ago, I knew I would one day open a wellness center in San Diego. Urban Light Mobile Wellness is the incarnation of that dream. It is with great love and joy that Johanna and I bring Urban Light Mobile Wellness to the masses. Our wish is to inspire people to take care of themselves daily by making preventative holistic care more accessible and more mobile. 

Here is a brief overview of my training. In 2004, I graduated from San Diego State University with my Bachelors of Arts in Dance. This study took me on a deep exploration within my body, mind and spirit.  In 2008, I attended Mueller College for Massage Therapy, this program gave me tools to help others clear blockages through healing touch and intuition. I began working as a LMT in 2010 at San Diego Center for Health.   In 2013, I reconnected with yoga once again creating a shift in my life, and bringing my entrepreneurial spirit to life. In 2014, I completed the Mastery of Life Teacher Training. This 200 hour yoga certification program focused on the healing power of yoga.

Johanna Karlsson

Co founder/ Co Ceo of Urban Light Mobile Wellness and  Urban Light Sanctuary LLC.

My journey into the wellness field started about 10 years ago by chance (or not, depending on how you see it!). I was completely unhappy in my job, I hold a master’s degree in European Political Affairs and I was working in the nonprofit sector. I was good at my job, but I was not excited to go to work and I felt like I was on the wrong track. Around the same time, a friend introduced me to Reiki and that experience profoundly changed my mindset surrounding health and healing. From that moment on, I was drawn into the healing arts. Shortly afterwards,  I applied to Mueller College of Holistic Studies to further my understanding of the human mind and body. I graduated in 2010 with a degree in holistic health and massage therapy. I have been working in the field ever since and not once have I regretted taking the leap. I am now taking another leap - one that feels equally exciting and exhilarating. Urban Light Mobile Wellness has been a beautiful dream in the back of my mind ever since I started massage school. Now, it is reality.  It is very much a labor of LOVE for both Zara and I.  My heartfelt wish for is that we touch our clients with the same love and sense of purpose that I feel for my family and my life.

Our Plan

Urban Light Mobile Wellness is a State of the Art Remodeled Travel Trailer Unit operating at corporate hubs in and around San Diego. We offer a complete wellness experience!

 We have two comfortable treatment rooms, equipped to provide all our clients with the highest level of comfort. We also have chair massage as standard. We offer customized massage in a variety of styles and running from 30-60 minutes based on clients needs and wants. Convenience, easy access, and affordability are key to our business model.  Our intention is to break stress cycles for every individual in order to maximize peak performance, while making your experience affordable and fulfilling.

The problem we intend to solve is straightforward. Corporate America is traditionally associated with stress, deadlines, and long hours. Whereas as changing any of that would be a miracle, what our wellness trailer can offer is magical. We enhance the quality of life for corporate America by reducing emotional and physical stress, anxiety, and work related muscular tension by providing onsite massage therapy. 

Business people are busy people, with little down time or free time. Many can never find time for themselves, resulting in little to no self-care. We are programmed to rush to the next meeting or push through till the next deadline. Any thought about ourselves and our needs are cast aside or forgotten about. Over time, our self-neglect starts to affect our performance at work. This trend costs companies thousands of dollars annually. According to an article in a 2002 edition of Financial Times, an Ontario company reported a 25% reduction in time off for work related injuries and compensation claims dropped by $200,000 after implementing a massage therapy program.

What Will You Help Create?

 

 

What We Need?

Expenses so far

  • cost of trailer = $4,000
  • rental storage fee = $110 per month x 12 months = $1,350

Budget for operations of unit start up

  • renovation expenses (parts and labor) = $30,000
  • customized mobile booking system by Sterling Mobile = $8000 upfront + $350 monthly
  • permits/ licensing/insurance=  $600/per month
  • marketing and advertising = $10,000
  • misc = $10,000

Total budget to get the project off the ground and rolling

  • $​100,000 total cost to cover all expenses for start-up ​

We intend to have this project fully funded at the end of this Campaign run!; However if we don't get fully funded, we will use the funds we do raise to continue to move forward on the buildout of the trailer, as well as, continue to research all avenues and options for additional funding to bring Urban Light Mobile Wellness to life. We are confident in our venture.

The Impact

The essence of this project and what we truly envision for our company is to create a tangible change in how people perceive their personal wellness. We want to increase people’s general wellbeing and help the masses recognize the importance of proactive self-care. The intention is to create a space during someone’s workday when he or she can quickly step out of their office and get a massage, which in turn will, boost productivity, reduce sick leave, and increase general wellbeing.     

We all are trying to find the balance between our work schedules, family time, self-care time, and time to just enjoy life. Our fast paced society and reliance on technology has created a disconnection from our bodies, so it is of the utmost importance that we find ways to reconnect and to live in Ease and not Dis-ease.  Our services provide an easy solution by integrating holistic wellness into the work day by bringing it on-site to your company or event through our mobile/ modular platform.  We know people need it, and we know people want it, because ultimately we all want to enjoy our lives, and in order to do that we have to be alive,  and well in our bodies. We are asking for your support to create change and create peace and ease within a world that works so hard.

Risks & Challenges

Regulatory Restriction:
Based on our business model the city of San Diego only allows us to operate on private property. Consequently, we aim to negotiate contracts with owners of corporate buildings in order to be able to offer services at their location. To facilitate this process, we currently consult with the CEO of Sterling Mobile Enterprises, a company offering mobile barbering services in the same manner we are proposing to offer massage and chiropractic care. This company has created a blueprint for every aspect of the business model spanning from the physical set-up of trailer on site to the negotiation process of corporate contracts and everything in between. Working with this company saves us a tremendous amount of time and money up front.

Competition:
Current Alternatives
As far as actual competition, there is currently no other company doing exactly what we are setting out to do. However, there are some competitors, these companies commonly provide corporate massage and yoga by setting up physical shop inside a particular company office. These wellness companies are usually limited to working with one company at the time. By having our own state of the art facility located in the center of a corporate hub with multiple businesses present, we can reach all of them at the same time instead of limiting ourselves to working with only one company at the time.

Our Advantages
One of Urban Light Mobile Wellness's key advantages is geographic reach. We are on location, outside of corporate centers for everyone to see. We reach all the companies in that particular building, instead of being limited to working with one company at the time inside their office. Another key advantage of our model is our booking system. The system is developed based on a multiple locations principle and with a complex backend mechanism making marketing and client outreach streamlined with the purpose of rebooking clients and making it known where we are located at any given day.

 

Perks Details

Choose your perk by selecting it from the right hand column at the top of the campaign page.

$10: Thank you! 

Thank you for the bottom of our hearts - we’re forever grateful that you contribute and believe in our project!

$20: Personal Wellness Profile

As a thank you for your contribution, we give you a personal wellness oriented brochure, including educational information about self care and health in general.

$60: Black Friday Special!

A $60 donation yields you a $100 gift card towards a massage treatment of your choice once trailer is operational.

$70: Massage Gift Card

As a thank you for your contribution, you receive a $85 gift cards towards massage once trailer is up and running.

$100: Name on Donor Art Piece

Your generous donation is publicly acknowledged on our donor wall inside trailer and you also receive a tote bag as a token of our appreciation.

$250: Pampering Night Out

For donating $250, you receive a couple’s romantic evening or a relaxing evening out with your friend. This package includes 2 relaxing massages combined with a dinner for 2 at the Turquoise Lounge located in Pacific Beach, San Diego. (value $300).

$1,000: Wellness Day at your location!

Invite your friends or employees to a day of wellness! Have Urban Light Mobile Wellness come to your event and provide massage for your guests. We provide 3 massage therapists for 4 hours complete with fully operational state of the art wellness trailer. We provide all the equipment and staff. (value $1,250)

$2,500: Employees Wellness Package

Want to show your employees how much you appreciate their dedication and hard work? Urban Light Mobile Wellness comes to your company and provide your employees with massage, refreshments, yoga class and wellness lecture for one full workday (8 hours and 4 massage therapists, yoga instructor). (value $ 2,750)

$5,000: Ultimate Employee Appreciation

Urban Light Mobile Wellness comes to your event or company for 1 day providing massage, acupuncture, multi disciplinary yoga sessions, a wellness lecture, and refreshments (8 hours, 5 massage therapists, 2 acupuncturists, yoga instructor).  (value $ 5,700).

$10,000: Custom Wellness Party

Urban Light Mobile Wellness arranges a private wellness themed party at your desired location. We bring in catering, yoga, body care products, acupuncture, as well as massage therapy. You receive your name on trailer donor wall, tote bag, gift card for Turquoise Lounge Restaurant, and a $100 personal massage therapy gift cards.  (value $10,900)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to fund this project on a monetary level we understand. 

Instead how about giving our campaign a share?

  • Use Indiegogo share tools!
  • Follow us on Facebook/UrbanLightSD
  • Like us on Instagram@Urbanlight9009
  • Keep up to date on Twitter@UrbanLightSD
  • Check us out on LinkedIn@Urban Light Sanctuary
  • Web: www.urbanlightsanctuary.com
  • Email: info@urbanlightsanctuary.com
  • #UrbanLightMobileWellness

You receive your name on trailer donor wall, tote bag, gift card for Turquoise Lounge Restaurant, and a $100 personal massage therapy gift cards.  (value $10,900)
Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to fund this project on a monetary level we understand. 
Instead how about giving our campaign a share?

Use Indiegogo share tools!

Follow us on Facebook/UrbanLightSD

Like us on Instagram@Urbanlight9009
Keep up to date on Twitter@UrbanLightSD
Check us out on LinkedIn@Urban Light Sanctuary
Web: www.urbanlightsanctuary.com
Email: info@urbanlightsanctuary.com
#UrbanLightMobileWellness

story:
I received my BA in Expressive Healing Arts at Prescott College and license as a massage therapist at the Florida School of Massage in 2011 . For the past five years, I have traveled around the country producing wellness retreats, teaching yoga classes and creating art events.

-

The times compel me to deepen my knowledge of Thai massage: the intentionality and philosophy, the embodiment of the practice, and the ways in which it creates healing synergy between the giver and receiver.  

 

I am called Eastward

 

 

The quest to the Pacific

 

My first port of call will be Chiang Mai,Thailand, with a month long immersion in the study of Thai-massage at the Sunshine Massage School. I will immerse myself in the Thai healing arts and  practice listening and stillness at sacred temples in the surrounding areas.

 

-

My second port of call will be Porac Pampanga in the Philippines, where I will commune with my blood relatives for the first time. Connecting with my roots and embracing my family will expand the power of my healing touch.

Spreading the Healing Love

-

Throughout this journey of study and discovery,  I will be in the process of creating “DEVOTED to Thai-Massage,” which will encompass the sequences I share in my workshops; photography of Thailand, and nuggets of wisdom to share with you.

 

To know more about my work and offerings, visit:

dominiquewarfield.com

&

D E V O T E D ceremony // Artists for Cultural Peace

devotedceremony.com

 

The logistical breakdown:

This is an outline of how your financial contributions will be distributed.

Sunshine Massage School: $1,200

School courses:

8 to 12 January 2018, Yoga and Thai Massage, 5 days / 30 hours, Baht 12,500.-

22 to 26 January 2018, Thai Massage with the Feet, 5 days / 30 hours,  Baht 12,500.-

29 January to 2 February 2018, Thai Massage and the 5 Bodies, 5 days / 30 hours, Baht 12,500.

Plane tickets and transportation: $1,800

Guest house in Thailand: $600

Food: $500

Travels insurance: $400

Book production: $1,500

Art supplies: $300

 

I am asking support from my family, friends, people who have participated in my offerings and new friends to make this mission come to life.

 

With your financial contributions and spreading this campaign through your networks, you will make this quest a reality. Take a look at the perks and see all the beautiful offerings your contributions will go toward. I have designed them to honor your generous contributions.

-

**Any additional funds will go toward publishing the book, art supplies and financial compensation for all the wonderful collaborators who help me with this project. **

-

A glimpse into the future....


I am a licensed massage therapist with a vision to teach and travel as a certified national CEU provider for massage therapists (also applicable for non-massage therapists & open to all levels of interest). My services, workshops, and classes will be housed under “DEVOTED Healing Arts” , with a mission to  serve the people and to offer cross-cultural holistic healing arts for human well-being and cultural wellness.

 

future website (in progress) // devotedhealingarts.com

 

stay D E V O T E D

 

As I fly across the ocean into new spaces, I am devoted to living life with reverence for the great mystery unfolding around me with beauty and grace. I am devoted to living with my heart open and my feet rooted in the earth.

Thank you for taking your time reading this.

        I want to thank all my friends and collaborators who have helped me thus far.  As I move forward in this experience, I will live with integrity, cultural respect and continue being the light in the world.

With Metta,

Dominique Warfield

Metta- loving-kindness, benevolence

story:
Background

Imagine you are told you have a terminal illness - but instead of radiation/chemo and CAT-scans – you are sent home with a 12 question subjective survey to monitor progression -- welcome to what ALS patients hear every day. 

Every 90 mins someone is diagnosed and someone dies ... time is not an option! 

Like all of my fellow pALS (people with ALS), I was frustrated not having great answers to “what’s next - how long will I have?” Being told “only time will tell” and “every patient is unique” didn’t sit well with me. Realizing for the past 20 years the “gold standard” for ALS patients was a subjective 12 question survey (ALS FRS-R).

I did not believe that this was an accurate method for compiling critical information for the patient nor the patients’ care team - much less for clinical research. 

The Challenge

With over 25 yrs+ in data analytics and performance management helping Fortune 500 companies — there could be a more effective and easier way for patients and caregivers.  Data is in my blood (both literally and figuratively).  

Instinctively, I knew if trends haven’t been found, there were 2 reasons 

(1) the sample sizes were too small for meaningful analysis 

(2) the proper metrics were not being measured accurately. 

I knew we were at a paradigm shift of technology driven research and should be able to apply these new advancements towards ALS research and patient wellness monitoring. After all, the iPhone and FitBit were released over 10 yrs ago in 2007. 

Companies are now making "smart clothing" and according to a 2016 Accenture report -- it shows 17% of Americans over the age of 65 use wearables to track fitness or vitals such as blood pressure or heart rate. 

2016 IHS (market research company) estimates the worldwide wearables market to grow to over $11.2B by 2020 proving people are adopting Apps and Tech to not only help themselves, but they are now sharing their health and fitness data socially to motivate others as well.

And yet the medical and research fields have not widely innovated and adopted these solutions, with the exception being related to diabetes.

The Solution

So that is why I started the ALS Never Surrender foundation - a volunteer lead nonprofit progression research focused foundation. With our assembled dedicated team of volunteer advisors, industry experts, professors, medical doctors, researchers, and patients, the ALS iNVOLVE/eNGAGE App was born (currently iOS, Android under development). 

With over 80 metrics, ALS iNVOLVE/eNGAGE will empower patients and clinical researchers with scientific measurements. The APP would be free to patients, giving them the ability to personally track/share with care teams.  In addition, the data would also be accessible via a secure database for clinical researchers. 

Harnessing the massive power of these little super-computer smartphones in our pockets to #EmpowerPALS and their care teams with meaningful and actionable data. 

What ALS clinical specialists have to say - “As a therapist, this type of app would be quite helpful toward giving me a snapshot of how somebody's strength and mobility might be evolving with time, so that I can make the appropriate modifications to their treatment plan prospectively as the patient needs it. I also appreciate that as a clinical researcher, it gives patients the option to share their information to create a more comprehensive view of the ALS population as a whole.” Catherine Printz , Neuro PT Specialist - Assistant Clinical Professor - UCSF

We have partnered with leading experts & technologies for this research project:

  • Lead investigators - Dr Ravits UCSD , Professor Daniel Linseman PhD Denver University, Professor Julie Liss PhD- Associate Dean ASU
  • Analytics / Technology - Origent Data Sciences , AuralAnalytics, SAP , IBM Watson, TemplarShield Security/Compliance , FileMaker , Apple, Google , GSU

With your support we can complete the launch. Help us be a part of the future of medical research!
