story:
Helping to make the nation healthier, happier and improving individuals quality of life! 

Awareness of the importance of maintaining a healthy lifestyle is growing, bringing enormous personal and social benefits. We are part of that movement through our unique & new healthcare service delivered on the high street, providing a private clinic experience which is accessible to all through our location and price.

Help us to expand and grow our unique service and proposition and importantly help us on our mission to improve the nations health and quality of life.

Anna Davies (Company Director)

I am a qualified Sports Therapist with many years experience and a detailed knowledge of the different aspects of Sports Therapy, from lecturing, mentoring and as a practitioner through the technical theory of clinical based and pitch side experience.

My passion is to share the benefits that Sports Therapy can bring with everyone. I want to be able to help educate clients on the benefits and of Sports Therapy how it can bring life changing benefits to people’s day to day lives.

Sports Therapy as a chosen career path continues to, grow and expand, and I am also passionate about providing training and giving newly qualified Sports Therapists the opportunity to start working, while having the chance to gain as much experience and knowledge from an established and professional team to help equip them to be able to offer the best clinical treatment as possible enabling them to develop and grow.

 

This campaign is looking to raise £100k of funding. The funding is needed for our growth and expansion plan. As part of our expansion plan, it is our intention to open at least one more clinic during the current year, 2019. 

The funding will enable us to be able to secure new premises, complete the refurbishment to match the branding and style of the Reading Clinic, equip the clinic with all the vital tools and equipment to function fully and successfully. 

As well enabling us to do the above in securing a premise and making it operational, the funding will allow us to market the clinic and create excitement around the opening of the clinic. 

Our target funding is based on the experience that we have gained through setting up and establishing our first clinic in Reading. 

Growth – Expansion Strategy

We have identified two potential sites in a good location with an ideal demographic and population of circa 180k which makes it ideal for the delivery of our services and our vision.

The area we are looking to open our next Clinic, is another Town Centre location that is within 20 miles of Reading thereby ensuring we remain close to our base, the sites are located within a different county and therefore helps us to expand our brand.

One of the potential sites is in  Basingstoke which is the largest town in the county of Hampshire. It is located 30miles from Southampton, 48miles from London and 19miles from Winchester.

Basingstoke is home to Basingstoke Town Football a Semi-Professional club playing in the Southern League Premier Division South. Tom Cleverley, an English International who currently plays for Watford FC, began his football career in Basingstoke, where he was born.

The town is serviced by two large colleges, both provide vocational sports courses and other routes into higher education in sports. The largest college has a well-established connection with other local colleges and universities in nearby cities, particularly on their sports courses.

The well-established education base will provide access to Therapists and be able to offer job and work experience opportunities.

After listening to feedback from our clients and the team members, an online and in clinic merchandise stand will be set up.

We regularly recommend pieces of equipment for our clients to use for their rehabilitation and progress through care, so to be able to offer these items in clinic will complete the full service to our clients.

Having a merchandise stand within clinic and an e-store on our website will help to establish the brand and build awareness.

We are so excited to launch our first campaign. However, if we don't reach our full funding target, the funds that have been raised will still be put towards our growth and expansion plan, as well as concentrated marketing for the Reading clinic. 

Being a company within the sports and fitness industry as well as a unique healthcare provider, our perks represent what we are about and the services we offer. 

Even from the smallest contribution, you are guaranteed to receive a branded, invaluable and useful perk. 

The long term vision is for us to be delivering our unique experiences across the UK with multiple town and city centre locations so this is just the start of an exciting journey.

 

Overview and Mission Statement

At Therapists for You we passionately believe that everyone deserves the right to the highest standards of care.

We are committed to providing affordable therapy services for everyone, whether it be for sporting injuries or general well being.

We are a Reading Town Centre based business offering easy access to our services for clients. All our future clinics will be town and city centre located making accessibility easy.

Our clinic provides professionally qualified Therapists who deliver a fast, professional, efficient and affordable range of therapies and treatments that can help alleviate and reduce stress, tension, aches and pains, and support general fitness and enhance an overall sense of wellbeing.

Our clients do not l have to suffer the long waiting lists of hospital referrals nor indeed seek the services of expensive private clinics. Ensuring we deliver our exclusive private clinic service at low prices makes us available to all and unique in what we do.

 Our Clients receive early attention and assessment in private treatment rooms and are treated by qualified professional therapists

Our Mission is to provide an affordable and easily accessible treatment solution for everybody. We have set out to create a clinical environment that offers the highest professional level of treatment, with the standard that you would expect to receive from an exclusive Private Clinic.

We are a walk-in facility, however many of our regular clients tend to book appointments in advance.

Our strategic aim is to generate and create employment as we expand our business.

To offer work experience to students and graduates.

​I also want to give an enormous shout out to the wonderful team of Therapists and Reception staff that we have. They are the heart and soul of what we do.  I would love to see more amazing Therapists become team members across towns and cities in the UK one day.

We will become aligned and engage with the ‘Get Active’ trend of keeping people moving in our quest to improve their health and well-being. It is our intention to assist in creating a healthier, happier fitness regime that will be respected and enjoyed by Society in general.

 

Advantages for our clients:

  • Fully qualified and experienced professional Therapists.
  • Quick and efficient access to treatment. No lengthy waiting times.
  • Private well-equipped treatment rooms.
  • Range of services to include Sports Massage, Yoga, Pilates, Chiropractor, Dry Needling, plus Assessment and advice on general fitness programmes.
  • Walk in and Online Booking.
  •  Our Clinic opened in the centre of Reading, on the outskirts of London, eighteen months ago.
  • Our Client base is growing steadily month by month. We are treating in excess of 500 clients each month.
  • We have a current database of over 4000 registered clients and are continuing to add new clients each month.

 

Company Success Stories

Reading Half Marathon

In 2019 we were one of the main sponsors for the Reading half marathon, the largest event of its type in the South of England. The Reading Half Marathon is well known to the Marathon community as Reading is now the chosen training event for the London Marathon, it is the only Half Marathon to offer competitive places to elite runners.

As part of our support for the event we provided the pre and post event sports therapy and massage for the competitors.

On race day, we saw circa 100 runners, all receiving mainly post event sports massage. We offered advice and recommendations for injuries picked up during the event. All the services we provided on the day were completely free of charge to the participants.

We have happily accepted the invitation to attend again next year on a larger scale. From this year, we have learnt a lot and know how we can improve the experience for next year.

At any event we attend, with our merchandise stand packed with our branded items which are available for purchase.

 

Awards

Within the first year of opening our first clinic in Reading we were proud and honoured to have won two awards, the first being, Venus Women in Business, Small Business Award for the Thames Valley. The second was the Reading Retail Awards for Health and Wellbeing, this award was solely won through nominations and votes from our Clients. 

We hope to be in the running for the Reading Retail Award again this year, we have already been notified that we have been nominated!

 

 

What our Clients Say…

We proudly hold a 5-star rating on Google from reviews and ratings from our Clients.

” Was amazing and can’t wait for my next appointment.”

“Have made second session with T.O.T.H.S, is brilliant.”

“Listened to the reason I hurt. Friendly, really good treatment. hurt but in a good way. Have booked to go back.”

“I had one of the senior therapists and she was extremely good. The best massage I have had in a long time”

“This massage centre is having professional therapists, very polite and good advice from them after massage. They know how to treat any injury, muscle pain. Highly recommended. It's worth to go here and treat yourself, will go again and again. Good value for money.”

The list goes on….Please visit our website or Google Review and see more of what our clients have to say.

 

Why Sports Therapy

It is well publicised and known that being active is encouraged by all medical professionals, nutritionists, and employers (especially large corporate’s). This message is spread across all social media and media channels daily.

The impact an active lifestyle has on your health and wellbeing is unarguable. It is widely recognised the benefits being active has, it offers huge health benefits, reducing your risks of some of the largest health risks.

Sustrans state that, ‘there is an approximate 30% reduction in risk for all-cause mortality, across all studies, when comparing the most active with the least active.

From the huge push to encourage the nation to become more active, there has been a noticeable rise in the number of sports clubs/teams forming and expanding.

It is estimated that there are circa 1,400 running clubs across the UK. You will now easily find a running Club in every village, town and city.

In support of the growth of running in general, the rise and popularity of park runs has expanded greatly, with there now being a park run every Saturday morning in over 1,400 locations in twenty-three countries, across five continents.

Cycling UK states that, ‘in 2011, 741,000 working residents aged 16 to74 cycled to work. Another 50,000 or so people use bikes as part of a longer journey.’ Also, ‘The number of people living in London who cycled to work more than doubled from 77,000 in 2001 to 155,000 in 2011.’

This just shows the huge number of people consciously trying to be active, it also shows how the demands to stay active is incorporated into daily lifestyle and isn’t always an extra curriculum activity.

The benefit of an active lifestyle to the individual is unquestionable and the more active and healthier the nation is it also brings an enormous benefit to society as whole. 

To compliment the demand for active lifestyles and enable people to continue to be active, the need for musculoskeletal therapists is in high demand.

Sports Therapy is a newly fast developing industry, running alongside Physiotherapy with very similar links and crossovers relating to how each field approaches assessments and treatments. Sports Therapy has become a well-accepted alternative to Physiotherapy. As the public has learnt more and gained more knowledge about Sports Therapy and the holistic hands on approach it has quickly become the favoured treatment option.

Both Physiotherapists and Sports Therapists are highly educated in dealing with musculoskeletal disorders, treating pain and injury through hands-on treatment modalities, rehabilitation and patient education. They both focus on restoring, maintaining and maximising movement, relieving pain and increasing a better quality of life.

The Clinic prides itself on the information shared with our clients, we regularly run free classes workshops on stretching, foam rolling, and other topics that are for the public helping to further increase the awareness of maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

The difference between Sports Therapy and Physiotherapy

Sport Therapist do their training in clinics and sports clubs.

Sports therapists are experts in musculoskeletal disorders. They treat pain and injury through hands on treatment and rehabilitation.

Sports Therapists undergo an intensive three-year degree course which  focusses primarily on the musculoskeletal system and on restoring, maintaining and maximising movement to relieve pain and increase quality of life.

Sports therapists generally have more exposure to sporting environments at an undergraduate level making them ideal for preventing sports injuries through specific strengthening programmes.

Physiotherapy has been around the longest. There are large subsections within the subject of Physiotherapy, namely:

  • Muscular-Skeletal – problems with your muscles and bone
  • Neurology – rehabilitation from stuff such as – heart attacks, strokes
  • Respiratory – help with lung related issues

Physiotherapist do their training in hospitals and work with doctors and nurses.  They are mainly medical based.

The role of the Physiotherapists is to help people affected by injury, illness or disability through movement and exercise, manual therapy, education and advice. They maintain health for people of all ages, helping patients to manage pain and prevent disease. 

As a new start up company, we appreciate and do not take for granted the hard work and risks involved in this project. There were many obstacles that we had to overcome when setting up and establishing the Reading clinic. These challenges just made us more determined to succeed in delivering our vision and brought  us great knowledge and understanding of how to successfully address and overcome barriers and issues. We have achieved the client base and growth without any formal marketing as we have not had the resources to invest heavily in this area, as all our capital and income has been put into the clinic itself. The fact that we can successfully establish and grow the business without a big marketing budget has shown that the demand for our services and unique approach is there. Imagine what we could do with more resources.....  

I am passionate about the service we provide and how we provide it as well as offering employment opportunities to professionals from the Sport Therapy industry. I truly believe that everyone should have access to healthcare that bring real positive change to their physical and mental well-being and hope that you would like to be part of this movement as well.

Become part of our new movement and donate today to help bring Sports Therapy to high streets across the UK.

Any contribution to this campaign is greatly appreciated. 

If you cannot contribute financially, we would appreciate it if you could help us to spread the word about this campaign and Therapists on the High Street. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to help make some noise about the campaign.

There were many obstacles that we had to overcome when setting up and establishing the Reading clinic. These challenges just made us more determined to succeed in delivering our vision and brought  us great knowledge and understanding of how to successfully address and overcome barriers and issues. We have achieved the client base and growth without any formal marketing as we have not had the resources to invest heavily in this area, as all our capital and income has been put into the clinic itself. The fact that we can successfully establish and grow the business without a big marketing budget has shown that the demand for our services and unique approach is there. Imagine what we could do with more resources.....  

I am passionate about the service we provide and how we provide it as well as offering employment opportunities to professionals from the Sport Therapy industry. I truly believe that everyone should have access to healthcare that bring real positive change to their physical and mental well-being and hope that you would like to be part of this movement as well.
Become part of our new movement and donate today to help bring Sports Therapy to high streets across the UK.
Any contribution to this campaign is greatly appreciated. If you cannot contribute financially, we would appreciate it if you could help us to spread the word about this campaign and Therapists on the High Street. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to help make some noise about the campaign.

story:
OUR PROJECT

Arts Republic of Knowlesville project (ARK) is named after Arthur Koberinski, a close friend, neighbour and generous individual who died unexpectedly Feb 2018.  His newly purchased house (assessed at $37K) was passed to me for a number of reasons in the early part of 2019, by his son Adam and through Arts sister, Jodi Koberinski..  Attempting to following Art's dream of fixing up the house and using at as both residential space to the community and social space, I will walk in his path aiming to fulfill this goal, investing in this vibrant rural community called Knowlesville. Along the way thusfar, a friend has committed 10K cash towards this project!! which brings us to this campaign.

For a better standard of living, our culture needs 'some change'. For people to 'change', we need living examples. Founded in permaculture, and thus by design, this unique low-cost member-run resource center & learning space is also a simple stepping stone to individuals/families owning their own land, and learning life skills along the way. Join us in a dynamic multi-purpose living environment architecturally, environmentally and socially at Arts Republic of Knowlesville.

 

COMMUNITY CONTEXT

The house is in good shape for an older home and we feel that we can create the ARK within two years of nurturing it and setting clear milestones. Knowlesville, New Brunswick is a vibrant (some may say magical place) and is the best spot possible for this project.  My name is J. Alexander Murray and I have spent the last 9 years practicing permaculture and living off-grid in knowlesville, NB.  Parent of an amazing four-year old, who was birthed in a house I hand built, walking distance down the road, we have come to call this neighborhood home. 

I am primary resident and member of a growing, but currently ten family strong community of homesteaders, effectively co-owning & stewarding around 130 acres in the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains called the South Knowlesville Neighbourhood Co-op. The Co-op provides a lifetime lease of up to a hectare per family/individual. There are two conditions, that you stay in the neighbourhood for a year prior to building and, that this gift of land within the community becomes your primary residence.

The building we are calling the ARK (Arts Republic of Knowlesville) is located walking distance to this growing rural community increases the value, and increases the chance for integration.  For example, most buildings run on solar, while all are off-grid completely and do not have the option of attaching to the grid, where the ARK does; meeting the needs of our member-run access center with facilities like laundry, kitchen and office, tool workshop, etc. The house has a near 2000sq footprint and can meet many needs, and many locals are excited to see it grow into valuable local resource.

With 20 years of experience organizing events, and almost as long living with in some manner of communal living,  we can see a building like the ARK (as a residence on one floor and member run resource center on the main floor), and the manner in which it has come about, becoming an obvious asset to the local rural neighbourhood, as well as the community of off-grid homesteaders. 

This might be the first time we’ve done a public funding campaign, but when it comes to following through on campaigns we have many years of experience.  See the annual permaculture inspired art festival - the Praxis Project, and involvement in the South Knowlesville Neighbourhood Coop.  Over the past seven years project manager Alex has designed and completion his off-grid home, greenhouses, multiple out-buildings including geodesic domes, outdoor kitchen and eating spaces and finally colder season tolerant zone 3-5 permaculture orchard design and implementation.

We are so close!  This house is already accepted as part of our local NB total home renovation rebate program (aimed at helping become more energy efficient), so we have the go ahead on specific rebates that we are eligible for (outlined HERE).  

 

 

 

HERE’S HOW YOU CAN HELP

PLEASE SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN: We need to form a network of supporters & influencers that can help spread this project farther than we can reach. 

PLEASE DONATE: We need more money to help us pay for the final portion of eco-renovations to enable this project.  This opportunity to join us monetarily really does help so much. 

PLEASE JOIN US: We need active people to help us live out these goals.  Do you know a tradesperson, labourer or interested human willing to join us physically in this journey?  We would love to hear from you, and them!

IN-KIND SUPPORT: We know that people can’t always give cash, but that doesn’t mean you can’t be part of making this beautiful project happen! Some options include:

  • Volunteering as a labourer at upcoming workshops. We may be able to help you out with accommodation while on-site.
  • Childcare - so that everyone can participate, even parents!
  • Meal preparation - for work parties
  • In-kind donation of supplies - If you have something that might be of use, please reach out and we can talk more about this
  • Equipment lending – We will need to use lots of tools... maybe you have some!!

 

 

See how we are making this happen HERE

 

Risks & Challenges can be found HERE

 

Find our more about me HERE

 

Thank you for your time here, and in the future!

 

 

 

If we don't reach our goal this will still happen!

If we don't reach our goal right now we will continue on our efforts, than ask again.  We are also looking at public funding as well.

 

 

 

Let us tell you about our perks!!

  • $10 - Facebook or Twitter thank you post with link
  • $25 - Elderberry plant & stinging nettle Duo rooted in a 6" bucket w soil from Ditch Rich Nurseries (pick-up only) OR x 10 handprinted / silk screened patches - farmer, plants or radical varieties by Blank Space (mailed to you)
  • $30 - 8L of Compost Tea - ready to go from Ditch Rich Nurseries (pick-up only)
  • $50 - Limited Edition T-Shirt from the ARK OR one comfrey and one red rasp plant each in one 6" bucket of soil from Ditch Rich Nurseries  (pick up only) OR Radicle Root Herbs Rescue Remedy (mailed to you)
  • $60 - Twelve bottles of Grammy B - master preserver's canned preserves - pickles, relish, vegetables 500ml (pick up only) OR Tray of fifteen ready to transplant 4" seedlings -spinach, arugula, lettuce from Ditch Rich Nurseries - (pick up only)  
  • $75 - In-house Workshop Space Rental Fee Waived at the ARK 
  • $100 - limited edition hoodie AKA hooded sweatshirt by the ARK  (mailed to you) OR  One graphic design job (x1) for free by J. Alexander Murray (done remotely)
  • $200 - Herbal Pregnancy kit from Radicle Root Herbs - made up of teas, salts, salves & tinctures (mailed to you) OR Two cases of Grammy B preserves - pickles, relish, vegetables - 500ml jars (pick up only) OR One ALL ACCESS WEEKEND MEMBERSHIP to the Permaculture Inspired Art Festival - the Praxis Project - June 7th-9th 
  • $300 - One Weekend Bed & Breakfast experience for one at the ARK - all food included 
  • $500 - Red Worm and Compost Tea Starter kit (bacteria packs, airpump, tubes, bucket, worms & stacking habitat via Ditch Rich Nurseries (mailed to you)
  • $600 - Radical Zine Library for you! from the collection shared with us by Blank Space (100 new copies of your choice from a list of titles we mail to you) 
  • $900 - Family Kite kit from Little Cloud Kites (2 kids and one adult)
  • $1000 - Tent site, Bedding and tickets to the Praxis Project for group of four   
  • $2000 - Permaculture Design (of your choice of land) by J. Alexander Murray from Ditch Rich Nurseries (ON, QC, NB, NS, PEI only unless travel is provided)
  • $3000 - Room dedicated to you for 4 months with access to all workshops and activities at the ARK    
  • $4000 - Room dedicated to you for 6 months with access to all workshops and activities at the ARK    
  • $5000 - Room dedicated to you for an entire year at the space w/ access to all the workshops and activities at the ARK

 

 

The Impact

This project could be valuable to you for a few reasons.  One, you personally want this to exist, or in general you like the idea of more permaculture designed examples and learning spaces to exist. Two, you may be very interested in the perks, as we have made them pretty amazing!  You are happily invited and encouraged to visit the ARK as a contributor, picking raspberries, attending a workshop, camping in area, etc. 

We want you to support this project because the impacts are far stretching in our location and the example set reaches far beyond our location.  

In an small community word travels fast (Hi neighbours), and in a pond the size of knowlesville, a ripple usually reaches the edges of the water.  ARK will effect, over time indirectly and directly, all residents locally.  Through the straight forward and simple daily and weekly needs like high speed internet access to laundry facilities to the farther reaching effects like how affordable workshops via free teaching space for members effect the neighbourhood; teaching topics like permaculture, home preservation and natural building will create examples and offer a helping hand through the transition to more community trust, abundance and resilience.

In this world now, in this time, through our perspective, a commitment to land, and how it is used, is of utmost importance; revolutionary. Make a stand; a dedication to protect & invest in the land base that gives us our future food, water, shelter and medicine.  That land that gave you a place to play and now does so for our children while we find a place to sit in the sun appreciating time.  We want to make this world a better place for those in it, as you probably do too,  This project in partnership with the south knowlesville neighbourhood coop (AKA land trust) are removing a barrier toward access to land, life skill lessons, land based resources identification, relationship building activities and more.  

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand!  You might not be able to help with dollar dollar bills atm, but don't let that scare you away.  if you read this far, i can bet you like the idea and want to see how it unfolds.  You can help us many ways if you so choose to use your time instead of your money ;)  we would value this so very much too!  

You can share our campaign on the world wide web or show it to your family and friends.  Below is a cut n past ready paragraph (don't forget to add the url link) with a link you can email to a group of people you know would want to hear about this.

"Hi.  This Indigogo campaign is something worth looking at!  Permaculture designed resource center and residence, eco-renovation and part of an off grid community in New Brunswick.  I thought of you right away..  Please take a look !  and maybe share:)"

You can also join us in the labour driven moments of execution!  As mentioned there are many labour moments, so we could definitely find value in you joining us.  we can feed you and possibly house you or show you to a camping space if your staying over night.  We are offering many workshop and learning moments during the work, and this is an all ages space, so you can bring your little ones.

As workers, sometimes its hard to find time to cook, or to stop.  Even if you cannot help with the physical labour, visiting us and bringing us good cheer, possibly food or snacks, or even entertaining our children can be of great value.  We want you to see the space and to have a hand in its creation! 

Thank you for your time here, and in the future!

story:
Aloha everyone!

My name is yasmine and I was born and raised here in hawaii. 
Growing up my parents always have been very health-conscious and proactive about their body's wellness. 
That made me aware from a very young age and I learned how important that is. As a professional tattooer for 12 years I had a lot of back pain. It just got worse after the birth of my daughter. 
Like so many people I began to seek treatments, knowing I didn’t want to take pharmaceutical  pain killers, I began my search on the natural path. 
I came across ice baths when a friend of mine swore by them, so I tried it! That evening I had no pain for the first time in 5 years at least, I cried tears of joy and relief. 
 

I talk to a lot of people and there was a common affliction, body pain. I was so inspired that I began to tell everyone about ice baths. Then I learned the combination of sauna with the cold plunge was the best path for maximum benefits.
One day I decided I wanted to bring this treatment to the community and the journey of how to do that began. 

These contributions will help me share this amazing body treatment with my community here on maui!

Do you suffer from pain in your body?

Are you having trouble sleeping?

Do you have brain fog?

Could your chronic body trauma be relieved?

 

10k is my goal-This will help me with daily operation costs for the first 6 months. 

This cold plunge & Infrared sauna combination is the key. 

Health benefits include but are not limited to:

 

Reducing inflammation 

Overall immune system health 

Mental clarity 

Boosts energy 

Reduces muscle soreness 

Resiliency in athletics 

Mood elevation 

Sleep 

Skin health

story:
In our busy day to day lives it’s often difficult to find time to allow mindfulness and Mind/Body connection to grow. Imagine walking into a space that just felt comfortable. That offered aesthetics and atmosphere meant to inspire a peaceful and relaxing response within the physical body. Giving Tree Healing Arts Center seeks to be this space. A peaceful place where many can offer their healing abilities and where many will benefit from using their services

This center will be a hub for holistic and spiritual services such as Reiki, acupuncture, energy work, mindfulness training, sound healing and more. In addition it will create a gathering space for those needing a moment in the garden, a glance at beautiful art or simply a cup of tea with a friend.

Giving Tree Healing Arts Center will also be a resource for practitioners in our community. A source of personal and professional growth- but also- a practical place available to rent so that offering important services such as Reiki or bodywork becomes a realistic and convenient endeavor.

We know not everyone can support financially, and that’s ok. You can help us create awareness by “sharing” this campaign in your social networks or by word of mouth. Come see the space, walk through the garden and/or join in one of the impromptu music sessions on the front porch. We hope to see you soon!

Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GivingTreeCenter/

Some images of our "perks" are below. If you've chosen one, we welcome you to pick it up and enjoy visiting our healing center. We will also mail them if you prefer. 

Notecards

Giving Tree Mindfulness Packet

Stunning RiverStone Mandalas

Giving Tree Painting

Now he needs more of our collective  support. His road to healing will call for extensive physical theray, a plant based routine, rest and prayers. The time to demonstrate love and concern for our brother is now.  What people are saying:

story:
We are the exploration of reduction of symptoms of PTSD in Veterans using Equine Assisted Psychotherapy (EAP). Certified therapy horses will distinguish between neurotypical humans and Veterans experiencing psychological trauma. Evident through different behaviors and physiological parameters, horses will mirror back to the Veterans, creating the environmental conditions for healing and recovery.

We now have our first horse, Doc Brown, saved from the wild and adopted through the BLM.  We need your help to fund his training to become a therapy horse. Once trained, he'll help save the lives of Veterans.
story_txt:
We are the exploration of reduction of symptoms of PTSD in Veterans using Equine Assisted Psychotherapy (EAP). Certified therapy horses will distinguish between neurotypical humans and Veterans experiencing psychological trauma. Evident through different behaviors and physiological parameters, horses will mirror back to the Veterans, creating the environmental conditions for healing and recovery.
We now have our first horse, Doc Brown, saved from the wild and adopted through the BLM.  We need your help to fund his training to become a therapy horse. Once trained, he'll help save the lives of Veterans.

story:
WHO AM I AND WHAT IS MY STORY?

Very early in my career as a young, graphic designer working in a prestigious Boston consulting firm, I was relentlessly driven to continuously improve my knowledge, skills and effectiveness and soon realized that helping others do the same was my true calling. I spent the next 23 years fulfilling that passion by working my way up as a corporate learning and development professional in large, global high-tech companies, specializing in leadership development.

Around the time I was turning 50, and soon after becoming a volunteer coach for Girls on the Run™ (a national non-profit whose mission is to inspire young girls to be joyful, healthy and confident) something started to feel really missing from my corporate life and I had The Big Epiphany: The optimal time to inspire and develop our future female leaders is before they enter the workforce. This realization awakened, inspired and motivated me to focus my training and coaching primarily on women and young girls so I mustered up the courage, took the leap of faith and started my own leadership development training, coaching and consulting business: ENSO Life by Design.

ABOUT ENSO LIFE BY DESIGN

In Zen Buddhism, an ensō is a circle that is hand-drawn in one or two uninhibited brushstrokes to express a moment when the mind is free to let the body create. The circle may be open or closed but when open the circle is incomplete, allowing for movement and development and honoring the beauty of imperfection.

All my training, coaching and consulting is based on the science-based principles and evidence from the fields of neuroscience and positive psychology and more than 20 years of real-world hands-on experience. I have accumulated a vast collection of resources, principles, philosophies and approaches and packaged it all into one singularly focused vision and mission: To help you remember who you truly are and figure out what you were born to do so that you can be truly happy, successful and at peace with your life.  

WHAT IS THE “REDESIGN YOUR LIFE” WORKSHOP / RETREAT FOR WOMEN?

Sometimes a redesign is a quick and simple tweak and sometimes it requires a wrecking ball. In either case, we never need to settle for anything less than what our heart truly desires because we are the designers of our own lives. The 2018 “Redesign Your Life” workshop / retreat for women takes place one Saturday per month for five consecutive months from 8:30 am– 4:30 pm in 2018 on: February 10, March 3, April 7, May 5 and June 2. It encompasses information, knowledge, experience, activities and tools from a wide variety of sources including breakthrough discoveries from the fields of neuroscience and positive psychology and consolidates and compresses it all into one rich, experiential, productive, inspirational and fun learning, growth and development process. The result? Acquire key insights about where you are today and why, where you want to be and how to get there and then dig deep to muster up the courage and confidence that is already within you to let yourself fly.

Part Workshop, Part Retreat?

If we want different / better results, we must do the work…there simply is no escaping that fact. However, all work and no play is not sustainable…we need to take a break, get away, slow down, get quiet and tune in to prepare ourselves for the journey of self development and growth. The holistic design of the workshop / retreat structure includes and integrates informative / educational, experiential and reflective learning modalities.

How Does It Work?

Personal growth and development is a process…a journey…not an event. Spending a day, a weekend or even a week participating in a learning program rarely yields the desired or expected return on investment of time and money. The intentional time and space between each monthly session allows the seeds of learning and inspiration to germinate and take root. You will be assigned simple, manageable tasks to complete on your own which will increase your retention and accelerate your progress and results. You also have the option of unlimited phone coaching / consultation between each monthly session. 

What Are The Expected Results?
While the specific outcomes and changes each individual woman desires and achieves will vary, all participants will gain: 1) key insights about where they are today and why; 2) actionable clarity about where their heart truly wants them to be and; 3) the support you need and deserve to help you unleash the courage that is already inside you to redesign your life.

What Topics are Covered?
•    Self Compassion / Self Care / Resiliency
•    Slowing Down / Getting Quiet / Being Still
•    Mind-Body Connection / Physical Movement / Energy
•    Connecting with Nature and Beauty
•    Clearing the Clutter / Letting Go of Obstacles
•    Creativity / Self Expression / The Power of Play
•    Abundance Mindset / Gratitude / Generosity
•    Action Planning / Sustaining and Maintaining

Where Does the Workshop / Retreat Take Place?
The monthly sessions are held at Alnoba: “Where Inspiration Meets Action.” Wonderfully secluded in the woods of Kensington, NH yet easily accessible by car, Alnoba is just one hour from Boston, Concord, NH and Portland, ME, 20 minutes from Portsmouth, NH and just minutes off Routes 95 and 495.

What Is Included in the Workshop / Retreat?
•    Five full days (one Saturday a month for five consecutive months) of professionally designed and facilitated educational workshops and inspirational personal retreat experiences.
•    Access to 400 protected acres of fields, woodlands, ponds, walking trails and scenic spots to linger and reflect.
•    Access to a variety of inviting indoor spaces within an expansive newly constructed state-of-the-art sustainable meeting facility.
•    Healthy farm-to-table breakfast, lunch and snacks each day.
•    Unlimited coaching / consultation between monthly sessions.
•    All learning materials and supplies.
(Travel and / or accommodation expenses are not included.)


Who Are the Session Leaders?
I am the Lead Facilitator and am joined by four amazing Supporting Faculty who are inspiring experts in the fields of yoga / meditation, fitness, creativity and vocal expression.

Debra Schuler – has more than 20 years of experience in corporate learning and development with an emphasis on personal effectiveness and leadership. Since redesigning her own life and launching “ENSO Life by Design” in February 2016, she has narrowed and deepened her focus on helping people lead themselves and their lives with more clarity, purpose and intention to achieve greater fulfillment, joy, success and happiness. www.ensolifebydesign.com

Hannelore Moebius - (C-IAYT, E-RYT 500, APP) is a Yoga Therapist and Ayurvedic Practitioner originally from Germany. She was the founder and director of The Prana Studio for Yoga & Health in Durham, NH for 20 years and continues to share her compassionate and meditative approach in Yoga classes, workshops, Polarity and Reiki sessions, and has offered several Therapeutic Yoga Teacher Training Programs. www.moebius-yoga.com

Alexandra Poulis - started dancing at the age of four and after discovering her love for fitness soon after graduating from the University of NH became an AFAA Certified Group Fitness Instructor and Personal Trainer. She owns her own fitness studio, “Fierce Fit,” a welcoming and fun environment for movement and giving back to the community. www.FierceFitNH.com

Lesley Arnold – is an entrepreneur who is passionate about creative expression and community outreach. She owned / operated a second-hand store supporting local NH charities and has her own painting studio called “Wet Paint.” She loves encouraging people to discover and reconnect with their innate creativity through art and the joy and healing that comes from her work. www.wetpaintnh.com

 

Claude Stein – is a Multi-Platinum award winning voice coach and pioneer in the use of expressive performance techniques to build confidence. His approach and coaching help people align their inner and outer voices to create authentic and empowering messages, deeper emotional connection and transformational personal change and growth. www.claudestein.com

 

WHAT I AM ASKING FOR AND WHY?

Given the incredibly inspirational venue and highly experienced and talented faculty, the cost for participating in this 5-month program ranges from $1,500 0 $2,250 per person depending on how early or late you register. While there are several women already registered, I have found the cost to be prohibitive for many women who do not come from the corporate world. My goal and mission is to make this life-changing experience accessible for many more women and to that end, I have personally donated six scholarships for women who need and want this but cannot afford to pay. I am asking for that to be matched with an additional six scholarships to be funded by those of you out there who see the value and want to help more women benefit from this experience.

THE IMPACT YOUR SUPPORT COULD HAVE

Change the world by making it a happier, more peaceful place. No, I’m not joking. I am totally serious. Peace in the world starts with peace in oneself and peace in one’s self comes from finding and living your purpose and reconnecting with your joy. As Mahatma Gandhi said, “Be the change that you wish to see in the world.” I truly believe that unless or until we are at peace and happy within ourselves, there is very little hope of bringing peace and happiness into the world.

story:
Rehab Revolution

The old ways of dealing with addiction and mental afflictions must go - we need a new, holistic approach that takes mind, body AND spirit into consideration. On October 1st, we are launching our first rehab programme/meditation study, which we hope will set a new and improved standard for all future dealings with addiction. Here's where we go wrong today:

Sobriety is not our end goal, it's simply a byproduct of the deepened sense of happiness, contentment and self-love that is the foundation of Kundalini Yoga and, hence, our programme. 

We have worked night and day for the down payment (€ 10 000) of the venue, which is located in the lush and beautiful backcountry of South Africa, a few hours outside of Cape Town, so we have already gathered 1/10th ourselves, but we need your donations to pay for the costly brain scans and operational expenses.

We believe that the Kundalini practice for addiction, "meditation for habituation", targets and tweaks the insular cortex, which has proven to be an integral part of the brain when it comes to addictive behaviour. Besides this neurological aspect, the healing technology of Kundalini Yoga also allows us to deal with our traumas on a psychological, biological, mental and spiritual level. 

There's a successful addiction treatment called "Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation", which targets the insula, and it works through the temple lobe, just like our meditation, but it is only available at a few hospitals. We believe that this meditation is even more efficient, as it also forces us to deal with our core issues, rather than being a "quick fix".

By donating to our cause, not only will you help our first group of 12 people to heal themselves, but everyone facing the same challenges in the future, knowing they can heal themselves for free, at home, doing this meditation.

According to yogic philosophy, we are all the co-creators of our universe, and our participants will be treated as such. 

What We Need

  • At least € 108 000 by October 1st, or € 9000 per participant, which breaks down to the following:
  • € 6000 per participant for MRI scans before and after completing the programme
  • € 22 000 for the venue
  • € 14 000 for operational expenses (food and transportation, medical staff etc)

What We'll Provide

  • Great locally produced vegetarian & vegan food: learn how to nurture yourself through food.
  • Kundalini Yoga Teachers with personal experience of overcoming addiction.
  • A deep, profound and applicable teacher's level understanding of Yoga
  • A 9-day excursion into the wilderness: learn basic survival skills and build self-esteem.
  • Guest teachers from different traditions.
  • Teacher Plants: we cooperate with an ibogaine center, for those participants willing.
  • A highly experienced ground team with medical and spiritual training.
  • The proper, sustainable tools to live according to your highest purpose and potential.
  • Promoting instead of demoting habits
  • A network of caring people

If we end up with less than € 108 000, we will proceed with the programme anyway, and simply adjust it accordingly. We will be 100% transparent and account for every cent that is put in to this project. 

Short FAQ:

  • Is the programme free for the participants?
    No. "If you come empty-handed, you leave empty-handed". The minimum requirement is that every participant pay for the flight, and, if possible, make a donation to the campaign according to their individual, financial situation.
  • Can I apply?
    Yes. Please send an email to reconfigure@behandlingsyoga.se 
  • I have never tried yoga. Can I still apply?
    Yes. We will begin at a beginner's level and adjust everything after everyone's individual ability.
  • Where can I read more about how and why Kundalini Yoga works?
    Here's a general summary. And here's a more specific, rehab-oriented explanation.
  • Is Ibogaine a cure for addiction?
    No. A "cure" suggests an outside solution, but we need to find it within ourselves, so there is no "cure" in that sense, only lessons to be learned, but ibogaine is pretty much as close as you get, since you condense a lifetime of lessons into a 24 hour session.
  • I would like to participate in the programme but can't be away for 60 days. What do I do?
    Do your best at home! See if you can find a yoga studio close to where you live. If you can't find one, there are thousands of kundalini yoga tutorials and videos online. Nothing beats the own experience - try a "kriya" or a meditation and see what it does for you.
  • What do I get for contributing?
    You get the chance to help and be part of something greater than your ego. However, ego might work in our favour sometimes. If you'd like to make a game-changing donation, we'd be willing to name our programme and/or the supposed meditation effect after you.
  • How can I help if I can't donate?
    Please share our video to everyone you know. Our project is pretty much dependant on the public interest in it, we need all the help we can get.
  • How are you supposed to raise € 108 000 in less than two months?
    With your help. Please donate :)
  • Where can I read more?
    The computer containing the english version of our website just crashed, but it's still full of useful links. You can also visit our facebook page. We will also be posting videos where we go more into detail about our methodology.

story:
Who are we:

My name is Erika Thayer and I am the owner and founder of the Bainbridge Apothecary and Tea shop on beautiful Bainbridge Island, Washington.

We started this adventure with the hope of creating a magical, sacred space where all that came here would find a relaxing, soulful experience.  The Apothecary was designed for artisan Alchemists to showcase the lost art of healing through herbology. and Our little Tea house has become a charming respite in an anxiety filled world.

In March we are opening Bainbridge WildCraft, the art of Holistic Living.  This third location will be focused on creating wellness of the home with plants, art, gifts, classes and events.

Now we want to enhance this experience with an expanded element of nature. We need a place that will bring all of these offerings together in an enchanting culmination.  These gifts of the earth will become the focal point the entire venture.

What we are proposing:

To create an additional area of tranquility in the back part of the property.  Currently, it is an unfinished gravel lot that we would like to transform into the Garden of Avalon. This will be an inclusive sanctuary for our collective future to feel welcome and replenished.

Our Need:

With stones, landscaping, equipment, labor, plants, flowers, trees and irrigation, we are looking for $23,000 to complete our project. The space is going to highlight several vignettes like butterfly flowers, zen respite, hummingbird refuge, memorial tree,  happy bees wildflowers, and chefs culinary herb garden. We are looking for support in procuring the labor and supplies to make this a dream a reality. 

A Bit of Risk:

Opening last year was a bit scary.  We decided to hold off on the garden until we knew the business's were going to okay. What we found was that this was exactly what people were looking for in a safe place to escape. We will move forward with this with any help we can get.  If we don't make our goal it will just take longer and put a strain on the shops that provide our services. We would really welcome any assistance.

Our Most Sincere Gratitude: 

Thank you for listening to our story.  We are so grateful and humbled by this experience and look forward to creating something magical for all that need a safe place!

story:
Who is Poppy?

Poppy is a comfort stuffy professionally designed by M.I. Friends to connect children to support videos and activities to work through their anxieties, while also giving parents the tools and resources to support their child as they learn to self-regulate. Poppy can help you and your child to manage stressful situations when big feelings arise. Poppy (the character) was developed and is performed by two of Canada's leading puppeteers. 

We are only  producing 1000 stuffies to start: so get yours now! 

What is M.I. Friends? 

M.I. Friends provides families with tools, videos and resources to help children build resiliency. Working through worries, big feelings and anxieties is all part of childhood. This has been amplified dramatically due to the pandemic. M.I. Friends have been developed to support parents as they help their children co- regulate their feelings. 

Visit our website

Who developed Poppy & her resources? 

Along with M.I. Friends, Poppy has been developed with experts in the Faculty of Education at Western University in London, Ontario and educational advisors with over 25 years of experience helping children and their families manage their feelings.

M.I. Friends has been working successfully with school boards, medical and community groups across Southwestern Ontario for over 5 years. Working with the Kids Mental Health Optimist Club of Canada, we aim to aid families in starting conversations, supporting early intervention, and helping to create a community of support for families struggling with mental health.

 

How does Poppy help children? 

Poppy is a cozy stuffy who builds an instant connection with your child during anxious times. Beyond her soft plush body,  she was also given soft velvet ears and feet padding to provide tactile reassurance. 

 Poppy comes with her own carrying bag and a certificate of support. After purchase, you will receive an email containing a survey that will allow you online access to our support program filled with strategies, resources and support videos starring Poppy.  If you purchased Poppy for someone else, you can easily share the link with the recipient. Starting with five videos: An introduction (as seen above), and 4 support videos, Poppy will help you and your child to work through big feelings. Activity pages, photos and printouts are also included. The goal is to provide families with strategies to help their child overcome big feelings and build resiliency. 

Another way Poppy and M.I. Friends supports children's mental health

A portion from every sale of Poppy will be contributed back to children's mental health to support research and program development.

Do Poppy & her Resources replace therapy/medical assistance for my child?

No! Poppy and the on-line program, strategies and resources can strengthen your communication with medical support (counseling, therapy, family doctor) to get the best assistance for your child. By giving families the language, strategies and methods to track their child's behaviour, M.I. Friends can bridge the gap to care for families by helping them build stronger relationships with external supports.

How do I purchase a Poppy for someone else?

Purchasing a Poppy for someone else is easy! 

Purchase a Poppy with your email and address. In a couple weeks, this email will receive a `survey’ - one survey per program purchased. These surveys are to be passed on to the family who will be receiving and using the Poppy program. You can pass it on, or we can help direct your Poppy to a family in need.

The survey will ask for the email and the address of the family where your Poppy is to be delivered, making sure Poppy gets to their forever home.

When can I expect to receive Poppy?

Will ship May 2021. The website and resources will be available earlier- you will get an email with details upon purchase. 

How big is Poppy?

Poppy measures approx. 19" in total length. Made using new material, toy quality/ safety inspected, weighted with plastic pellets.

story:
The Mission

More than a decade as a psychotherapist working with adults suffering from depression has helped me develop an understanding of what the causes of suicide are and what can prevent it. I’m making it my mission to educate as many people as possible in order to address this problem. 

Contributions will go towards: 

  • Developing my course material on various platforms to reach a wider audience and make a greater impact
  • The ability to rent a space for making videos for course material, for seminars and workshops, and even a place to host interviews with leaders in the field. 
  • Recording equipment will be needed and the ability to afford an assistant will be paramount in the development of the cause 
  • Affording me the time to devote my efforts on a full-time basis

You can have access to:

  • A like-minded, supportive, and nurturing Facebook community intent on making a difference in the world through personal transformation
  • Monthly membership access providing key insights to learn and develop along the journey of self-transformation
  • The mini-course, an introduction to the process of self-transformation, developed and refined to provide a basic understanding of the forces at work that contribute to our experiences in the world. This lecture has proven to be very helpful to those suffering from depression and suicidal ideation
  • Access to the entire course archive, a deep dive into the nature of our thoughts, emotional intelligence, consciousness, how to implement the habits and tools that are needed to live a happy and fulfilling life, and more
  • Work with me on a 1:1 basis, where you'll be given the guidance and tools to explore yourself to help forge a new path for yourself while developing the capabilities, confidence, and the willingness to put your passions to a purpose

The Impact

The idea of the bad apple ruining the bunch goes back a long way, it’s one of those time tested truisms that relate to humanity as well. Negativity is like that bad apple and everyone feels its repercussions. However, generally speaking, we aren't taught or trained to manage or deal with that negativity. As a result, the unintended consequences of a fear-based negative attitude ripple through our lives and affects all that we encounter in the world. 

This concept works in the opposite way as well too. One's positivity or general state of peace has the same consequences. The opportunities to gain insight and understanding that I'm offering will help others bring about peace and contentment within their own lives and in turn, ripple outwards and affect all that they do. But I need your help and contribution to my mission to raising the consciousness of humanity through self-knowledge and encouraging self-transformation as a way to combat the plague of suicidality.  

Risks & Challenges

I’m dedicating myself to this mission but plans don’t usually come without difficulty. I want to be able to dedicate myself to this full-time and as a startup, I don’t have a runway to get this off the ground through marketing and ad space. Contributions will help greatly in this area but your ability to show others what I’m intending to do will also be of great value. Any support that one may think may be helpful I will always be open to receiving so if you or anyone that you may know that can be of service to these ends will always be welcomed by me as well. Tis the season! Share, share, share!

story:
Short Summary

In its second year, this community baby shower was originally conceived by the Penny For your Thots Collective and inspired by the pregnancy of Queen Bey herself.

Having provided tens of thousands of dollars worth of baby supplies, prenatal educational workshops, and food and childcare for 25 women of color in the Pittsburgh community inspired us to do it even bigger and better this year to broaden the overall impact.

The reason this work is important to us is because we're dedicated to addressing the racialized disparities in birth outcomes for black babies. By Contributing to this project you're not only investing in the city's youth, you're contributing to a one-of-a-kind event that has proven to make an impact and reach people who aren't currently being reached by conventional social programs.

What We Need & What You Get

This year our target is to welcome 50 people to kick back and celebrate their little bundle of #blackjoy. Some of the things we need support funding include:

  • Purchasing baby supplies for the parents
  • Providing food and nonalcoholic drinks for the event
  • Paying the facilitators who will be hosting the pre- and postnatal workshops
  • Providing ASL interpretation and other basic accommoadtions
  • Acquiring modest but aesthetic decorations

If we don't meet the entire goal, funds will be prioritized to purchasing as many baby supplies as we can.

Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest risks to doing this work is not being able to provide all the necessary baby supplies for parents and having to let people down. The positive side of that, is that even if we can get them EVERYthing they need, we can at the very least get them some of the things and treat them to a nice celebration to show them they matter to us.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Ways you can make a difference include

  • Getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign!
  • Sharing the registration form with pregnant black folks you know bit.ly/BeyBShowerRegistry
  • Donating any baby items you may have that are clean and in great condition
  • Sharing our event page with your networks bit.ly/BeyBShowerEvent

And that's all there is to it. Thank you so much for your support! Feel free to contact us if you have any questions, BlackFemmeExcellenceCo@gmail.com

story:
Aprioria Textiles was born from the idea of bringing a more sustainable and mindful lifestyle though the use of natural, sustainable, luxurious, and practical linen textiles. 

We believe that items we use daily should provide us with satisfaction and tactile sensations because small things like towels and throws make a difference to our lives and the environment.

Live More Consciously For:

Why do We Want to Make a Change?

There are many myths and misperceptions about textiles we use daily. For example, most of us believe that high-quality towels should be heavy and plush like conventional cotton towels. However, said characteristics make them bulky and heavy, drying time is long and they are susceptible to odor and bacteria growth. Many of us tend to choose polyester for our fitness routines in order to carry less weight and save space in our sport bag. Both options do not leave us satisfied and they are far from being sustainable. As for throws, the most popular choices are a) polyester which is not pleasant to be around nor is it natural as it made of petroleum, a sub-product of oil or b) natural wool but it can be itchy, heavy, and difficult to take care of. So we asked ourselves what if there is a better option?

Our Materials

After 8 months of research and development, Aprioria Textiles created a line of products made of 100% linen. We choose linen for its abundant extraordinary qualities.

Why to Choose Aprioria Textiles?

First, Aprioria Textiles items are much lighter than cotton items of the same size.  They take less space while being 30 % more absorbent. It makes them ideal companions for fitness and personal care.

Second, our towels and throws dry more rapidly then cotton items which makes them more practical.  They are made of the flax plant, which has a hollow structure that allows for high air permeability. So no more damp and musty towels in the bathroom!

Third, every Aprioria Textiles linen towel possesses exceptional qualities which make them ideal for the most sensitive skin. They are hypoallergenic, antistatic as well as hygienic and antibacterial. Conventional cotton or polyester have none of these characteristics and often provoke skin irritation. Also, our throw is a perfect natural insulator due to the temperature regulating properties of linen.  They keep your body cool in the summer, warm in the winter and relaxed year round.

Fourth, we have created durable and long lasting products. They are 30% stronger than cotton so you do not need to replace them nearly as often. It saves money.

And last but not least, our products are environmentally friendly. Linen is a natural fiber made from the flax plant which reaches maturity in 100 days. It does not require any pesticides or any additional irrigation other than rain water. Linen is biodegradable and easily recyclable without carbon generating processes. Linen products, if left out in normal outdoor environmental conditions, will self-compost in less than a year.  

On the top of all the advantages, Aprioria Textiles linen towels provide you with a light exfoliating effect due to its particular weaving. So taking care of your body and the environment in our fast paced world can be easy.

Mindful Design for Feeling Good

We believe that life is all about the little things.  While living in our fast moving and stressful world, surrounding ourselves with sensually pleasant products is important to reduce stress. Most of all we want you to feel good about yourself while using our towels and throws. Comfort is one of our cornerstones, so we design pieces which flatter your body.

How We Came Up With The Idea?

Since 2018, we have been thinking about ways to replace polyester towels which are widely used in yoga, palates classes and in the gym. Our creator Anna heard many times from people in the classes she attended how unpleasant and irritating using polyester towels are. Such unnatural towels can significantly hinder the pleasantness from the practice. Keeping this in mind, we wanted to create something different – textiles that are practical, versatile, pleasant to touch, naturally breathable and eco-friendly. While discovering the extraordinary qualities of linen, we decided to expand our line to include towels for fitness, bath, face and hands as well as linen throws and beach sheets.

From Picnic to Meditation and Everything in Between

Multifunctional products for adults and children are very important to us. Each of our products are crafted with longevity and versatility in mind. Designed to take you effortlessly from day to night, from bathroom to gym, from your home to a picnic in the park or mediation practice.

Our Products: Design Attributes and Sizes

Our towels have a special honeycomb weaving for better absorbency and for providing a light exfoliating effect.

Our throws are made of unique double layered linen fabric which gives them a cashmere like touch and make them extra comfortable to cuddle with.

Especially for the Indiegogo campaign, we created a limited addition beach sheet. They are our summertime "must-haves". Light, durable and  easy to take care of. 

Our Production

All our products are ethically made in Europe. After a long search for a production facility, we chose one situated in the European part of Russia which has been an industry leading specialist in linen production for more than 150 years. For a long time, it has been the linen supplier of Russian royalty and continues to be a world renowned linen producer. 

We are happy to support production that takes care of long-lasting textile traditions as well as provide thousands of working places for local people. Most of the employees are professionals with experience of 20-35 years.  They work 8 hour shifts with a lunch and tea breaks, have paid vacation and medical care as well as support of labor unions. As you can imagine, people are happy to work in a stable environment producing items which are highly appreciated around the world. We love visiting our production partner in order to foster a close working relationship with the individuals who are producing exceptional products for you. 

International Certifications of our Production Partner Include:

  • OEKO-TEX® Certification - you can be certain that every component of our products have been tested for harmful substances and that the products therefore is harmless in human ecological terms. 
  • BSCI Certification - every product is produced in a factory that strictly adheres to BSCI requirements that implements the principle international labor standards protecting workers’ rights. 

Packaging

We package our items in biodegradable bags and recyclable envelopes. 

No Scraps, No Waste

We have designed our products in a way that there is no production waste or leftover fabric.  Everything weaved is being fully utilized.

Our Team 

We are a family run business operated by Anna and Lance. We invested our time, energy and savings in order to create an alternative to conventional textiles as well as inspire people to live more consciously and sustainably.

Anna is a co-founder and the creator of Aprioria Textiles. She is a graduate of Central Saint Martin’s College of Art and Design in London and has been working with textiles since childhood. She formulated an idea and spent several months developing and testing prototypes before she would receive the right result. She is a creative professional with boundless enthusiasm for her work.

Lance is a co-founder and the managing force behind Aprioria Textiles. Lance holds an MBA from IE Business School in Madrid, as well as an undergraduate degree in finance and management from Grand Valley State University. He has spent his career working for a number of international companies which has given him the ability to look at common things from a different perspective.

Color of the product is subject to change.

Why Do We Need Your Pledge?

Creating sustainable textiles in a world of mass market, fast consumption and instant gratification takes a lot of courage that our team definitely possesses. In order to scale our efforts we need your support. We believe in the synergy of our boundless energy, enthusiasm, hard work, and support of people, who like us, believe that big changes can be achieved with little things, like towels and throws.

Our conservative campaign goal is 15,000 euros. This target covers the initial order with the producer, fulfillment to our Indiegogo backers, and allows us to deploy a small quantity of products on the European market for proof of concept. However, our ideal goal is 45,000 euros.  This goal will allow us to accelerate scaling. 

The cost of research, prototype creation and testing, roadshow to visit production candidates, administrative, legal and marketing expenses prior this campaign has been fully funded by us.

Our Fair Prices

We believe that fairly produced linen textiles cannot cost the same as mass market conventional products. Growing, harvesting, treating flax, weaving the fabric, sewing textile items and finishing by hand is a time-consuming process which requires many highly skilled professionals. Just imagine that to produce the fringe on our throws takes a skilled seamstress several hours to complete.

We believe that all work during this process should be fairly compensated. We would like to inspire our clients to respect their items, take good care of them, and to create a connection with the products. It may sound strange for a textiles brand but we want you to buy less and buy better.

Choose Consciously When You Shop

A throw at a leading mass market retailer can cost 30 euros or more but it is made of polyester and will loose its initial look and feel in a couple of months, if not in weeks and create additional waste. We do not offer just another towel; we offer towels which will last. We do not offer a cover for this winter, we offer a throw that will keep you naturally comfortable and keeps its abundant qualities and look.

Our Perks

Color of the towels – beige.

Appreciation Has No Levels...

We appreciate your support and would like to reward you with very useful and high-quality items which were made just for our Indiegogo campaign.

For every Perk up to 149 euros you will receive for free a beautiful modern kitchen towel to inspire you to try baking your own bread, the recipe of which will be provided as well. If you are not interested in baking, then you can treat yourself with a nice personal breakfast. We believe that little thoughtful details like this truly make a difference in life.

For every Perk above 150 euros you will receive for free a beautiful modern kitchen towel to inspire you to try baking your own bread, the recipe of which will be provided as well. If you are not interested in baking, then you can treat yourself with a nice personal breakfast. Also, you will receive a linen bag to make your grocery shopping more sustainable. We believe that little thoughtful details like this truly make a difference in life.

Our Big Thanks

We appreciate everyone who has helped us during the process: our incredible team at our production partner and our dear families and friends in Russia, the USA, and around the world. We also would like to give a special thanks to our friend Anna who flew from Paris to Madrid to make our Welcome Video for our Indiegogo campaign. 

And huge thanks to all of you for stopping by and reading this campaign. We appreciate your time and support enormously and truly believe that you will enjoy your Perks!

Future Plans

During our Indiegogo campaign we present our initial line of products. Looking towards the future we have more fine offerings in the R&D pipeline.  If you did not find something you love today and would like to support our work, please make a donation by clicking the "BACK IT" button at the top of this page.

We will be happy to send you our family bread recipe which works every time and will inspire you to live more consciously and connect with yourself. 

Get Inspired and Receive News on Our Instagram Page:

Contact Us by Email or Subscribe to Our News Letter:

Risks and Challenges

Aprioria Textiles has already produced various samples of our products and tested them rigorously. Every item has performed beyond our hopes and expectations. We developed a trustworthy relationship with our production partner, signed an engagement contract and they are ready to take our order. We are confident that we will meet our delivery commitment, however, we will communicate clearly in the unlikely event of force majeure. We commit to maintain transparent and honest communication with you throughout the whole process so you know where your products are and when they are going to be delivered to you. Please note that any customs charges outside the European Union will need to be satisfied by the backer.
